rnams dang// mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib ma dang// kam po dzI khyab bdag de bzhin// 'byung po 'byung po'i gzugs kyis ni// rtag tu chog bzhin bsgrub bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// kun nas

phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri// mosumakhaskor dbus byin nas// brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes par bya// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// lte ba zab pa'i spyod yul can// de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sku// zhal gcig pa ]
la phyag bzhi pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa yi// bzhad pa'i zhal la khro dang bcas// kha dog sngon po drag chen po// thed pa'i 'phreng bas zlum par brgyan// nyi mar gar mdzad de la bzhug//

sum cu pa rnams 'jigs par byed// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin// bzang po'i gzugs can spyan gsum pa// thod pa dang ni kha hU~M 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug gis ni brgyan// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni//

byung du rim pa ji lta bas// mkha' 'gro kam po dza nyid ma// 'jib ma dang nimaram ma'o// de ltar rdorje sku yi don// mdor bsdus pa yis brjod nga ra bya// lte bar rdo rje'i rnam par 'gyur// pho nya rkang pa drug bgrod ma'i//
snying kha gsang ba mgrin pa ru// denyid rnam pa slar dgod bya// de nas srog gi 'dzin bzhin pas// bsam gtanasams pa gzhan gyis mi// lha rdzas 'od zer bskyed par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang/

lus skyes// las dang po yi sbyor ba yis// phyogs bcur rnam par spro bar 'gyur// giyig las byung ba'i lha mo// phag mo phyag nibazhi pa ste// gzhu dang mda'ani de bzhin du// rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid//

kha dog sngon po drag chen mo// phag gi gdong can 'jigs rung ma'o// phad yig gis bris zhib mo// kha dog dmar mo 'od chen mo// thod pa dang na lcags kyu nyidi// kha raM Da ma ru de bzhin// b+hiya yo ges

gzhon nu ma// kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma// rtse gsum pa dang ba dan gsum// gzhu dang mda'anyid de bzhin no// hob+bayi yi ges tsA mu// kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma// kha thaM ga nyid thod pa dang// cang te'u

00 chang snod de bzhin no// oM yig lasani tshangs pa mo// kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma// badra nyid dang thod pa dang// gzhu dang mda'ani de bzhin mchog/ kaM yig las ni tshogs dbang mo// kha dog ljang gu phyag bzhi

mang tso gsum pa dang thod pa dang// bgrang 'phreng dang nil du'o// dI yog las ni khyab 'jug ma// kha dog sngon mo phyagabazhi ma// 'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang// zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog/ I yag

las byung ba'i dbang mo// kha dog sar mo phyag bzhi ma// rdo rje madung thung thod pa dang// sdigs mdzub bcas zhags de bzhin no// thams cad 'bar bzhan gyen brdzas skra// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par

klubs// rol zhon ma spyan gsum ma// rked par stag gi pags pa dkris// shar sgor tshas pa bri bya ba// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang nibagrang 'phro dang// spyi blugs pad+ma de bzhin no//

byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ni// kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa// ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang// thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin no// lhor drag po bri bya ste// du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi pa// rtsa gsum thod pa de

bzhin du// zhags pa 'phrang ba 'dzin de bzhin// nub tu gzhon nu bri bar bya// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi po// dang 'a bo mdung thung dbyug pa 'dzin// thod pa bgrang 'phreng 'dzin de bzhin// dbang ldan khyu mchog

la zhon pa// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// thod pa dang ni rtsa gsum 'dzin// phyag gzhan thal mo sbyar ba'o// dbang po glang po la zhen pa// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi ste// rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang// thal mo
sbyar ba byas pa mchog/ ma lug la zhen pa ni// kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa// ma ya thab dang thod pa dang// skrag nas de bzhin lag thal sbyar// gshin rje ma he la zhon pa// kha

dog nag po phyag bzhi pa// dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang// kun tu skrag nas thal sbyar 'dzin// bden bral ma la zhon pa ste// kha dog sngo skya phyag bzhi pa// ral gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kun nas skrag pas

thal sbyar mchog/ tshulha chu srin la zhon pa// kha dog drakar po phyag bzhi ste// zhugs pa de bzhin thod pa dang// thal mo sbyar ba de bzhin gzhon// rlung lha ri dwags la zhon pa// duba'i mdog can phyag bzhi

sta4 rngab dan dang ni thod pa dang// de bzhin thal sbyar 'dzin pa mchog/ lus ngan po ni gtar la zhon// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// rin po che dang thod pa 'dzin// thal sbyar byas pa 'o de bzhin gzhan// thasu
cad rgyusur drang ni gza'// rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa sgom// rang gi dam chog las byung ba// de rnams rdzu 'phrul ldan stobs che// ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma// 'byung po rigs ma de bzhin gzhan//
de lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// da phyi re bsgrub par bya// dur khrod la sogs gnas rnams su// sna tshogs dam tshig za rnams kyis// rnal 'byor longs spyod rtag dga' la// pho nya'i las ni yang dag
brtsam// zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i 'byung bzhin no// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis// de thams cad ni bran bzhin byed// gnas sogs lte shu rtsa bzhi'o// de phyir rim pas
mchod par bya// de nas dri sogs dbul bya zhange// sdugs kyi bzlos pa yang bya ste// rang ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la// oM hUMphaT sogs nang bcug pa'o// dbus su bcom ldan 'das brjes nus/
der ni thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas gzhan brjes pa'i nang// bcom ldan gzhan gyi gzugs can te// ba dran gsum pa 'bar ba dang// rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog/ gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa
nyid g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyur// lhag ma sngon gyi gzugs can te// lus dang zhal sogs ston gyi don/ dngos par dbus ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom mad// sku
gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'i bdag/ thams cad lus kyi rang bzhin can// gzugs thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa// bcom ldan gzugs kyi 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o/
de nas 'di ni bde rgyal po// rnal 'byor ma yis sang mdzad nas// ngag 'di yisani 'dri bar mdzod// blo gros chen po dus ce lags// kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams khyed nyid dus//
pa'ong snya tshogs sa bonaams chen po// myu gu can gyi sbyor bsa bshad// gza' dang rgyu sur rgyas gras ni/ sems kyi dus su mngon par brjod// gzugs med grangs ni de yi dus// rnal 'byor rnams kyi

bde ba'i rgyu// 'jig rten gyi ni dus tsam du// thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs// de tshe smyu gu can sgom pa// sa bon sa bon gyi mtshan nyid// myu gu sems kyi gzugs can te// sems las byung ba myu
can ng rgyu skar ra si gza' sogs pas// gang zhig tu ni myu gu skyes// de yis myu gu can des byas// rang bzhin rang bzhin du sbyang bya// dge ba 'am ni mi dag kun// tshes grangs rgyu skar/
gza' 'char ba// de rnams thamaMs cad dus rnams su// thams cad bde bdag nyid skyes sgom// 'o triu0f00nitod byed pa'o// ma b+ha mnad 'joms pas spangs// ku sba A dus byang gzugs te// tshos gros de/

yani yongs su spras// mo bu ma bzang dang bkra shis so// ra du A 'dzems par byed pa'o// b+ha ba b+ha dus kyi gzugs kyis so// b+ha pA gu rud pa byed pa po/ mi gru d+hanor la sogs par mdzad// khra gu a dus kyi

gzugs can no// dri shu pU dge ba rnams byed do// b+hipa' pu nad dang 'joms pa yin// b+hut+tatu gshin rje'i mchu can no// klu ma kri grogs dang bsod nams 'thob// bla ma A gdung byed pa po// pA ra ma 'chi ba'i

dus can no// mi'i gangan can du mi ki la// slar yang gshin rjer rat+ta spang// srin por bco lnga pa nyid dang// khyu mchog chu lhar spang bar bya// sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms nyid du// gter du smilam can de
bzhin// bzang po mig gsum pa nyid du// 'byung po'i kim shar de bzhin// zla ba dang nyisogs chas// de rnams res mo rab bshad bya// bzang po yugs sa mo de bzhin// sems g.yos 'byung po'i nyi mar

gnas// skye bo kun gyi ma yi ni// ma yi rgyu bar shes par bya// khyu mchog mi ki ra nyid dang// rmilam bco lnga pa de bzhi/zla ba'i rgyubar yang dag grags// rim pa 'di rnams rnam par brjod// ltal mo ru yang dag gnas/

0 stong la rlung gi gnas su'o// de ltar de'i dbus gnas pa'i// phyogs su gdung byed yang dag gnas// zla ba nyid las byung ri mo// mnyam par lta bas mnyam par 'a// zhi dang sdig pa bltas pa yis// shes rab/

can gyi ngo desngangs// mche ba dang 'phrad ma bltas pas// bden par 'chi bar byed pa yin// dus sa ba ni mdor bsdus po// rA hu'i rgyu bar grags pa yin// dugar dang cig shes cho ga yis// blo gros mthar thug pas

shes 'gyur// rgyu skar sogs dang mi mthun par// rmongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed// skye bo rang gis byas pa yis// las 'dishes 6mgyur to// las de yis ni dus rnams ni// rje tsom mad pa ra 'byung bar 'gyur

lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa// de srid du ni dus rab 'jug/ rnal 'byor pa rnams nyams su myong// yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur// de ni myu gu can du grags// kha dog ngamar po 'od chen po// myu gu'i myu gu'i
gzugs can ni// lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa sgom// 'ba'anga'i 'khor le'inangason pa// gzugs de lha rdzas kyi ni gzugs// ye shes myu gu rnam bsgoms pas// las rnams thams cad ma thong mi 'gyur// thams
cad bdag nyid sbyor chen las// sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad pa// rgyu rnams su ni rtag bzhugs pa// rdo rje rgyu yis 'di gsungos so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa dgu pa 'o// de nas
rdzo gar byas nas// rnal 'byor mas ni 'di dris so// ji ltar ston pa sems dpa' che// las dang 'brel bas 'byung bar 'gyur// sngon ni lasa rnam nyams pas// rgyun nyams pas na 'ong mad pa/ 'di la bdag
ni the tsom mchis// snying rjemanyes gshin pas bka' stsol// sems can chen po 'byung ba yang// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa// mdor bsdusapa yas bshad bya yis// khyod

ba yid gcig pa yis nyen// rdo rje ral pa can sbyor bas// las kyi nang du sgrub par 'gyur// re re yi ni sbyor ba yi// nga ni rang byung du gnas so// shin tu dad pa la gnas pas// dbang po thams cad 'du bar bya// de yi rnal
pas rtag 'jig rtan// ral pa'i ming gis 'ching ba yin// dga' ba kun las khyad 'byed pa// rdo rje'i su khyod 'thob par 'gyur// de phyir bag chags thams cad dang// dge ba'i las las zad par 'gyur//

skya bo chen po de 'byung ba// gcig nyid lam gyis 'thob par 'gyur// rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur// rtog pa yis ni rtog med 'byung// dril bu'i sgranithob byus nas// de rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rtsa

dgu rtse mo gcig pa dang// rtsa lnga rtse mo gsum pa can// de ltar la sogs dril bu che// rtse mo stong gi bar du go/ sgra brjod pa yi dngos po yis// spros pa med cing yi ge med// rnal 'byor pa yis mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho

a drag/ de yi sgra las rtog pa yang dag byung// de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa'i bodag/ gnas rnams gang la nges par zhugs pa yin// sngon bshad rtsa can de rdo rje// gang du yid ni rnam 'phro ba// chos dang sprul pa'i

ris sku can// de nyid du ni gsor bar bya// phyi yi dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni// dpa' bos gsungs pa bshad par bya// dril bu rtag tu chagasum can// lha yis yang dag brgyan par byas// re re yi ni lha'i bdag po// ting

[@]'dzin dkyil 'khor du ji ltar// rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pas// de bzhin thams cad zhal bya 'o// lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan// dril bu de la pad sogs bya// ji ltar de rnams kyi ni brgyan// de bzhin/

dril bu'i sa rags so// lhani sgo dang grwa rnams su// phyogs brgyad rnams su bya ba nyid// ltar rnal 'byor pa'i mchon bya// de rnams zhal nas rtsa mo 'thon// bum pa sogs dang zhal gnyis la'ang// stong du/

rang rigs mtshan ma can// 'di 'dra ba yi dril bu che// tshad ni gzhan du bshad pa yin// de ni nang gi gzugs can bdag/ de phyir sgra ni rnam mtshon cha// thig le'i gzugs ni khyab bdag che/ rdo rje'ang de dang mnyam

par bya// de ltar bal pa'i sbyor ba las// sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya// ral can dril bur yang dag grags// rdo rje rdorjer brjod par 'gyur// rdo rje ral can bdag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor du'ang bsgom

par bya// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro kun// de tshe nang du mngon par gzhug/ thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las// rdo rje ral pa can byung ba// rdo rje dril bu yang dag brten// bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsungs
zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o/// de nas gzhan gyi sbyor ba che// dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas// bdag gis mngon sum du bshad kyis// rnal 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis//
lus can kun gyi lus gang la// gdan ni stong phrag gnas pa ste// de rnams la yig ngagodapa ni// ka sogs hayig mthar de bzhin// yon tan la sogs dbyangs rnams yig/ khams re re la yi ga/
rnams// slar yang phyi mo btsuganyis kyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis dbye bar bya// gtum mo stong phrag bdag nyid can// mtshams kun tu ni gnas pa 'bar// khams thams
cad kyi bde gnas las// dpa' thor longs spyod 'thob par 'gyur// 'od zer de rnams kyis bkug pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs chen po// bdag med pa yi bdag tu bzhag/ gnyis med chos
'byung nang du go/ de ltar stong phrag gin lce// dpa' bo chen po'i go 'phang gnas// sman thams cad dang tre ba'i yin// smras pa'i bcud len gsungs pa 'o// phyi rol rnams kyi'ang yi ge bdag/ de'i ming
nyid du shes par bya// mo tog 'bras sogs sde tshan gyi// dang po'i ming ni stong phrag can// de rnams kyis ni bcud len sgrub// gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur// ji lta'i rim pas rims sogs kyi//
kasogs thams cad sman chen te// las sla ba ya rgyud gzhan du// der ni nges par gsal rig bya// dang po'i mgon po rnam bsgoms nas// rtags rnams thob par bya ba yin// yang na grub rnal 'byor

rnams kyis// bcud kyis len ni gang mthong ba// des kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sde tshan rnam pas yongs sbyoralas// bdud rtsi'i tshigs mtshams gzugs ldan pa'i//
grub pa'i smon rnams rang bzhin can// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsus so// zhes byab ni rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// 'dres pas mchod pa/
byas nas// grong khyer gsum gyi nang byung ba// ston pa rdo rje checi lags// gang gi gzugs kyis byon pa lags// sprul pa gang du bzhud pa lags// chos nyan pa ya dusasu yapa// ci zhig gis ni bstan par/
byas lha dang lha ma yin dang mi// ci yi ngag gis 'gro dang 'ong// mngon par tshogs mtshams mtshan nyid ni// sngon gyi jibazhin bshad du gsol// mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyid ni// ji lAn+timaM/
pas bshad kyis nyon// shin tu zab mo'i don chen po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyis ma shes// sems can rnams kyi rang snang can// bdag gis nges par mdor bsdus pas// rdo rje sems 'od gazhan nyid du/
khams dang mtshan mar gnas min tsa// lus dang ngagasems dag pa yi// grong khyer gsum rnams su byung ba'o// sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'os// ngas par las chung bar 'gro 'o// yang na dus rnams
thams cad du// ji ltar me long la bzhin mthong// sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas// sems kyang de yi gnas la 'o// rojal sogs ting 'dzin gyis// lha la sogs pa de rnams rmos// de yisi [“]tshang

kyi rab tu sbyor bas rtag tu sprul// rdo rje'i rtsa mor 'jig rten sprul// 'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste// y+Yogi yi ge'i sgra yis ni// ston pas 'khor lo can ston byas// chos 'byung khang pa brtsegs dang/ ti
shu'i lhan cig skyes gdan du// ngag gi spyod par mnyan par byed// der song nas ni de la thim// de ltar rnal 'byor dbang po yi// slob dpon khyab bdag ches shes bya// rdo rje la sogs de'i
mtshan nyid bshad par bya// sems can kun la phan bdag nyid// mi 'jigs pa ni sta nyid dang// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// sbyor ba bzo dang sgyu rtsal sogs// mthun//
pa'i ngag dang thams cad la// bu gcig pa ltar mthun pa dang// gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin de mchog gzhel// jiltar smras pa de bzhin byed// 'tshob med cing bden pa'i
dragang sems can kun la thugs brtse dang// lam du 'dzud pa de mtha' phyin// kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang// bstan bcos kun gyi pha rol son// mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma// phyag rgya badrani
byed pa po// de sogs yon tan rnams kyis gang// skye ba 'di la de bzhin gshegs// rnal 'byor ma 'khor la dbus su// ri rje[%]mdzad sgom pa yin// dkyil 'khor byung chub sems kyi ste// bde ba'i
rgyal po rnal 'byor ma// sgra rnams su ni sgra ye shes// rdodzahUMmadzod can khyab bdag/ 'phos pa'i lhag mar gyur ye shes// dang po'i mgon po'i rgyuyin no// sems kyi nyams su myong ba// de phyir phra
mo'i rang bzhin can// sngar sha'i khams su yang dag grags// de nyid kyis ni khyer nas 'ongs/ mkha' 'gro mtshor rtag ces par// sa gsum de yi rang bzhin byas// de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo//
shing sran gzhan ni sog ma bzhin// 'di yis bgrod pa mashes pas// byis pa ma shes pa yis bcings// mtha' yis bde ba gsung ba po// bstan bya ston pa sde lnga'achang// lhan cig skyes gzugs ston pa po//
bcom ldan ye shes kyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas gang gis sgrub pa po// 'grub pa'i bsam mad sbyor bshad bya// de ni shin bzang rab sprodrangs//

spyod dang brtul zhugs bshad par bya// lhun gyis grub 'gyur do'i spyod pa// dngos grub 'dod rnams kyis shes bya// phyi rol gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid// spyod pa do ni rab tu bsngags// kun gyi bdag nyid

yid bzang la// dbang po'i grong khyer yapadag rten// grong de rnams su spyod pa dang// yid kyis brtul zhugs bstan par bya// srid dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis// gang der bdaganyid kyis 'gro bya/ padag
nyid gzugs kyirang bzhin can// yang dag me long la mthong 'gyur// zhu ba'i sems la brten byas M nas// lus ni lus la thim par gyis// sdom par bdag nyid kyis bsdams pas// phyag rgya chen por yang

dag grags// phyag rgya lnga sogs lus la gnas// thod pa dang ni kha hU~M 'dzin// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa tha// lhan cig rnal 'byor ma rol lda// chags pa'i sems kyis bsgom pa ste// mi 'dod kyang ni de
phyir 'gro// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yis// yide 'a dil ni gos pa med// 'jigs med rnam pa'i sams kyis ni// mtshan mo dur khrod sogs par 'gro// sa gzhi gang du spyod pa na// rnam shes brgyad

du shes par bya// blo ldan spyod dang brtul zhugs ni// bde ba can du de rtsen to// dang po'i sbyor bar yongs brten nas// phyi nas yid kyi rab tu bshad// srog thams cad ni mnyam sbyor bas// dbang po'i grong khyer
bde ba yis// ye shes spyod pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsus so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o// de nas skye bo'i rigs kyi

[D ]ni khyad par bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rje bzang po'ireb sbyor bas// de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur// de la dang po lnga dang bdun// brgyad dang bcu gsum bcolnga dang// bcu bdun dang ni nyi shu'anyis//

nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog/ tha skar la sogs shes bya ste// lha rnams chogs su dran par bya// bzhi pa dang nishar ba gsum// gnyis pa dang ni drug de bzhin// byang phyogs pa rnams de bzhin gsum// mi yi

zla tshogs su dran par bya// gsum pa dang ni bcu nyid dang// dgu pa dang ni nyi shu gsum// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// bco brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de grags pa// srin po'i rigs su dran par bya//

ra rigs gsum dang brgyad pa dang// klu ni bzhi dang lnga pa'o// drug pa nyi shu rtsa dgur// khyi yi dngos por bshad pa lo/ bcu dang bcu gcig byi ba ste// byi la de bzhin dgu pa 'o// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// rtag

tu de ltar brjod pa'o// bcu gnyis pa dang nyishu lnga// khyu mchog gi ni rigs 'thob bo// thog ma tham bong bu yi// rigs su de rnams rab tu grags// bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa// de ni ma her mngon par brjod/

thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug/ rta yi rigs su rab tu brjod// nyi shu pa dang nyi shu gnyis// spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa 'o// gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin// glang po yi ni rigs su 'gro// nyi shu gsum dang nyi

0 shu bzhi// mi ste stobs ni che ba yin// nyi shu gcig pa phra mo ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad// stobs dang bdag byed pa'i rgyusar// bshad kyis da lta mnyan par gyis// mi rnams srog ni rgyu skar te//

gzhan du rab tu 'thob pa yin// skar mar dus kyi rtsa son pa'i// 'dzin pa po ni nges par 'chi// lug dang srang dang kaka'// chu srin mthon po la dran byu// kI ru bum sa khyu mchog// brtan pa'i bya bor rab

tu bstan// nya dang 'khrig pa de bzhin 'dir// gzhu dung bu mo 'dres ma la'o// blam nyim sa'i skyes bu// ngan slong rA hu zla bud med// gza' lhag bkra shis ma ning skye// mkha'adakyil 'khor la gza' gang yin//
de ltar rigs rnams sogazhan du// byang chub sras po mi 'gyur ro// rje rje bzang por de bshad do// rab sbyor rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// g.yon pa'i rtsa ruson pa'i sems// dbu ma'i ma'i sbyor bar ldan//
byang chubs bon rnams 'bab pa// byang chub sems rnams kyis rig pa'o/ snying rjerason pa'i yid kyis ni// las kyi nyi ma 'dzag pa yin// yang dag rab star rtag tu ldan// rigs mngags can yang mad do//
srid par rtsang mo tsam dui/ bsam gtan rnam pa'ilus son pa// ma long gi ni yul la gzugs// gang 'dra mthong sta de mang do// de 'drar byang chub sams dpa' rnams// bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can

nong de yi nang du zhu ba'i soms// de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod min// nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbus su// rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// gsang sngags mchod pa sngon gyi can//
da @#// dus dang dus min cha'i bdag nyid// dngos med ma yin byed por bzhugs// byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid che// bcom ldan sems dpas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa
bcu bzhi pa'o////de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang gis// bde kun bdag nyid du skyod bshad// don dam pa yi sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid du 'ab 'jug bya// 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor

kyis sngags kyi 'phrang bar rang nyid byon// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa nyid ni// sa rnams lani rab tu bshad// 'khor lo drug dbyibs ri mo ni// sa yi dbus su bya ba yin// thams cad du ni gsang sngags chig
bzhi bcu rtsa brgyud bri bar bya// de rnams sngags kyi gzugs rnams ni// srogazhi yi ge'i rnam pa can// yi ge'i cha rnams bzang po ni// spangs nas dbus ma'i gnas pa yi// stong par nges par thim byas

gnas 'og dang steng du blta bar bya// rkang pa'i mtha' nas mgo bo ru// rnal 'byor dbang phyugade srid byed// khams kun rab tu zhugs pa la// sems kyi spyod pa can ci smos// de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa//
dpa' bo chen po'i don can no/ dbus mar rab tu zhugs pa ya// bsnyan dang sgrub pa la sogs spangs// 'thor rlung 'dzin bzhin pa yis ni// nyim dang po zang mad can// rdo rje'i lam nas las pa'i sems//

gang phyir brgyud pa'i rim pas so// de ltar sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'dir// rtsaba'i sngags sogs re'u mig can// dpa' bo kun gyi re'u mig rnams// sngags kyi 'khor lor dgod par bya// ting 'dzin mgon po'i dpa'i

bo rnams// bcu gnyis rnams kyi'ang 'khor lor son// gang zhig gang gi mang sngon gyis// de dang de yi gnas su bya// gzhan gyi sngags kun 'di rnams la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sku lasog/
pa'i bzlas kun dang// de bzhin ngag sogs bzlas pa can// sems sogs bzlas pa thams cad dang// de bzhin ye shes sogs bzlas can// sdugs kyi rgyal pos bskul ba yis// de nas dang ba bo
'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs byed chen po dbus rnams su// me yi gzugs can bsgom par bya// shes rab 'igs kyi nus pa yis// 'byung po' tshogs de kun spyod bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang da dang//

drag po rangs par byed yi ge/ las dang rjes mthun gzugs pasems te// 'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgod bya// 'chi ba sla zhing de nyid kyis// rnal 'byor dang ni ldan par 'gro// nA da na dar 'dzom bya zhing//

thig le thig ler thim par bya// de ltar cho ga'i bya ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas nas phur bus gdab// 'di rnams sngags kyi gtso bo yis// rkang pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad de// oM hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge mtha'/

ji lta'i rim pas 'di kun la'o// na maH shrI badzra TA ka mahAbI rabI re shA rA ya/ tib+hu wa na kaM pa kaM pa banAya/ deT+Thita Ta b+hi Sha Na b+hir bA ya/ sha ta sa sra ne ta ya/ ba phyud dzaM hAya/ kaM kA la ma lA b+ha ra NA ya/

ko ni la sku blu dzAya/ dzalA ba lA sh+tsa lag na ya/ pa ru pu pA sho r+ya ta shAlA la/ kawAn ta rlu mukrab pu cha ya/ pika Ta mu kha hAhAr pA ya/ ma trig Na pa ri pAri ta man+tA ya/ sa hadza sum+ba rIb la b+haka rA ya/ hU~MhU~MkA

rotsAr Na mu khA ya/ ma hAsh+tsashAn pra yA ya/ sarbab+hu ta saM pas na ka rA ya/ ma hA kalpan+naI te dza ya/ dza' ka lA pa/ma ku ru ya/ kha hUM ga ka pA laAl b+hinan d+ha ri Ni/ mahA sa mu dra ma la/

lA ya/ bya glu tsamUm ba ra d+hA ri Ni/ pe tA lasaM g+ha mjun ka rA ya/mahAbihU~MnihAri Ni/sha tsA ni sum+b+hA ka rA ya/ tras ha sra mahAsA ha sra ku ro mA ba lcan+tachatin/ sha ta sa ha sra mu khA ya/ dzAn sA ga ra pra b+hA ya/ma

hApi'i taru d+hire bas hAr NaM/ sarbamA ra ba la d+hus te/ siT+ThisaMhAr kAr kA ya/ sarbanA gA naMsho Sha ta stam+b+ha na bi d+hAb nA ya/ an+nAmA la d+hAri Ne/ su me ru kaM pa tAnA dA ya/ kro d+ha ba gra had+hAr NA ya/ ma hA kAsha ti la

kAN bud+d+ha ko Ti sa ha sra klu cha ni ya/ dzA nA mri ta b.rU pa NA ye/sarba karma pra ban+tan ya ni/ ban+d+hen ka rA ya/ sarba bi kalpab+hany+dzan ka rA ya/ muts+tshAb li lag sha rIr ya/ par kr-i ta ya man+ta nIsha nA ya/ ma hAr

ka rA ya/ duT+TahU~M bi dA la ne/ d+hamo da ya da ya ka rA ya/ kro d+has ra sa ra NA ya/in dzol sam+basatwA tam ni/ gralta bA da phra bA de ma hAm te/ de ltar la sogs gsang sngags gang// rab tu mang ba rgya che ko/ sna tshog
rnam pa du ma'i ming// sems can ming gis shes par bya// sngags rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// khams gsum rnams su yongs bzhugs pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// bcom ldan sngag
pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcolta pa'o/// de nas mig la sogs dbang po// kun gyi mngon shes cho ga bshad// mig mi bzang gi rab sbyor bas// rdo tshigasum nir

bsgrub bya// gang du byung chub sems gnas pas// der ni mig gis nges par lta// rnal 'byor rnams kyi khrag med mchog/ sems ni mig tu shes par bya// rtsa rnams kyi ni rab sbyor bas// so sor rlung ni dbab/
par bya// gang nyid du ni skyes dus su// de yi dus su thim nas 'a// de ni mngon shes mig rnams kyi// sems 'di yis ni 'gro bar 'gyur// skye 'gro'i nang du son pa'i gzugs// yid kyis spyi ni nyen par

'gyur// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i cho ga ni// lha rdzas dri ru rjes mtshon bya// lha rdzas ro ya reb spyir bas// lce ni dga' ba dang bcas kyis// lce yi mngon shes la brten nas// dbu ma'i po nyaskyes pa yin/ lus kyi

reg pa'i rnam pa yas// mchog tu zag med de bsgrub bya// sngon kyi bag chags dran pa la// de steng rnal 'byor ldan par 'gro// nyin zhag mtshan mo mnyam byas nas// chu tshod drug nu nyid dang ni// chu'i srang drug cu

tham pa dang// g+ha Ni kar yang sbyar bar bya// rgyar ni sor mo bcu gnyis pa// dpangs su sor brgyud nyid yin///gul+ladrug cu'i tshod la ni// sor bcu gnyis pa'i thur ma'o// skad cig thang cig yu tsam dang//
kA mig btsums phye ba dang// se gol gtogs par shes bya ste// dbugs rgyu'i mngon par shes pas so// pha rol phyin drug tshul dag gis// chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya// dus dang dus min sel
ba 'o mig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya// mtshon cha mtshan nyid rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid// sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs can te// srog chags rnams kyis nga la bgrod pa/
bdag med rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur// 'dud pa rnams kyi phrad pas gnas// gzugs su byed 'gyur de'i dngos po// mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can// chos kyi 'byung gnas/

gang gnas pa// jo rje mkha' 'gror de shes bya// thurasal lam lartag brtan nas// slar yang re re'i nang du ste// srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga yis// miganilnga ru shes par bya// 'dzeg pa med pa'i sa bon
'dzag/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ldan// sa bon lnga rnams thig le ya// mngon shes byed po sogs lnga pa// de lta'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs// rnal 'byor kun gyi mchog yin no// dngos
po'i rang shes can ma lus// ring du yongs su sus pa yin// thams cad lus su mnyam sbyor las// lhan cig skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa// dngos kun dngos po mda mdzad pa// bcom ldan mig gis
'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o/// de nas lha mos phyag byas nas// de bzhin mchod pa chen po byas// stobs po che yi sbyin sreg ni// bdag po chen pos bstan
du gsol// mkhas pas rgyun du nang bdag gi/ sbyin srog bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// stobs po che yi rab sbyor bas// khams rnams kun gyis dgang blugs te// bde ba thab tu yang dag 'theb// nyi zla
dgang gzar blugs gza' 'o// slob dpon gnyis med de mad la// yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su sreg/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams 'di med// gsang sngags rang bzhin mtshan nyid do// yam shing rtsaru

yang dag grags// gang phyir sA lu las skyes 'bras// tshil ni rtag tu zho zan yin// 'dir mar ni byang chub sems// khrag ni sbyang phyir shes par bya// srog sogs rlung rnams dur ba'o// gcin dang bshangag/
dag de ltar// tsan dan dang ni glu rtsi'o// me tog rtag tu khrag tu grags// mchil ma lud pa 'bras thug yin// bud shing so son rus pa 'o// mdor bsdus pa yis pags pa gos// ma yi thab kyi dbus su ni//

sku dang ba spu lha ru 'gyur// sna tshogs phra mo'i khams gzhan ni// sna tshogs 'bru ste de la srog/ ma kyis mkhar 'gro rdzogs son pa// gang ba'i sreg blugs su shes bya// dbang po thams cad gar byed de//
de yi bag chags glu len no// sna tshogs sgra chen posarol mo// snying rdzasogs pas ston mo yin// srog rnams kun gyi bdag po yi// stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// las thams cad pa'i sbyin sreg ni// de
mnyes pa yis dngos grub 'gyur// 'jig rten mchog gi khams kun tu// yade ni da ru yang dag la// gang tsho'i dus su bde gyur pa// de'i tshe'i dus su rab tu gnas/spyin sreg zhang bdag nyid mthong bas//
chod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ye shes// de rnams dbus mar 'thob par bya// mtshams rnams kun tu khong khro ba// sems chen po'i gsod par 'gyur// rtog pas sprul pa'i

sangs rgyas ni// de las byung ba bza bar bya// mtshon bya mtshon byed rab bcom pas// gnyis dag shes par 'os pa yin// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid mtshan nyid ni// de la thim par byed par 'gyur// khams kun yang
dgasbyor ba las// ye shes gnyis byar mdamtshan nyid/ dam yi gzugs su rtagabazhugs pa'i// bcom ldan thab khung gis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o//
de nas rdo pang 'du ba// jibazhin bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rin chen rdo'i rab sbyor bas// a ba b+hU tIcan dngos grub// rnal 'byor ma la yang dag la// don dam pa yi zhums la gnas//

de yi sbyor bas grol bar ni// gnyis mang rgyud rnams kyis 'gyur ro// lus kyis nyams su myong bzhin pa// byis pa rnams kyi byang chub 'ong// hayig drug dang ldan pa yi// sa bon rdo rje'i nor khur dgod// a

bad+hA tI'i rtsar dbab ste// steng du kha bltas dpralabar son// srung ba'i dus su blo ldan gyis// rang gi lagapas rdo rje bazung// byang chub sems la rtson byed la// rgas dang 'ching ba yin// srid pa'i skyon las

'gomos pa yis// srid gsum de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgyu'i reb sbyor bas// khyim re re bsgrub par bya// de yi dus su gang mthong ba// dngos po kun la ltung bar bya// 'dod chags chen po'i rgyal

bdag nyid// rtag tu bdag nyid la 'byung 'gyur/ rnal 'byor rgyud kyi rgyu'i don du// bstan bya ston pa por 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni// saMms can don ni nges par bya// slabazhi po yi rnal 'byor

gyis ngabaden min bdagagis bshade mi bya// rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhinaM can// sbyor skyes ye shes gyen du bgrod// pho nya rnams kyigatsonyid bya// 'dod chags che yis dgyes par bya// byang chub sems ni rtag/

0gzung ba// lce yi bya yis lag pas min// lhan skyes 'phros pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mkha' lding phyag rgyanyid kyis gzung// phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin te// de nas btung bar bya ba yin// stobs thams cad kyang bza'

bar bya// sA la skyes sogs 'bad pas so// sbyin srag kun kyang de nyid kyis// dbang la sogs pa gang gang byed// de de'i thod par bya ba ste// de nas sa bon gdab par bya// de rnams rdzas kyis spang ba dang//
gtor ma dang ni bsrung bar bya// de yis bcis pa tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs 'jug 'grul// ril bu'am ni skud pa ni// dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa'o/ b+ha ga'i dbus rnams su bsgom
pa'o rin chen rdo rje can de sman// dkyil 'khor khams rnams kun gyi ste// spangs pa rab tu bstan pa yin// gang dang gang gi las kyi I/ de dang de'i ming can sngags so// sa bon kun gyi yos sbyor las/
nga ni rtag tu sman rnams te// bcom ldan las kyi phyag rgya ni// rtag tu 'ching bas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'o// de nas 'khor ba'i mthar gnas pa'i/

mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rta mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas// pho nya'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya// ha yig rgyas gnas dbus su ste// ya yig mgo bor gnas pa'o// gro yig dbu ma'i pad+ma te// wA

yi yi ge sang kha ru// rnal 'byor tshel 'dzin bzhin pa// dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed// rmongs pa nyid ni thams cad 'phrog/ gang phyir gzhung ni rjes 'jug 'gyur// mgrin par rtag tu tshogs bcad ni/
mgrin par ngag tu gnas pa nyid// 'tshob rtayi dbyibs 'di'i ni// gnas pa rnal 'byor lhagam yin// de yi sbyor bas 'gro 'gyur ba// sngon du nyi ma'i gdan du lo// nyidi rdo rje sem
dpa' ste// khams gsum po ni skor bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' nyi mas 'dzegs byas nas// byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar 'gyur// phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus rtogs// rnal 'byor ma yi chu skyes mchog/
sems can kun gyi rmongs nyid dang// lam mthong ba ni thams cad la// de nyid nyi ma rtag snang bar// mtshan mo mun padrag po 'phrog/ rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus son par// rtayi mgon po bsgoms pa yi/
gang gi sangs rgyas su 'gro ba// sgrub thabs yan lag 'char bar 'gyur// bgegs rnams rnam par nyams 'gyur te// sbyin la sogs pa'i ng nyams par 'gyur// kun gyi sdig pa'i ng 'phrog pa'i
byed rang gi dga' ba shar mtshan nyid// mchod sbyin dus kyi 'jig rten du// thams cad skad cig la sgrub 'gyur// khams bdun rnam par bzung ba yis// de tshos 'og dngos grub 'gyur// bdag med
'di rnams de lha mo/ yan lag gcig gis rol par byed// sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ste// sbyin sreg A ga sogs de bzhin// ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste// rdorje'adzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'dod
chags kyis ni 'dod chags bsgo// ma yas tshig lagadung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags// bstan par gyur pas mi 'ching ngo// de nyid thabs so yid kyi las// dge ba'i mtshan nyid

[d/]can bya 'o// nang du byed pa ma yin te// gus pa'i yid kyis dbu mar gnas// phyi rol ye shes can rnams kyi ye shes// de nyid sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba sogs// sems can 'jig rten sogs 'byung ba////
de rnams spras pas sangs rgyus med// mu stags can dang sangs rgyas par// kun tu dbye ba yod ma yin// lung thams cad ni 'gal ba ste// tshad ma pa rnams tho co can// thams cad tshig ni rnam shes
pas// ye shes can rnams de'i phyi shes// mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor las// nam mkha' rnams su bzhugs pa yi// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten par// rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di
gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o////de nas rab tu 'joms yon tan// bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams rten// nam mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rjerlung gi
mtshan nyid de// chags pa dang ni 'jig rnams su// gang zhig stong pa de srog chags// khams rnams de 'drar shes bya ste// dul ba'i sbyor bar yang dag gnas// zla ba'i gzugs su yongs grags pa'i//
rang gi rang bzhin las skyes 'dzag/ rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang// de ni rab 'joms la brjod do// dus thams cad du g.yo ba med// g.yo ba'am 'dir ni mi mthong ngo// de ni thams cad bdag
nyid nga// bsam pa thams cad rab 'jug pa'o// ngo lA hAr sogs sbyar bas// rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar stor ngo// sgra dang thig ler de shes bya// 'od gsal ba dang snang ba gsum// de phyir nam mkha'i
snying po yang// mkhal 'gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes bya// nang gi dbu ma'i sbyor ba yi// srog sde'ang 'ab tu bsngags pa yin// de yang kun gzhi'i shes bya ste// ma long du yang rab tu

bshad// chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i ng de// dmyal sogs 'gro ba de bzhin te// sas rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// gnas nii rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor lo// zla ba'i lam du gang tshemakha'//rnal 'byor rnam kyis
lcag mda' de'i dus rnam par gzhag med 'gyur// rnal 'byor byis pas bgrod bya min// nam mkha'i khams rnams thams cad kyi// de yi snying por rab tu bstan// de dug shes rab thabs gnyis so/
gnas skabs kyang ni gnyis nyid do// srid pa rnam par 'phro ba nyid// dbang po'i dbus su sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas 'jig rten mtha' yas rnams// sa yi nang du sman par 'gyur// de ltar rnam bcas
de nyid dang// rnam pa mad pa'i go 'phang bzhugs// sems dang rnam par shes pa'i rgyun// gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur// dbu mar lta rnams kyis 'grub ste// ye shes der 'di rdzogs pa 'o/
gal te sangs rgyas rjes chags yod// chos dge 'dun la de bzhin mchog/ gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi// tshulachen chos de 'dod pa dang// gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor// stong nyid snying rje'i
bdag nyid can// gal te thams cad mi rtag bdag/ tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin// 'dir mang snyas pasaci bya ste// chos dbyings gal te 'dod kyang ngo// nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs can gyi//
sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgom par bya// shan pa smig ma mkhan la sogs// gsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa// de kun de'a gnas nyams dga' bar// lam rjes skyob rnams kyi grol 'thob// nges par
dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su// gzugs su bsdoms pa bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// rmos pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub 'thob// rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid// stong nyid snying
po gcig pu pa// bcom ldan rab 'joms rnam pa ya// rnal 'byor la bzhugs pas 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shupa'o/// de nas lha mos mchod byas te// phyag
byas nas ni 'di gsol to// rang gis rig pa'i mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan rdo rjesagasung bar mdzod// rang rig ye shes las byung ba// ji lta'i rigs pas bshad par bya// dpal sde ru ka'i rab sbyor bas
rnal 'byor zla ba'i bgrod pa rang// dkar po'i tshos gcig la sogs nas// ye shes rgya mtsho'ephal bar 'gyur// thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gnyis par nam mkhar 'gro ba'i gzugs// gsum
par mda'i yi dbyibs dang 'dra// bzhi par 'bom gyi gzugs can no// lnga par rtse mo lnga'i bdag nyid// drug par khams drug 'byung ba yin// bdun par rgya mtsho ye ni gzugs// brgyad par pad+mar brjod/
pa yin// dgu pa ru ni bcud len te// bcu par lhan skyes gzugs kyis so// bcu gcig pa la zhi ba'i gzugs// bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs// bcu gsum pa la ma ste// bcu bzhir zla ba
de bzhin no// bco lnga pa nyid ra guste// thig le zhes byas bcu drug pa// rnam pa bcu drug mtshan nyid ni// rang gis rig par shes par bya// dpal ru ka'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo bzhi
rnams su bsgrub bya// rgas pa med cing 'chib med// nad dang mdzesogs sngangs pa yin// lte ba gi yi yi ge 'gyur// ha yig snying khar dgod par bya// ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor le so// thod par ka yi
yi ge'o// thig le bzhi yareb sbyor bas// rang gis 'go par 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni// rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog zag mad// gnas dang gnas su 'pho ba nyid// dbu ma'i nang
du rab tu gzhug/ 'khor lo bzhi yi 'dab son nas// rang gis rig pa mtha' yas mchog/ rigs de rnal 'byor ma rnams kyir// byung bar rnam par shes par bya// sems chen po nasad bzhin ngas//
don yod mthong bas 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu rmelam du 'gyur te// dus thams cad du nges par gnas// longs spyod sprul pa'i mtshan nyid du// gnyid log pa yis de tsho mthong// bzhi pa rab mang bdag
mad de// de phyir de rnams mtha'ilengos sbyor// de ltar 'khor lo bzhir gnas nas// nges par lam du 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab de nyid rtogs byas nas// nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid can// rdul gyi sbyor ba

'byung ba ste// nag po'i phyogs su gang 'dir yang// bcu drug rnams kyin rnams kyi// nyi ma nyid ni bar bar du'o// stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba las// ro rdzo'abar ba 'bar zhing 'bar// dkyil 'khor 'khor
ka'a'i dbus rnams su// dpal ru ka bsam par bya/man nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// rdzo'i dga' khar 'gro bar 'gyur// gnas skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor// gtso bo rang rig bdag nyid
can// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar// rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so/ zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyishu rtsa gcig nga 'o//de nas lus sogs lha rnams kyi// ston mo

mngon par bshad par bya// pad+ma gar dbang phyug 'od kyi// rab tu sbyor ba 'di byung ngo// rtsa ni par yang dag grags// srog gi rlung gis gar byed do// byang chub sems kyi dbang phyug so// de rnams kyi ni
nang du bzhugs// rang gis rig pa bza' bar bya// snying rje'i kha yis btung bar bya// gnyis mang rnal 'byor ma dang rol// sgyu ma'i rjes su 'gro rnams 'grub// thams cad de yi rang bzhin du// bza' ba

babra'i ba mad par bya// pad+ma gar dbang bsgom bya ste// ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya// pa yig gzhan gyi grong du 'gro// bstan pa thams cad yi yig/ na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te// te yig bde ba'i/
lha can yin// shA yig rta la sogs pa'i stobs// ra yig dga' phel rgyu can yin// srid dang mya ngan 'das kun la// de yis rab tu sbyor bar bya// mtshams kyi skad ni 'di rnams kum/ bde mchog phyi
mar shes par bya// bgrod pa 'di rnams la brten nas// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug lang// ha ru ka dang bde mchog nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gtso bo/ par gar dbang phyug de yang// sbyor ba kun la
shes par bya// par ye shes yang dag grags// gar gyi dbang phyug rnam shes can// gnyis po gnyis med yang dag byung// lha kun 'dir ni byung ba yin// shes po thams cad de la
gnas// khams gsum du nagar dbang phyug/ gar byed pa yi sku chen la// de nas gos ni mtshon par bya// nam mkhar zhen pa'i sbyor ba yis// mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro// rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor
lo dbus su// lhan skyes gzugs kyis rol bar gyis// 'di yis rtag tu dbang gi las// de rnams kyis ni dga' bar byed// gang dang gang gi las rnams la// de dang de yir bsgom par bya// sgrub po
rnams kyi byung chub rtser// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'ong// de nas bdud nibcom byas nas// gyur byed bzhin pas pad+ma 'dzin// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms shing// tshe son pa rnams
gnas par byed// 'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing// rnal 'byor rnams kyi srid pa sbyong// rang gi sems kyis dngos grub 'thob// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// gzhan du srid pa'i sbyor bdag nyid//
sems can thams cad rab 'jug pa// 'khrul zhing chud zos mu stags rnams// bstan pa rnams la rab 'jug bya// bag chags ngan pa yongs spangs nas// phyi nas rang bzhin bstan par bya//
bza' ba thams cad mnyam sbyor las// bza' ba med par rtag tu gnas// bcom ldan par gar mdzad pa'i// de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba nirab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis
pa'o [(]de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi// mtshan nyid bshad kyis lha mo nyon// gzugs las 'das pa'i ye shes gang// de ni shes rab chen por brjod// rnam par snang bzhin pa de bzhin/
sems dpa' chen po'i ming can no// spu khung rtsa mo thams cad las// de rnams nges 'thon stobs chen po// de rnams bu gar rang zhugs pa// 'khor le bzhi ya mtsho skyes son// ji ltar mar la mar zhug/
pa de bzhin du nikhams la zhugs// g.yo ba'i 'gog par byas pa yis// de 'drar thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// gang mthong ba ni ngo mthong nyid// gdong gis gdong ni blta bar gyis// mi dang mi ma lha/
sogs kyi// gzugs ni pad+ma'i 'dab chu bzhin// srog chen po der shes bya ste// shi ba'i dus las nges par 'thon// aM gi yi ge yid la bya// dbugs rgyu ba yis mtshon par bya// bdag nyid kyis nihUM
yig spro// gsor ba yi ni rnal 'byor ldan// saMms a gyi yi ger 'gyur// lus la gnas par mtshon par bya// hU~M yig mchog gi dang po yis// ye shes dngos po rnams su smra la// chos kyi dbyings

rnams kyi dbus su// rnam snang mdzad kyi sgom pa 'o// bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'jig pa rnams kyis// sngags pa la ni 'bral bar bya// bye ba stong phrag grangs kyi ni// rnal 'byor ma la 'dod sbyong 'gyur// 'dod

pa rnams kyis mi 'pho ste// 'dod na bad ba rnam par spro// de tsho rnal 'byor ma mnyes nas// dngos grub thams cad star bar byed// sdug dang mi sdug rnam spyod pa// rnal 'byor ma la mi bya 'o// myur bar
stong phrag rnams kyi gzugs// rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub bya// sna tshogs du ma'i skad kyis chos// de rnams lus ris can gyis nyon// rnam snang mdzad dang ma bskyod dang// rin
chen dbang dang Aro loka/ don yod rdo rjesams dpa' dang// rgyu rdo rje lamang la sogs// shes rab pha rol phyin sogs kyi// de rnams rnal 'byor ma lasarig/ 'gro drug grol bar byang nyid dang//
bde 'gro rnams su 'jug pa po// blo ldan so sor sems can donaM// gnyis mad dngos por byed par 'gyur// mi shes nyon mongs gzhom don du// tshul 'di yang ni bsgom par bya// khams thams cad kyi

til mar ni// dogs pa med pas bya ba pa na// rnam snang sbyor bas btung bya'am// byug pa'i ng de nyid kyis bya'o// de yis bsnun nas sbyin par bya// rdo rje'i lam du rtag tu'o// rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su
'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid 'ong// gnyis pa thams cad kun sbyor las// rnal 'byor mas 'dod thar pa stsol// bcom ldan thams cung dag pa'i sku// rab grol mdzad pa 'di gsungs so//
zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/// de nas gsang chen bshad bya ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rgyas par man// rdo rjes mas bapa'i rab sbyor bas// gnas thams cad

du yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje mi phyad ye shes te// sems dpa'i snying po ston pa 'o// stong nyid snying rdzongabyar med pa// snying rje sems dpar rab tu grags// zla ba rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas// gnas rnams
bgrod pa bstan par bya// yulir las lte bar 'bab// dzAlan+d+ha rar yang dag gnas// ocan du ni kun tu spyod// ar par bza' dang btung can no/ go dA ba rir rol pa ste// rAmashAri'i rgyal dang pham//
de bi ko Tir rjes su 'dzin// mA la war rnal 'byor ma'i gtsa// kA ma rU par tshig 'grub bo// o trar mngon sum dngos grub ster// krisha ku shu dbang rnams kyi// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ kos

lar rnal 'byor dngos grub stal// ka lang kar phra mo'i dengos grub stso// lam pa ka ru rtag par 'grub// kAn+tir gsad pa'i dngos grub bo// dam la yar mthun pa 'grib// pra ta pu rir rang gi lta pa// gri
gde ba tar bkas gnang ba// lhan skyes 'pho mad so rany+dzas// gsar gling du ni rang don 'grub// nA ga rer gnas kyi dngos grub ster// sin+d+har stobs 'grub de bzhin du// ma rur 'chimad dngos grub bo/
ku lu tar rang bzhin dngos grub tu// de nyid rnal 'byor rnams la skya// rdo rjesams dpa'i rtog bsgoms nas// thams cad dngos grub 'grolor byos// gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma dbus su// khams
su gyur pa'i ro chen po// gsang ba'i mchog tu shes par bya// mchog ni lhan cig skyes par dran// dgyes pa ye shes shes bya ste// thams cad bdag 'dra yon tan gnas// rtag bzhugs gnyis med rnam
pa ste/sems can 'jig rten las ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi// rdo rjesams dpa'i bdag nyid kyis// nA nga'i dbus las yang dag byung// de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro// gnas par de ni mngon par brjod// de
ltar thams cad chog bzhin// dpa' bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya// de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag/ de ninus par rab tu bshad// skyes pa dang ni rgya bzhin pa'i// nus pa thams cad/
rab 'jug gis// dngos mong ma yin pa'i gzugs kyis// dbyangs dang phyi mo gsum spangs pa// thig le'i gzugs ni sams dpa' che// rdo rjesams dpar rab tu grags// dpa' bo thoms cad mnyam
sbyor las// rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi gtso// sgyu ma'i gnas kyi dngos grub// 'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu byed pa ste lci ba
de ltar dpa' bo gtso bo yi// las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya// nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyams dga'// thams cad gsang chen gyi gnas su// gsang chen rgyas par
bshad pa can// kun spyod cho ga bshad par bya// sngon bshang khams kyi 'du shes ni// gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin// ti shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnam can// de rnams brgyud brgyud shes par bya// dpa'

la po'ogru bzhi rnams kyi// ri'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// zlum po'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du// thig le nyid ni gzhag par bya// de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu// bskor bas ting 'dzin rdo rjer 'gyur// shar la
sogs pa rim bzhin du// rdo rje'i 'khor la sogs par 'bo// dkyil 'khor du ni lha thams cad// rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya// bdun cu drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya// nyin zhag rnams su yongs 'awa

04 byung re re yi ni srog 'gyur ba// sum cu rtsa bdun phyed bcas pa'o// nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug ni// nyin zhag la ni shes par bya// lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa// de rnams kyi dus rab tu 'jug/ rnal/
'byor de dngos bsgoms rnams la// sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu bskor// 'di rnams kun nyid dpa' bo rnams// gnas sogs nyi shu pa'i can la// thim dang longs spyod bdag byed pas// dus dang
dus tshod za bar byed// 'di lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// kun tu gnas pa bdag ma yin// rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang dpa' bo// de ni bdag dang bdag gi rim bzhin no// sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad du//

bdag dang bdag ge spyod yul med/ yade chos tsam du myang 'das pa// gzhung smra ba la bstan pa'o// de khon nyid ma rig pa yis 'jigarten rmos// de kho na nyid rnam par spangs pas dngos grub mi thob bo//

rnal 'byor rnams la rgyud rgyal du// de dang de yis mchog ye shes// 'od gsal sgyu ma bdag gis ni// sgyu ma'i 'jig rten mkhashad do// kya lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig pur bstan// lha dang lha ma
sa gsum 'dzoms pa la phyag tshol// dbang po dang ni 'jig rten pa yis ma shes ti// mchog tu bde ba chen po'i glu yis mchod par gyis// gang zhig las thams cad pa'i gzugs su bsgom par byos//
srid dang mya ngan 'das par ston pa ga la ci// sgyu ma gti mug gis ni re mor gnas// sems can theg pa da dung nyams par ga la byed// de ltar yongs su dgyes pa'i mgur// bcom ldan rang nyid kyis
[z/ ]@#// gsungs so// de nyid dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni// byang chub dus su blang bar gyis// dpal bo thams tsang mnyam sbyor las// rje sams dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rjemakha' 'gro re bzhin/

gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las// ngo kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid rgyud thams cad kyi don ston pa po gsang
chen thams cad pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste le'u lnga bcu pa'o//de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// rnam pa du ma'i 'khor gyis kyang// rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab pa'i bdag/ bcom ldan bdag po
la bstod pa// khyod ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul// dngos dang dngos med rang bzhin can// dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni gtsugs// chos rnams bstan pas tshim par 'gyur// chos dang chos min pa yi gzugs//
chos dang chos pa khyod gnyis mdu// bdag gis sprul pa'i dngos po yis// 'jig rten kun gyi'ang don can te// bdag nyid chen po ster ba po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dzug byed pa// khyod kyis dmatshog
pha bstan pa ste// gzhan min dam tshig nyid las byung// bdag gis bsod nams rjes bsgoms pas// byang chub tu ni yid bsgrubs so// ston pa mchog tu bde la bzhugs// de yis sems can don mdzad pa'i

hU~Mgi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas// nga rgyal can gyi bgegs sgrug 'gyur// khyod kyis nye bar bstan pas ni// de rnams la ni skye 'chamed// bde ba'i rgyal po nyid du rtson// byang chub kyi ni yid du bgrod// khyod dang tha
cig 'dres pa 'gyur// gong bu gcig tu gnyis du bzhugs// de ltar bstod pas rdo rje che// mchod pa bzhi ni rab ston mdzod// dkyil 'khor bdug dang gnyis med nyid// mchod pa rnams ni gnyis med byed////
phyi dang nang bdag nyid can rdzas// gnyis pa yi ni mchod par dran// bza' dang btungasogs la rol pa// gnyis med mchod pa gsum pa 'o// bzhi pa chos dang rnal 'byor dag/ 'dzin pa yini mchod pa 'o// de
lta'imachod pa la brten nas// thams cad byas pas las rgyal por// 'gyur 'o rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// gru gsum du ni mnyes bya ste// sngon du dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// lag pa g.yon pas thams cad du//

pad+ma yi ni bskor nas snod// sngags pa rnams kyis gzung bar bya// sngon du rnal 'byor ma la ni// sku grol pa yis gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor ma kun chu skyes ni// kha yase bzung nas dkrug par bya// de yi
lag par son pa'i dpal// gangasu yis kyang brog mi nus// jiltar bde bas bde ba gzung// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog mnyes bya// rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bar bya// sbyan gyi spyod pa'i ng bstan par

kyang snying rje'i mchog dbang gyur bya zhing// dbang po rnams ni mi rtag par// bsgom bya snang ba med pa yis// rang bzhin dbang du gyur par gnas// rdo rdzopar snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya nang gi bdag nyid
mchog/ stong nyid gnyis med rnal 'byor pas// dngos po thams cad spang bar bya// don dam can de nyid 'dir bya// rtag tu byang chub sems dran bya// man ngag gcig ni bsgoms pa yis// man ngag thams
datsang mtshon par bya// ji ltar sa gcig thob pa yis// sa thams cad ni 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin man ngag thams cad kyang// man ngag gcig gis 'thob par 'gyur// byis pa rnamA[4]
[】 ]dang rgan po dang// rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad du// mnyam pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pa yis ni bya ba yin// ma mnyamapa yas dngos grub 'joms// ngamyal ba la sogs ltung bar 'gyur//
rgan po yon tan kun gnas pa// de rnams mnyes pas byang chub ster// khyad par mchod pa nyid ni 'dir// byis pa rnams dang de bzhin yang// gnyis bcas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// me tog bskor ba la

sogs bya// kun tu smod pa'i ngag mi bya// 'dod dang 'dod min sbyor bral bya// ma byin par yang blang bya zhing// rtag tu srog chags gsad par bya// sems can rnams la brdzun smra zhing// ma sogs rnal 'byos
ma la bgrod 'khor lo mchod pa rgyun du bya// bza' bya lnga la sogs pa sbyin// de yi bsod nams kyis 'thob pa// dus thams cad du bgegs med dang// grub pa'i rnal 'byo'i ma mthong bas// bsam pa
gzhan ni rab tu 'jug/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rjesams dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rjemakha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro
rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal pochen po las/ bstod pa dang mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o//
!/ rgyud 'di rab tu byung pani// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan nyide mad pa thams cad spangs// sum cu bdun bdag nyid rnal 'byor// gnyis med mkha'

'gro rgya mtsho dang gnyis med// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rgyud chen po// 'dus pa'i rnam pa gzugs can te// sangs rgyus byang chub sems rnams kyi// dus thams cad du zhal na gnas// yi ge kun gyi za ma tog/ 'bum

phrag sum cu drug dang po// mkhala'agro rgya mtsho rab ngashad de// chen po chung du gsus pa 'o// ri rab kyi ni rdul tshad kyi// mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis gsungs so// mtha' yas shing ni mu med nyid// rtsod
pa'i dus kyi sa'i nang du// bcom ldan mtha' yas pas 'di gsungs// shAkya seng ge s gsungs pa'i rgyung// rnal 'byor pha rol son pa'o// nyan pa ston pa rang nyid de// 'chad po skya bo gzhan yang ngo//
legs par gsungs dang 'chad 'gyur ba'i/ de'i rang bzhin du'ang bgrod par 'gyur// bsdu ba mdzad pa sogs rnams kyis// bdag las bgrod pa de thob bo// ma mo thams cad 'dus rnams kyis//
rdo rje'i gnas rnams su bsdus so// gcig la gcig gas bzhed pa ni// gsol ba 'debs shing gsol 'debs mdzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// tshag 'di la ni mngon par dga'//
sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gro// srid pa las ni 'gro bar byos// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rjesams dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro dbazhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag
pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa la rnal 'byor dang/ ye shes dang// sdom pa dang//
bya ba dang/ de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang/ mkha 'gro rgya mtsholas 'di rnams dang mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/// dpal bal yul grub

pa'i gnas chen po yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgya gar gyi paN+Dita chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus deng sang 'grin bla mod pa/ snying rje chen pos

thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul tsan/ phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skya 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad pa/ dpal rdo rje phag mo'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul reg pa shAkya'i

sras po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong d+ha yen tan gyis mnyan cing bsgyur ba'o// phyis gang zag chos kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang
bstun te zhus gtugs legs par byas so// mkha' mnyam bde rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pas nags rgyas rnams kyi sku// des gsungs dri med stsatshog sagadul bya'i bsam dbang gis// gsung gcig gis
kyangosna tshogs ngos mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'// de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdagashing rtachor zhugs nas// g.yul ngor 'jug dus rkang gis bgrod rnams 'thad par mi brtson nam// de bzhin sngon gyi

mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brangs nas// kho bos gzhan don nus min na yang phan pa'i bsam pas bsgyur// 'di la gzhung dang bla ma rang gi blo gros skyon gyis ni// sgra don 'gal bar gyur pa bcom ldan
dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang bstan dga'i lha rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs// 'di las thob pa'i dag ba dri med cung zad dus// 'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi
go 'phang thob gyur cig/ bdag gis srol btod tsam 'di la// sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnams kyis// skang gnyis sna bas gzigs pa na// skyon du gyur snang bcos par zhu// phrag dog sgo nas ma 'phya zhing/
rjes su yi rang ba yang mdzod// rdzogs so////@#// rgyagar skad du/ shrI ma hAsaM bar da ya tan+tarA dza sa nA ma/ bod skad du dpal bde mchog sdom
pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung
dang / thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ 'phags pa dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis bskor cing/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sog
pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyud cu'i dbus su phyagan rdo rje la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang/ phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nasaM ( pus mo
@#// g.yas pa'i lhang sa la btsugs te/ lag pa thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ kye rnam pa kun mchog sdom pa yi// bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor mtshan

nyid dang// rdzogs pa yang ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan lha las mnyan par 'tshal// rlung dang ma dang chu dngas// de bzhin nam mkha' ji ltar lags// rnam pa ldani ji ltar lha// gtsobo yul drug de bzhinami/
phyi dang nang du gnas pa yi// sku gsum byin rlabs ji lta bu// lha yi skun ji ltar lags// gtso bos de bzhin lha mo gsungs// zla banyi ma ci zhig lha// lam lnga po ni ji ltar lags// lus kyi rang bzhin

ji lta bu// de bzhin rtsa yi gzugs ni ci// rtsa yi grangs kyi tshod ni du// de bzhin lus kyi gong bu ci// spus pa'i dam tshig gi ni bde// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi//
gnas lasogs pa'i bar du zhig/ ji ltar s la sogs pa 'thob// mtshan ma ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur// khyed kyi las ni bcu gnyis gang// sngags kyi bzlas pa byi ltar 'gyur// bgrang 'phreng dag ni
ltar rigs// pazlas pa'i grangs ni du zhig lags// lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ci// dkyil 'khor bri ba pu zhig mchis// sngags kyi dngos grub ci zhig lha// gzhon nu ma yi mchod pa ci// bya dang
byamananyim gang// gtso bo myos byed gtor ma ci// bdud rtsi lnga sogs ji ltar lha// lcags kyu lnga sogs ji ltar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bri ba bshad du gsol// thig gdab pa ni ji ltar 'gyur//
ltar sa ni yongs su sbyang// srung ba'i 'khor lo ltar 'gyur// slob dpon gyi ni bya ba gang// ji ltar slob ma yongs su bzung// dbang bskur ba yi grangs ni du/ bzhi pa ya ni ji ltar 'gyur// dus kyi/

nges pa ji lta bu// de bzhin 'chib bslu ba gang// dus bzhi'i ming ni ngu zhig mchis// gling bzhi pa ni ji ltar lags// dus dang dus min dngos grub ci// spyod pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi// rnal 'byor ma yi
rgyud du ni// rnal 'byor rgyud ni ji ltar 'gyur// mdo sde'i grangs ni ji lta bu// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa du// rab gnas sbyin sreg mchod sbyin dang// sngags kyi dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur// bcud kyis
len ni ji ltar lha// myos byed btung ba ji ltar 'gyur// gsang sngags jiltar 'byung 'gyur lha// sngags btu pa ni ji ltar 'gyur// tshar gcad pa ni ci zhig lha// gtso bo rjes gzung ji lta bu// bcom ldan

de nying rnams ni ci// stong pa nyid kyi snying rje gang// stong pa nyid kyirang bzhin ci// ji ltar de bzhin nyid rang bzhin// chos rnams thams cad yongs shes pa'i/ sgom pa'i mtshan nyid gtso bos gsungs//
dpal bde mchog 'byung ba'i rgyud las zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyag na rdo rje gsang ba 'byung ba 'di zhus pa legs so leg
so// de nas de'i phyir bskyod pa yi// rim pa'i sgom pa yang dag bshad// sna tshogs las kyi rang bzhin gyis// skye gnas bzhi po rnams su 'gyur// sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa dang// drod gsher dang
ni rdzus skyes rnams// ngang pa khrung khrung mabya dang// ne tso bzhad tshogs sgong skyes te// klung po ma ba lang rta// bong bu mi sogs mngal nas skyes// srin bu 'bu dang phye ma leb// nyal/
sogs pa drod gsher skyes// lha dang dmyal ba'i sems can rnams// de bzhin bar do'i srid pa dang// bskal pa dang po pa la sogs// 'di rnams rdzus skyes sems can no/ shar gyi lus 'phags ba

lang spyod// de bzhin byang gi sgra mi snyam/ glangagasum po ya mi rnams ni// longs spyod chen pos yang dag 'tsho// blun rmongs bye brag ma phyed cing// rtogamada rnam par spyod med pa'o// 'dzam bu'i gling du
legs skyes pa// las kyis par rab tu grags// legs byas nyes par byas pa'i las// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams// skya pa sngon kyi rnam smin 'dir// skye bo rnams la snang bar 'agyur/ ]
rgyags dang ser sna gdug sems rnams// g.yo sgyu mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang// chags sdang gti mug la sogs kyis// rims dang nad la sogs pas gzir// 'dzam bu gling pa'i gtso bo mchog/ yul
dbus su ni skyes pa ste// sngon gyi dge ba la bltos nas// dbang po rno 'bring rtul por 'gyur// mi ru skyes pa 'bras bu'i dam pa dang po ste// rang gi khyim nas nges 'byupard pa gnyis pa yin// rab tu

byung nas dge ba bsgrub pa gsum pa ste// rtse gcig yid ni thob par gyur pa bzhi par gsungs// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin// mi rnams kyis rab mi shes te// thog med dus kyi nyon mongasakyi// bag chags
rab tu bsags byas pas// de phyir sngon byas las kyis ni// skye dang 'chi ba yang dag 'byung// tshogs pa ma red de srid du// zhag bdun bar do'i srid par gnas// srid pa bar do'i sems can ni// 'gren

po'i bgrod pa ji bzhin du// 'di ltar las kyi zhags pa yis// 'gro ba drug tu rab tu skye// pha ma'i kun tu sbyor sogs ni// srid pa'i skye bos mthong gyur nas// rta [“] zhon bzhin rnamashes ni// rlung gi bzhon
pa zhon nas su// skad cig thang cig nyid la ni// shin tu myur bar 'ongs gyur nas// shin tu dga' dang bcas stobs kyis// kha yi lam nas 'jug par 'gyur// rtsa ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// rab
bskul de yi skad cig la// A li kA li zhu byas pas// mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob// khu ba khrag de'i dbus su ni// thig le'i gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// dang po'i rnam par nur nur po/ mer
mar po ni gnyis pa yin// ltar ltar por skyes gsum pa ste// de bzhin bzhi pa gor gor po// rlung rnams kyis ni bsgul tsam gyis// sha ya rnam pa lta bur 'gyur// zla ba lnga gyur sa bon las// yan
lag lnga ni rab tu skye// zla ba bdun na sgra dang// sen mo rtags ni skyo bar 'gyur// zla ba brgyad na dbang po dang// lus kyi yan lag 'byung bar 'gyur// zla ba dgun yang dag rdzogs// zla ba bcu na
sams dang ldan// nur nur rang bzhinami bskyod pa// mar mar po ni rin chen 'byung// 'od dpag med mgon ltar ltar po// gor gor po ni don yod grub// mkhrang 'gyur rnam par snang mdzod de// rnam pa/
lngar nibastan pa yin// dri mu khrag ni mi bskyod pa// sa bon rang bzhin 'od dpag mad// gong bu rin chen 'byung ldan te// regacig 'dres pa rnam snang bzhugs// skye gnas dbus/
bya su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas// g.yon na khu ba zhes bshad de// g.yas na de bzhin khrag yin no// de dag gcig tu 'dus gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin///
las kyi sa bon dbang thob pas// rlung gis yang dag bsgyur nas gu// chos kyi 'byung gnas sgo ru ni// gdong na nges par phyogs par 'gyur// dku g.yos su ni brten nas su// tsog pur mngon par
tsa phyogs te gnas// dku g.yon yang dag brten nas ni// shes rab ltar ni mngon phyogs 'gyur// mkhas pas sa bon lhung ba'i rim// dus kyi skad cig yang dag mtshon// g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba
gang thams cad du ni skyes bur 'gyur// g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang// nges par bud mang rnams su 'gyur// gnyis ka'i dbus rgyu'i sa bon gang// rtag tu ma ning 'gyur ba'o// chu khams pha yil
shes par bya// ma yi khams ni ma yi 'o// pags pa sha dang khrag rnams ni// ma las skyes shes bshad pa ste// nus pa rkang dang khu bo rnams// las skyes shes bshad pa yin// drug po 'di
dag bsdus pa'i lus// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang// 'du byed rnam shes de bzhin te// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin du// phung po nges par smyu ba yin// srid
[%]pa bskyed pa'irim shes pas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir// 'di ni phung po yongs mkhyen pa'i// de nyid gsungs pa rnams kyis bshad// 'di ni bskyod pa'i rim pa nges par bstan pa'i
rim par dbye ba ste gnyis pa'o// de nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa ni// yang dag rab tu bshad par bya/
lus kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim bsgrubs pas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs so// dbang po dman pas bskyed rim gyi
dkyil 'khor sgom zhing bsam par bya// dbang po rnon pos skad cig ni// rnam pas sams tsam dkyil 'khor bsam// skad cig rnam pa rnal 'byor gyis// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgoms pani//
khams gsum gzhal yas khang bdag nyid// srog chags rnams ni dekyil 'khor pa// de dbus skad cig rnam pa yis// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnal 'byor pa'o// o~M A/hU~Mgi sngags kyis ni// sku
gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te// mtho ris sa stangs 'og tu// skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur// skad cig rnam pas rnal 'byor te// skad cig rnam pas la/sang sngags 'don// dbang po kun dang

mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde ba mchog/ khams bzhi pa dang phung po lnga// de bzhin yul drug bdaganyid ni// khrag 'thung lha mo'i ye shes te// de la tha dad ma brtag go/ dkyil 'khor de bzhin
nyid rgyus btab// de bzhin mkha' mnyam stong pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin nyid bdag nyid// thabs ni snying rje'i stobs yin te// zung du 'jug pa rnam rtog bral// dkyil 'khor snying
bo mchog yin no// rnam par m rtog sbyor bsams kyang// de tshe mi rtog bsam ma khyab// de yang rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ bde ba'i dbang po rnam pa med// de nyid dngos dang dngos min bdag/ rtag tu srid
pas 'byung bar mdzad// sna tshogs smos pa'i rtog pa med// rtag tu 'byung ba bde ba che// skya bamed pa'i rang bzhin gyis// de las skyob yang dag 'byung// bems po min phyir bangag de rig/ mishes rnam
par mi mthong bas// gzugs med gang du'ang ma gnas shing// 'gyur ba med cing brtan pa'o// kun rdzob sgyu pa 'byung bas na// chad pa min phyir dngos mang man// lhan cig skyes dga' rang dngos su/
chos rnams thams cad lhan cig skyes// bdag byin brlabs pa rang byung ba// mi shigs 'jig pa med pa ste// skya ba mad pa'i re myong bas// sgom pa yang ni de nyid de// stong nyid sosor rtogs pas/
bsam gtan shesarab tu yang 'gyur// chos kun yongs su shes pa yi// sgom pa de nyid sgam mad pa'o// rdzogs pa'i byang chub bde ba che// phyag rgya chen po mchog de bzhin// de sheng chos la 'jug
pa'i phyir// de rnams dbye bas rab bstan pa// bla ma dam pa'i man ngag gis// gsal bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// e waM yi ge la rab gnas// sku dang gsung dang
0/thugs kyi las// rnam kun mchog gi sdom pa 'o// sdom pa byang chub bde mchog ste// bltar med brjod du med pa go/ sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba// 'dus pa chen po'i mchog yin te// bdag byin
rlab pa'i rim pa 'di// bla ma'i drin gyis gsal bar 'gyur// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i nges par bstanang rim par phye bas gsum pa'o//
mtshan nyid yang dag bshad par bya// dngos po dag ni ma lus gang// de ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin te// sa de la ni dngos po rten// mos ni thams cad 'tshod par byed// chu yis 'ju bar byed pa ste// rlung
gis lhan cig skyod par byed// nam mkha' yul gyis stong par gnas// de'an thams cad de las skyes// gang du gcig ni gnas pa der// bzhi po kun kyang nye bar gnas// rtswa shing ljon pa 'khri shing
sogs// bems po lta bu'i rnam shes tsam// gang dag 'gro drugasems can rnams// rnam shes bcas pa lta bur gnas// de ltar srid pa'i dngos po kum/ blo dpaldan pas shes par bya// sems can
rnams ni 'chi ba// yan lag nying lag thams cad kyi// rlung ni thams cad skyod par 'gyur// skad cig de la ma drod 'dor/ chu ni rtag tu bskams gyur nas// de nas tshor ba mad par 'gyur// lus la
sogs pa'i sa khams kyi// srab nyid tsam gnas par 'gyur// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba dag/ thams cad du ni 'byung bar 'gro// lha dang lha min mi rnams ni// 'byung ba med par skye mi 'gyur// lha yaM
'jig rten skyong la sogs// thams cad lani lhan cig gnas// rig byed grub mtha' thams cad kyis// rtag tu 'dod cing sgom pa ste// gang phyir thams cang kun tu 'gro// sa
stobs skyes pa kun la gnas// 'byung ba bzhi po gtso bo mchog/ bstan bcos kun las yang dag ngashad// rlung ni srog tu yang dag blta// mni 'tsho ba'i mtshan nyid de// chu ni bdud rtsi'i ngo bo nyid//
sa ni zhing tsam nyid du gnas// de la rtag tu gnas pa'i lha// rnam shes mchog gi dbang phyug ste// lha lnga yi ni rnam pa ru// rnam shes de ni yongs su gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang/ de
bzhin 'du byeng rnam par shes// me long lta bu mnyamanyid dang// so sor kun tu rtog pa dang// de bzhin bya ba grub pa dang// chos dbyis shin tu rnam dag ste// ye shes 'di dag rab tu gnas// ma

snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung// 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// de bzhin mi bskyod pa nyid de// rnam ltar ro gcig rdzogs byang chub// gzugs drang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ ro dang reg bya tshes de bzhin/
yul drug tu ni shes bya ste/ de'adi dag rnam par dag par bshad// khams ni bco brgyad shes bya ste// de dag phung po'i rang bzhin nyid// yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob bya'i
phyang/ mi la sogs pa bsgom bya ste// mig gi dbang po'i rnam shes ni// thugs kyi rdo rje'i rnam 'phrul yin// ngobo nying gsum rnam dag don// 'od gsal ba ya go 'phang 'gyur// sgra dang rna ba rnam

shes ni// dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid// sna dang dri dang rnam shes kyang// de bzhin rnam dgashes par bya// ro dang lce dang rnam shes ni// don dmanyid du rnam par drag/ lus dang reg bya rnam shes kyang//
sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bor rgyas// yade dang chos dang yi rnam shes// snying po nyid du rnam par dag/ rnam shes drugani kun gzhi ru// 'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa yin// 'od gsalab yi go 'phang thob// he
ka dpal yang dag gnas// yul dang yul can sbyor ba yis// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang 'gyur// rnam pa kun gyi mchog gnas pas// yulani rnam dag shes par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge
'dun te// gcig la de bzhin gsum du brtags// skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum// sku gsum rnam par grol ba gsum// zhal gsum yig gsum lha gsum ste// khams gsum pa yirang
bzhin nyid// dkyil 'khor gsum dang rnal 'byor gsum// lam gsum du ni bstan pa ste// dam tshig gsum dang dge ba gsum// de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs// shes rab dang ni thabs nyid dang//
de yi sbyor ba gsum pa ste// chos kyi 'byung gnas rang bzhin gyis// ji ltar gsang gsum mthong ba dang// 'khor gsum mi dmigs sbyor ba yis// sngags gsum gyi ni rang nying nyid// phyi dang nang gi bdag

nyid kyi// rtsa gsum gyi nibang gi dngos// phyi rol 'jig rten pa yi chos// lha la sogs pa'i bdaganyidenang// phyi nang dag pa nyid kyi phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni sangs rgyas thob// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang
bzhinadu// lhan mngon sum dmigs par bya// rnam pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin// lha mor yongs su brtag par bya// dad pa'i lha yi rang bzhin du// rdo=
sams dar ba rnam par bzhugs// gnas dang zhing la sogs pa'i brda// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa// de bzhin gnyis med mnyam sbyor la// lha rnams yang dag 'phro ba ste//
tsha tshad med lha ni 'phro pa las// dkyil 'kher tshad tsana rnam par brtag/ lha yi rnal 'byor bsam mi khyab/ sangs rgyas pa'ol pa'i d bsam mi khyab// mkha' 'gro dpa'i gzugs kyis ni// dbu

kad pa la yang dag sbyor// de dag mi byed ngo bo nyid// bsgom par nga yis bshad pa yane// de dag thams cad gzhisamed thob// gzung dang 'dzin dang rnam bral ba// rags pa sgra zhes bshad pa ste/ phra ba sems

kyi radang zhina'agyur// bsam dang bral ba'i de nyid ni// go 'phang mchog ces yongs su grags// 'din 'byung ba bzhi dang/ rnam pa lnga dang/ yul drug lha'i rnam par dag pa rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o//
de nas zla ba nyi ma yi// rab tu grub yang dag bshad// g.yas dang g.yon du sbyor ba yis// rim pa ji bzhin rgyu ba ste// g.yon du rkan nas bzung nas ni// lta ba'i dkyil 'khor bar
'jug pa'i// zla ba'i rtsa na 'og bltas par// A li zla bar yang dag 'bab// g.yas su lte ba nas bzung nas/ ka gyi gnas su rab 'jug pa'i// nyi ma'i rtsa ni stong gnas te// kA la te mar rtag tu
ba 'a/ khabab/ sba yi sgo na gnyis po nas// rtsa gnyis rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rtsa g.yon 'jug pa'i lam yin te// g.yas par 'byung pa'i lam yin no// zhishar nas brtsams ji srid de// nub/
kyi bar ni rten mo ste// nub pa nas brtsams ji srid de// shar ba'i bar ni mtshan mor 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan mo zhag yin te// mal rtse thun zhes brjod pa yin// thun bzhi
nyin mor shes bya ste// de bzhin mtshan mo'ang thun bzhi pale// zhag gcig la ni 'pho ba yi// yan lag bcu drug rnams yin te// thun ni phyadapyad rtag tu rlung// sna
yi bu ram yang dag rgyud/ yarango'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum gyi thun phyod 'a// zla ba'i rlung ni rgyu ba ste// de nas zhag gsum rima'i rlud// go rims 'dis ni ji
srid du/ yar tshes bco lnga'i bar du nga// mar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum du snga dro ni// nyi ma'i da du grags pa rgyu// de bzhin tshos ni bco lnga'i bar// thunar yi ni bzhi cha

rnams// chu tshod du ni brjod pas nai// nyin zhag gcig la rtsa rnams zhi// sum cu rtsa gat+tis shes bar bya// nyin zhag gcig la dbyug gu yi// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshad kyis ni// rtsa dang chu tshad phyed dbyug gu//
thun gyi bar cha zhes su bshad// sna sgo drung na 'byung 'jug la// dbugs gcig tun rab tu grags// rlung gi sbyor ba la mkhas pas// dbugs drug srog shes par bya// srog ni lnga bcu tham pa dang//
dbugs gsum rkang pa'i ng de dang ldan// nyimo byang du rgyu dus kyi// nyim dang po'i dbyug gu yi// nyi ma lhar ni rgyu dus kyi// mtshan mo yang ni de bzhin 'gyur// dbyug gu'i re 'phal 'grib/

ni dus kyi dbye bas shes par bya// dbugs ni drag po bzhi char bcas// 'pho ba so so'i 'phal 'grib yin// dbugs kyi gsum cha de'i bzhi chagi/ drug chas nyi ma re lo 'gyur// thun ni phyud spyod rgyu ba las/

tshaphyin ci log tu 'phos gyur na// rtsod pa la sogs nges 'gyur bas// mkhas pas 'di dag yang dag brtag/ zhim gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi// lnga dang drug tu gang tsho rlung// phyin ci log tu rtag rgyun// da

mo rtsod pa chen por 'gyur// zla phyed rtag tu leg par rgyu// nad ni chen po yang dag 'byung// zla ba gcig tu log par rgyu// snying sdug gnyen ni brlag par 'gyur// phyed dang gnyis su log par rgyu// zla ba drug na/

'chi bar 'gyur// thunamong dus su shes par bya// gzhan yang khyad par bshad bya ste// mnyam po bdun du nyim song// gang tshe skya pa'i nyi zla ba// de tsho rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus// 'chi ba'i nges pa'i dus yin no// mi

ni khyim gang las smyos pa// gang zhig gzhan yang bdun de'i phyir// der ni nyi ma mnyam bdun song// mnyam po bdun zhes bya bar bshad// nyima'i lam nas thams cad du// rlung ni rtag tu sgrub dag/ rgyun mi

chad par yang dang yang// mkhas pas dus ni mtshon par bya// dus kyi skad cig gang la rlung// bgrod pa gzhan du 'jug 'gyur na// dus de'i skad cig rdzogs par na// 'chi 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// nyi phyed

bas/ ngang por byas te nyi ma rdzogs dang de bzhin nyin zhag gcig gi bar// de las zhag gnyis zhag gsum dang ni de bzhin zhag ni bzhi yi bar dag tu// rlung ni gang zhig rtsa la brten te g.yasapa in pa'i ma'i

lam nas rgyu// de las sa dang nyam phyogs dang bkrashis drug bzhi 'di dag shes par bya// lnga nas nyi shu rtsa ltar nyin zhag 'di dag lta lngar sngal bas bgrod par 'gyur// de lasar 'os sbol bas bcu ni sum

'gyur ji srid gsum gyis lhag pa'i bar// de las rgyas pa'i dus su gsum mig zla ba'i lo dang drug gsum zung zla'i zla// lhag ma chos dang phyogs mnga' yon tan zung dang zla ba'i zhag chu 'tshob yin// re'u

mig sum cu bdun bcus pa'i// 'khor lo rim gsum bris nas ni// tshe dang srog gi rlung drag rdung// nyin zhag mtshan ma rim bzhin bri// zhag lnga nas nii nyi shu lnga// bar bar gyi ni nyin zhag la// grangs ni bcu

drug ma bshang gang// de rnams tshangs par brjod par bya// zhag ni drug bdun brgyad dgu yi// rim pas gal te rlung rgyun// yon tan ldan yang nyin zhag ni// rdor bzhis ma tshang lagasum nalo// drag po nyin ma

yan lag sa'ade zhagani rim pas rgyun ni// yon tan ldan pa'i ng nyin zhag ni// nyer bzhis ma tshang le gnyis ma'o// zhig ni bcu drug de bzhin du// bcu bdun dang ni bco brgyad dang// bcu dgu yi ni rim pa yis

rlung rgyu yon tan can yang zhag/ bcu gnyis nyis 'gyur ma tshang pa'i// lo gcig na ni skyabs med gang// de ni gshin rje'i grong khyer du// thetshom med par 'gro bar 'gyur// nyim te/ shu gcig gnyis gsum//
nyer bzhi'i rim pas rlung rgyun// yon tan ldan pa'i ng zhag drug ni// ma tshang zla ba drug na 'chi// re'u mig sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i// rim gnyis 'khor la bris nas ni// der ni tshe yang spyi
[】 ]yan lag rlung// grangs kyi mtshan ma rim bzhin bri// 'chi ba'i rtags ni 'di dag kun// rnam pa thams cad shes byas nas// blo ldan 'chib bslu ba yis// gal te brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod// rtsan yang
dag sbyangs byas pas// de srid rlung ni sbyangs 'gyur te// so so'i rim bzhin rnal 'byor pas// yang dang yang du mnan par bya// g.yon pa'i bu gar bcug nas ni// rtsa ni bsdams nas mnan bya zhing// de
pa bzhin du ni g.yas par rlung// bkug ste dal bus mnan par bya// sems can rnams kyi zhag gcig la// rgyuba'i dbugs kyi gras kyi tshul// brgya phrag drug gis lhag pa yi// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig
go/ 4dbang chen gyis ni rgyal srid de// chusani don rnams yang dag 'byung// ma yi rlung ni rnamasgrubs// bkres skom dub dang sdug bsngal nad// bya ba thams cad nyams 'gyur zhes// rdo rje 'dzin ma
mchog gis gsus// rlung gis rtsod dang skyo dang rmos// nor nyams nyon mongs par byed// dbang chen nor dang 'bru la sogs// rAd pa thob dang sdud byed pa'o// chu yi rlung ni rnamasgrubs// 'dod pa'i
dngos grub kun byed pas// de yi sbyor ba mchog gtso bor// rdo rje sams dpas gong gsungs pa'o// rlung ni bcom ldan ha ru ka'i// rang bzhin nyid de gsum du 'gyur// g.yon pa shes rab rang bzhin te//
g.yas pa snying rje'i bdag nyid do// gnyis po mi phyed sbyor yang// gnyis ka nas nii rnam par rgyu// de bas de nyid reg pas der// dge mi dge sogs shes par bya// dug sogs gzhom dung lhag ma ni// bkra/
shis dpal ni bskyed pa la// shes rab bdag nyid rab tu bsngags// rab tu dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs// g.yul bsham rol rtsed ston mo dang// gcad pa dang ni dbug pa dang// bsreg dang btso ba'i
las la ni// snying rje'i bdag nyid rab tu bsngags// gzhan yang gnyis bdag rdo rje can// the tsom 'gyur ba shes bya ste// dge dang mi dag nges med par// rlung rig pas ni 'dir mtshon bya// mgon po ci
sta A lir rgyu// 'ga' zhig kAl gnas 'dri 'am// kAli'i rgyul A lare gnas// de yi 'dod don nyams par 'gyur// gang nas mgon po de rgyu ba// der gnas 'ga' zhig 'dri byed na// de yi sngon
kun yang dag 'grub// gnyis kar gnas las the tshom 'gyur// rlung ga bdag nyid kyis mgon po'i// sku gsum por yang shes par bya// 'jug pa chos kyi sku yin te// gnas pa longs spyod rdzogs
pa'i sku// 'byung ba sprul pa'i sku zhes bshad// 'di dag skun gsum por bzheng// 'dri ba po'am rang gi'ang rung// chos skus thams cad dge bas// longs spyod rdzogs pa the tshom 'gyur// sprul pas
'thab mor ston pa 'o// rnal 'byor pa yi srog rtsol ni// sangs rgyas lnga ya ngo bor gnas// g.yon dang g.yas kyi gnas gang na// rim pa jibazhin rnam par rgyu// g.yas nas rnam par sgruba'i 'od// mi yi
dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// nas kyi ma tog lta bu'i mdog/ de ni 'od dpag med pa'i lha// g.yon nas rnam par sgruba'i 'od// rtag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// kha dog ljang ku ltar snang ba//

[D ]lha ni don yod mchog yin no// gnyis ka nas na rgyu ba'i 'od// gser gyi 'od ltar snang ba ste// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi ni rlung// rtag tu rin chen 'byung ldan rgyu// 'og nas dal bar rab rgyu bas// kun da
zla ba lta bur dkar// chu yi dkyil 'khor chub ste// 'od chen rdo rje mgon po 'o// lus kun la ni rjes 'gro'i rlung// sems kun rab tu 'jug pyad pa// mgon po rnam par snang mdzad ni// 'byung bar rab
tu grags pa yin// rnal 'byor ma ni mnyam bzhag pas// 'jug pa'i rlung na bgrang bar bya// jisrid 'bum la sogs pa'i grangs// sgra dang bral ba rtag tu bzla// sgrub pos sgra dang bral bar no// 'bum

a bzlas yongs su rdzogs pan// tshanyams pa yang lo lnga ru// 'tsho bar 'dir ni the tsom med// rtag tu nang par langs nas rlung// stong phrag gcig tu bgrang bya ste// de bas rlung gi rnal 'byor la// rtag tu
mnyam gzhag gnas par bya// yang na bum pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rtag tu 'chi bdag las rgyal bya// bdag nyid rig pas rkang mthil ba// kun tu rlung gis dgang bya ste// bum pa can la brten byas
nas dbye ba gsum gyis gzhom par bshad// tha ma sum cu rtsa drug tsam// de yi nyis 'gyur 'bring de bzhin// sum 'gyur chen por shes bya ste// bum pa can des rgyal bar bya// bum pa can lngar shes
byas nas// bdag nyid lamo krung bcas te// lag pa lan gsum mnyes nas ni// de nas lan drug sa gol brdab// ji srid sum cu rtsa drug par// de srid bum pa can gyis byas// sum 'gyur chen
pos gzhom pa ni// brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pas so// brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod pas ni// brtson pas de nyid kyis rgyal bya// bum pa'i sbyor bas rgyal bas na// 'chi bdag las ni ring du 'jug/ bum pa
can ni shes byas nas// 'gog la brtan par gnas pa na// de la bskal pa stong du yang// 'chi bdag nye bar 'ong mi 'gyur// snying gi chu skyes dbus son rlung// hU~Myig dkar po'i rnam par ni// gang
gis mnyam par bzhag bsams na// de la yul sogs dmigs mi 'gyur// rlung gis 'khor ba'i steng du 'gro// mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og tu bgrod// snying ka yi ni chu skyes la// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i/

gnas// steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba'i rlung// kha sbyar dun yid kyis byas// de yi sbyor bas goms byed na// des nibastan pa'i go 'phang 'thob// rlung gi rnal 'byor mi shes pa 'am// gang zhig shes kyang ma byed

pa de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshogs// du mas gtsos pa'i srin bu 'gyur// gang zhig 'gro dang 'ong ba'i rlung// blo dang ldan pas rtag bya ste// rlung gis thams cad byin gyis brlabs// rlung ni kun tu/
'gro 'gyur ba'o/ 'dini zla ba dang nyi ma'i man ngag gi rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o//de nas lam lnga bzang po mchog/ rnam par nges pa'i rab bshad bya// bdag gzhan don ni yun
tshogs pa'i// sgrub pos dge dang mi dge brtag/ me dang rlung ninyid dag dang// de bzhin dbang chen dang ni chu'i// dkyil 'khor yang dag sgrub las// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ de

bzhin gsad du bskrad pa yi// mtshan nyid mkhas pas brtag par bya// de yi sbyor ba mi shes pa// de ni ngal ba don mang 'gyur// mos ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste// rlung gis nor rnams nyams par 'gyur// dbang
