ba b+hiyi rnam pa nyid dang yang// de la hU~Mni brjod par bya// zla mtshan dus su khrag bcas pa/ khu ba kha yis bzung bar bya// bdag nyid dang ni b+ha ga la// me tog dri yis mchod par bya// gal to
sgrub po sgrub 'dod na// de nyid la na bzos pa// pho rje drag mo de bzhin gcig/ de bzhin rdo rje gzugs bar n nyid// gsum pa rdo rje 'dod chags ma// bzhi pa rdo rje zhal ma// lnga ba rdo rje gnod spyi
ma drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// bdun pa sgra yi rdo rjem// de bzhin brgyad pa rdo'i sa// gnyis pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o// 'khor sgrub pa'i khyad par gyi//

tsho mi pa ji bzhin rje rje nyon// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni// bsrung dang de bzhin mngon spyod nyid// re'u mig dgu sogs 'khor lo yi// phyi rol mu khyud nyid du bya// 'khor lo las kyi kha phyog/
thogs// mkhas pas rnam par bsgom par bya// o re tut+ta re tu re swAhA/'di yi sa bon thams cad kyi// phyag 'tshalasreg blug tha mni// dngumasuming nasbyar bar bya// bsrung ba'i tshig
kyang rnam par bya// mnyam nyid yegs stong pas ni// bdag nyid kyi nagalcogs su bya// mnyam nyid thams cad rig pa'i gnas// bsrung ba'i 'khor losgyur bar bya// bsrungab ye shis tsamargyu
bsgog/ 'jigs pa thams cad rang du byed// soms can dngos po med na ni// rnal 'byor dngos po bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i gdun ni bsam par bya/
dngos grub thams cad rab ster ma// bdag gi lus ni bsgom par bya// oM tA res/ mgo bo la// oM du ru swA hA/mig dug la'o// u0f00 tut+tar sA hA/ mig dag la'o// u0f00 tA reswA hA/ sna dag
la'o// o tu'i sAnA/ rna ba dag lago/ o ris h+pha/ lce lag/ oM tur nisAhA/ snying kar 'o// yan lag drug ni rtag tu bzung// 'phags ma sgro'am bsam par bya// phyag gnyis saMma'i dbas
skyil mo krung// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// kun l skyabs spyi 'gang dang// g.yon pa ud+ma lta bu mchog/ sngags kyirgyal pos bskul ba yis// lha rnams thams cad bsgrub bar@
mo ku ru kul+lagyisA hU/ las thams cad pa'i sdugs so// dgradang rgyal bos bcings pa dang// 'gro ba'i shin tu'ajigs pa'i dug/ yan lag rams nosna tshogs dang// dug sogs dus min 'chi ba yi

'jags ba'i gnas ni gang gang lags// de dang de la rab sbyar bya// shes rab chung ba blo ldan par// bsrung ba bres nas gzung bar bya// bsrungs bzang bo 'di nyid ni// 'jigs pa thams cad du ni smras// bsrung ba
'di nithams cad las/ rnal 'byor de nyid gong na med// 'bar ba'i 'od zer lta bu yi// nyi ma'i dkyil bakhor bsams nas ni// du yi dbus su hU~Mnyid ni// kha dog dmar po lta bu'i 'od// de nas bdag nyid
bsam par bya// zhal gcig ma la phyug bzhin// mda' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma// ut+pal dang lcags kyu badzan/ 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum bodadang dbyer/
bdun phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams// khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid// bye bas phyugs dang gnod sbyin sogs// 'bum phrag bdun gyis lham yin// 'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid//
brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid// 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa 'di// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// mnyam nyid gzugs su bsams nas ni// khams gsum gyi narang bzhin las// ma
gsungs mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// gong du gsus bas bsgrub par bya// shes rab 'bar ba'i las rnams na// 'di yi 'khor lo bsgom par bya// oM pra dzI ma hA pra dzA hU~MA/ das po'i ngos
pa'i/ bsgom par bya// 'od zer 'bar ba du ma yi// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ shes rab bdag nyid rnam par sprul// phyag gnyis sems dang 'i skyil mo krung// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par
la na// kha dog dkar mo 'od gsal ma// shes rab bdag nyid gzung bar bya// 'di yi sa bon bzlog nas ni// shes dzeb 'dab ma lta bu 'phel// gu ba kham blon dam pa la// gnas rab 'phel ba'i
rnal 'byor go/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// yi ge de la dgod par bya// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas pa// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// zhi ba'i bakhor lo dril bu ban// thod nga
00 dngani zhags pa nyid// de bzhina' bo'aba' ba phreng 'khrug par// kun tunam bar stsolor bya// brjes ni rnal 'byor ma pas ni// rin chen 'byung gnas bsgom babya// btso ma gser gyi mdog lta bu/
sumangug mo'apo gzi brjid che// thodapa'i gdan gyi dbus bzhugs pa// zhal gcig phra la phyag bzhi pa// dang ba po rin chen lcag kyu 'dzin// thod pa de bzhin zhags pa nyid// 'di ni rnal 'byo'ami
pas ni// pad+ma rnordzo'achang bu bsgom// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i 'od// dpa' bomada' dang gzhu 'dzinacing// thod pa'i ba dan la yang dag bzhugs// pa d+mazhags pa 'dzin
bad// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// 'dis nim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// don yod phyag na ral gri 'dzin// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus bzhugs pa// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa//
thodo ba rdo dril bu dang// lcags kyudag ni g.yas pa 'jug/ ba cha rma ltar ljang ku ste// rgyan rnams kyisani rnam par brgyan// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus sonapa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam
par rgyug/ drayi nangasonas bonani// hU~M lasaspyan gyi dbub/su ni// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas pas// phyag ni brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo'i lag pa mda' dang gzhu// de bzhin
dordzadril bu nyid// zhags pa ral gri thod pa nyido// spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis yang dag gang// do shal dnganirkang gdub brgyas// kha dog dkar mo shin tumad+d+haM/
Na0 bya@#// de bzhin thod pa'i dbu rgyananyid// nam mkha'i khams kyidabus son pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yos gang ba// de yi nang sen bsam par bya// hU~M lasam ma kA yi dbyibs/
thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par// kha dog sngonamo'abar chen mo// spyan gsum pa la zhal gcig ma// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// mda' dang gzhu ni'adzin pa nyid// lcags chu dnganil

gri nyid// zhags pa rodzade bzhin du// dril bu dang ni thod pa'o// 'khor lo ni rgan pad+ma dang// kha TaM ga dang btsuganyis ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// rgyan rnams kun gyisa rnam par blun
ts+tsa b+ha ga'i dbus su yoTas gang ba'i// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// der ni hini bsam bya zhing// gos dkar zhes bya rnam par sgom// thod pa'i gdan gyi dbus gnas par// kha dogamatsho
'bar chan ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis yongs gang ba/ phyag brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// gzhu dung mda' ni ba dzin pa dang// pany+tsa'i lag par ral gri dang// thod pa rdo rje dril bu dang//
zhags pa de bzhin rin chen nyid// do shal dang ni rkang gdub sgra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor pas ni 'di bsgoman// myur du sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur/ g.yam
dbus su yo jas gang ba'i// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom bar bye// de yi nang na hU~M nyid ni// sgrol ma'i dbyibs su bsam pa spyi/ thod pa 'i gdan gyi dbus gnas pa'i// phyag ni brgyud kyis
[d rnam par brgyan// ral gri phyagan chags bcasam// uT+Thal de bzhin lcags kyu dang// thod pa khrag gis gang ba dang// zhag pa de bzhin 'khor lo dang// gzhu dang mda' 'dzin pa nyid// zhalagacig/
ma ni yang dag bye// kha dog ljang ku pa na gsum m// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms pas// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam par 'gyur// rgyud thams cad kyi
gleng gzhi'i gsang ba dpal yang dgo par sbyor ba byung ba'i rortag pa'i rgyal po bganyis pa'o///ha ru ka dang drag medam// bskyed pa'i sgrub dang de bzhin no// gang gis
gdug pa drag po yi// sems can 'ju labar 'gyur ba yi// mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro mas mdzad pa'i// de dag thams cad khyod la bshad// rje rdza sems dang 'gyur nas kyang// rtsiwa ting rdo dung ba//
'bar ba'i 'phrang 'khrugs drag po no// kun tu rnam par spro bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sa bon 'phreng ba da nas dgod// de nas rdordzachags chen las// rig ma
bcas pa khu bar gyur// sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las// de nas rig mas bsal par bya// rje btsunas nig snga'i yid bzhengs shag/ puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs// stong ba'i rang bzhin nyid
spongasal// bdag la bde chen spyor bzhi mdzad// khyod med nan bdag 'gum bos// kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid u0fb3ngas la// ni 'dama'abras grub par mdzod//
dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyerang// stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci// khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas// gdol pa mo bdag zhu ba bgyid// bdag gakhyod kyi thugs
tshalagyi// mig ba shul mkhyab pa khyod bzhengs shig/ g.yungamo bdag nyid dran nyams pas// sangarje rgyun chadam mdzad cig/ oM dang hU~M las rdo rje ma// khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas
ni zhabasa rnams sa la brdab pa dang/ lhadalhamin bsdig pa mdzad// khaM yaM hUM yaM 2tso laM khaM/ 'di yas so bon dbyung bar bya// bdag po dga' ma'i sa bon las// maM hUM sngon po 'bar ba brtsig
pas// mtsho'i 'khor lo grangasams dga'// gtso bo 'di ltar bsgom par bya// zhal brgyud pa la zhabs zhi ba// phyag na bcu drug dag gis brgyan// bdudabazhi mnyam pas mnan pa nyid
'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa po// sgrog cing dpa' bo mi sdug ba// rgod cing drag shul la rdzogs su rung// snying rje dram dang zhi bam/gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid// mgo yi 'phreng bsadoshal
mdzad// nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor gnas// kha dog gonag pa 'jigs pa 'o// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// nyid kyi zhal nas rgyu spro zhing// thal bas sku la byugs pa nyid// bdag med
lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing// dag pa gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas// dba' rlabs med pa'i 'ong bzhinatsan// rtsa ba'i gzhal mo bzhad tsang gnag/ g.yos po'i zhal ni kun rdar mtshungu/
g.yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa// steng ma'i zhal ni rnam par gtsigs// spyan ni ti ku rtsa bzhis che// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// rjetshe ral gri 'dzinApa dang// mda'
dang de bzhin 'khor lonyid// de bzhin gshor dung dbyibapa dang/ rtse gsum pa dang lcags kyu nyid// g.yon pa 'dril bu pad+mar bcas// gzhu dung kha TaMg myur zhing// thod pa dang
ni rin chen nyid// sdigs mdzubazhugu pa de bzhinano// sas rgyus snganagyi 'od zer ro// kun rnam par spro bar bya/ da ltar cho ga sna tshog sakyis// dzokar mo la sogs de rnams
dgod// dkar mo kha dog dkar mo ste// gzhu dang madrang ni 'gongasame mchog/ thod pa khrag gis bkang dra dang// de bzhin rdo rje gri gug nyid// chom rkum ma ni kha dog dmar// 'khor
la lcags kyu 'dzin mar brjod// thod pa dang ni cang dbunyid// gsal ba'i gzugs can dgod par bya/mos byed m nasku mdog gnag/ de bzhin thod pa dang ni gshor// sa la rmog pa 'di
drangani// g.yos pa rtsa gsum 'phyarab gro/ ro langs ma ni dkar ser mtshungs// phyag dag nan chung dang chu// ral gri dang nithod nyid/ mdzes ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya// puk+ka
si na ba dog sor// dpag bsam shing gi lcag ma dang// sha yis gang ba'i thod pa dang// rin chen dang ni mchog sbyin nyid// gdol pa mo ni sngomado mtshungs// dbazhin rlung gi gos ba na ma//
ka/ gzhand dug gis thod pa dag/ de bzhinapad+madakar bo nyid// g.yu'agosde dang dkar ba'i mdog/ rdod ni lcags kyu 'dzin// g.yon bas thod pa 'dzin pa ste// gzhan pas lhung/
me gi gosa'adzinam// gsam ni ljangasematshus// rdoN+Dim thab dag lta'i lag/ thod pa tshal bus yongs gang zagi/ g.yas pa mi 'jigs sbyin byed ma// sa khrodamanadakamadog mtshungs// kha TaM ga dang/
thod b.lag/ jorjod bzhin zhags pa nyid// sna tshogs gzugs can bsgom par bya// ro hi ta dang gnyid dang// rus sbal dbazhin lto ba nyid// seng ge de bzhin staganyid dang// wa dang dge slong nyid rnams
dang// lta dka'ago 'a sogs pa'i// thod pa brgyad du cho ga bzhin// rgyan rnams kun gyisa rnam par brgyan// sgog la la sogs dang ldan// rtayi gzugs dang phag gi gdong// khyi gdong de bzhinas nig ge

ma/ zhal zhi ba la phyag bzhim// sprul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// gling bu dang ni pi wang dang// nu kund dang rdza rnga ste// phyag gnyis m la zhal gcig ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan
nagamodaka'agog lta cu dang// dengazhin steng du rta gdongaljang// somonag mo dkar mtshungs dang// dbazhunasteng du bag gdong dmar// dma' zhing gnag dang dkar mtshungs shing// ji bzhin stong du

khyi gdong la// ljang dang gnag dang dkar po'i gdong// stongadu 'bar ba'i sang go gdong// thams cang skra ni ste nga du ba bar// g.yon brkyang g.yas ro mnan cing// spyan gsum khro zhang sgog pa dang/ rgod pa'i
bzhin ni bsgom nga ra bya// che ru ka bskyod pa gsum pa las rab tupyad pa dang bo'o/// ye shes mkha' 'gro sgrub thabs ni// rdo rje gtso bo rgyal ngo nyon// gas mar ye shes chos ldan pa'i//

gnyis kyi dngos po spangs pa yis// rnal 'byor kun gsosadang po ni// dag pa gsum ni gdon bu bya// swa b+hA ba 'byusaMthad+harmas glu ba shud+d+hoNahaM/ badzra 'uraHsarbadz+ham ju 'ud+d+hoTahaM/ yo ba shud+d+hasarba

d+ham yo ga 'tshoTahaM/ de ltar byas nas rnal 'byor pas// yang na bsam gtanang nyid bya// yid dang rjes mthun gnas rnamA su// dems bsam gtIn brtsam par bya/bar yang ni the ban+tit+taM// sna tshogs gis

ni'aphya ba dang// 'phan dang rgyal ma tshan bsgreng ba dang// phyogs bcu'i gnas nii thams cad du// dri zhim me tog sna tshogs dang// dri bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor du// skad cig gcig pa'i rnal 'byor gyis//
bdag gis lus nibasar dar bya// blo gros ldan pas sngar mchod nas// ye shes mkhaga' grom ni gcung// de ltar chog sna tshogs// sa par bsgom pa nyid du bya// ye shes mtsho yi re ba'i mgar//
phyogs so gas kha dog bzhi ni bas/ de bzhin gser gyi rgyun byung dang// nichen bdun gyis rnam par spras// g.yel ka 'bab pa'i 'phreng ban// 'dod pas kun tu rgyas pa ni// gnas ni lnga ru e ngag yi//
yigangagazhi bsgom pa nyid du bya// rima'i dkyil 'khor bsam nas nii/ gdugs ni dkar posaM rnam par sgras// bdag gi dbugs kyis phyug nas ni// dbus su ye shesamakha' 'gro ma// zhal gsum ma la phyag
drug nyid// sems dpa'i lamo krung gis gnas// ma bcings sgra yisamadzes pa dang// sajus rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// kha dog sngon mo 'jigs chen mo// sprul gyi rgyan gyis
rnam par brgyan// rgod dang bro ba sgrag pa dang// spyan gsum gsal ba'i gzugs can// sgra che dwagod dang 'jigasapa mo// gos nidamar pos shin tumadzes// steng du kha TaM ga nyidadang// gnyis
pa la ni dgra sta nyid// gsum pa ni do nyid// g.yon nad bzhin dril bu'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni lhung bzed nyid// gsum par de bzhinaral gri'adzin// 'od zer 'bar nga dum dang// dbus su
mkhas pas bsgom par bya// yashesamakha' 'gro'i mdun du ni// bdag gi dbugs kyis phyun gnas ni// kha dog dkar choshin tun dzes// ma brtangs nga yi skya yas brgyan// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan/
! pa dang// sgog pa'i rodang ldan pa dang// shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// phyag gnyis kyis ni rnam par smras// rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha TaMg 'jo mkha' 'gro mo bsgom bya// ya
shas byang gi cha la ni// bdag gi dbugs las byung nas ni// phyag gnyis sams dpa'i skyil mo krung// btsom gsar gyimadog lta bu// rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha TaM ga/ ma bcings sku yas
rnam par brgyan// yan lag sprul gyi rgyun dang ni// shin tumadzes pa'i gos kyisabargyan// 'jigs pa'i mkha' 'gro zhes bya bsgom// ye shes nub kyi cha 'a ni/ yong ni ro' ngas ma byung nas
ta phyag gnyis sams dpa'i rgya mo krung// kha dog sngon mo shin tumadzes// rnal 'byor lhung bzed kha TaM ga/ ma bcings pa yi ma yis brgyan// lus la sbrul gyi rgyun gyis brgyan//
shin tumadzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// ye shes lho yi tsha la ni// gdol ba mo ni dumacu mo ltar//rnal 'byor lhung bzed la TaM ga/ ma btsas ba yi sgra yis brgyan// phyag gnyis ma la zhal
gcig ma// sna tshog sargyun gyis rnam par brgyan// yongs gang gzugs dang gzi brjid ldan// 'din rnal 'byor pa yis b+hAsgom// dbang ldan lha mo mang ga sna// gdonganisang gar bsam par bya//
dkar dang ser ba lta bur ni/ klu dbang stanal g.yas brkyang gnas// rdzu lcagasakyusdugs mdzub zhags// shin tun dzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// 'od zer 'bar pa dums na// lus ni 'bar bar bsgos

bar bu/ mar ni stag mo zhes bya ba// rinachen bdun bo mchog gi gdan// phyag gnyis sngo dang dkar ba mtshungs// gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang// 'bar ba'i rdo rje lcags kyu dang// de bzhin sdigs mdzub
zhags ba nyid// 'od zer 'bar ba du mas mi lus ni 'bar bar bsgom par bya// bden bral lha mo lha gdong ma/ sgra cher dgod dang 'jigs pa mo/ daN ha'i gan dang yang dag ldan// dmar zhing gnag
pa'i kha ngog ma// lus la shin tu mdzes gos dang// phyag gnyis kyisazhi rnam par spras// lcags kyu zhags pa sdegs mdzub ma// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ chung ngu lha mo bug pa me/ ser dang
[7] ]@#// dmar ba kha dog ma// klu yigadanal gnas pa dang// de nyid rgyan ni rab tu brtag/ phyug gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krungu gnas // lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub ma// bod sa

ba bar ng dum yis// thams cad kyi ni thams cad ba bar// mkha' 'grom brgyadadadus su ste// phyi ro'o tun bzhi po rnams// de ltar dgod pa 'i rami bltas nas// phyi nas gnas ni rab tu brtag/ shur dumakha'

bgro'i rgya'i mo dbang// phyag gnyis dang mdog dkar mo// yi dgas gdan la gnas pa dang// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang//man grol zhing drag mo dang// mo ni 'bar ba'i 'od lta bu// khar na las pa gtsug
nas ni// sgra cher dgod dang de bzhin 'bar// byang dumar ma rgyalamo dbang// kha dog ser mo drugel ma// 'dzugs ba'i gzugs can gtsugs pa can// shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyis brgyan// 'ab tusong
ba'i stan la gnas// 'bar ba'i ma ni lta bu'i 'od// thal mo gnyis kyi lag pa ni// mgo bo'i steng du lam bzhin// nub tu lha mo 'dzin byed ma// kha dog dmar mo 'jigs pa mo// rab dusong ba'i stan la
gnas// shin tu mdzes pa 'gos kyis brgyan// khrag gi srad du lag pa yi// snyam par khrag ni thung bar byed// morani'aba' ba'i 'od drag mo// lha mo gtso mo 'jib byed ma'o// lho ru g.yo ldan ma zhes
bya kha rog nagatsho lta bu'i 'od// rab tu song ba'i stanal gnas// ma cings pa yi ma yis brgyan// go/ dmar pos g+hAn chu mdzes// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang// sdigs mdzub dang ni gtunai
ta 5/ lag/ thamasacad sems n rmas par byed// ba ra ba'am yi 'od drag mo// thams cad rig pas thams cadu bsgom// 'di rnams gzugs sogs mdun du ni// dam tshig de bzhin bstan par bya// rang/
dang chu yis bdunapa'i don// rdordza'i sa bon gyis ni bskal// thig le sgras namanan pas ni// rgyunagyi cha ni zhes byar gsus// gsum pa las rab byed gnyis pa'o/// de nas ser
mad sgrub pa ni// cigasungs mdo ru bsdus nas bshad// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus son pa!/ zhima'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// 'khor lo sngon du bya rigs nga// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid

'khorilo sa dang nguni sngon/ go rim bzhin du byin zad ng// lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang// ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ga/ chos 'byungalas skyes 'khor lo ni// 'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa// za'abru
las ni gcig yin te// rdo rje can gyi sku gsum mchog/ bco lnga'i gdan dang ldan pa yi// ron ngas par bsam par bya// de yi steng du zla ba yin// zla ba'i steng dus bon nyid// phyi nas bdud las
rgyal bas mnan// gnyis 'dus ba laoM bde chen po/ A li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas// kA li'i gzugs kyisasnang byed do/ blab nyim gnyis 'dus pas// dkar mo la sogs zab tu grog
zla ba me long ye shes ldan// de bzhin mnyam nyid ye shes nyid// rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan// so sor rtog par brjod par bya// thams cad gcig gyuranan tananyid// gzugs brtan rdzogs
par dag pa 'o// mkhas pas chog gsungs pas ni// rnam pa lnga bo bsgom par bya// A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba// rdorjesams dba' nyid kyi gdan// yig las byung gong du la//
hUMphaT rnam pa 'dod mi bya// sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba// dkyil 'khor bdag po bsgom par bya// phyag mtshan zhalo sogs gong ma bzhin// zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od// thabs dang shes
rob rang bzhin las// dultar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid// A li shes rab kAl thubs// zla thanyi ma'i rab dbye bas// gang phyir dkar mo la sogs pa// kha drog dbye bas so so yin// de phyir kun tu
rang 'bad pas/ dkyil 'khod pa yang rab tu brtag/ rnal 'byor ma lco 'di dag ni// nang gi 'phar mar yang dag gnas// phung po lnga yi rang bzhinagyis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu smasgom
dbang por rdordzagashin rje dkab// chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lus ngan rdo mkha' 'grom// dbus su bdag med rnal 'byon ma/ phyi rol 'pharama' dkA mo dang/ chom rkun de bzhin ro langs ma

g+hasmArI dang puk+kasi// ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo// brgyud pa g.yung mos gang ba 'o// 'od ldan m dang stong ldan nyid// mkha' spyodas spyod zhes brjod// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// rjes su
sbyaram yang dag gnas// lha mo thams cad sna tshogs mdogo/ drag chen phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan// zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma// spyan gsum gsal bab gzugs can m// 'khor lo rnamagu'
rgyan dang// lag par gdu bu sku rags nyid// sas rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas// 'di lnga phyag rgyadag par gsungs// ji ltar bdagamad rnal 'byor ma// de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad// g.yon pas

rnal 'byor lhung bzed dang// de bzhin stong du kha TaM ga/ g.yasanA rdo rje sngonang dang// de bzhin du yang gri gug nyid// ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid ba bar// spyan dmar de bzhin stong skyes ser// kha dog sngon mo
tshes gsalam// stagag pags pas rnam dkris shing// 'jig pa'i ma ni lta bur ni// gsal ba'i gzugs can ma du gnas// g.yas na dkar dang sngo ba ste// g.yonan ma chad sngo dang mtshungs// phyag
gnyis ma la zhal gcig m// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lag pa gcig ni bod pas brel// g.yasan gri gug 'dzin pa mo// rgodadang khro dang sgug pa dang// da ni mchod pa 'i gzugs gnas
pas// sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa yi// 'od zer sna tshogs kun tusngo// de nyid gsum gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mkhas pas dbus su bsgom par bya// gsum pa las rab tu byed pa gsum pa'o//
de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// dodzad byis drang mnyam nga 'dabyings// rdzordza dbyangs zhes bya bar gsungs// dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs nas ri/
phyag rgya chen porayongs su gzung// thams cad rnam nga ra bltas nas ni// sngags pas 'di ni bsgrub nga ra bya// gsar pa legs par bkal ba dang// shin tu tshad ma mdzes pas ni// srad bus thig
kyi/ baphreng bas brgyan// mtshams kyi cha rnams thamasacad dang// sgo yi khyad kyi ga rnams su// rin chen rnams kyis sras// dge 'khor lo so so'i skabs/ nang du la zhugs nas ni// rdo
u@#// gdung shes rab can// ji lta nus par dkyil 'khor nyid// gru bzhi pa la skyo bzhing// rta babs rnams kyisashin tumadzes// thig bzhi dngan yang dag ldan// gos drang me tog/
thig yos bcug cing// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// kakha brgyad kyis nye bar mdzog/ rdo rje kacha'i nang logs su// dkyil 'khor lnga yis ma par brgyan// danas dgyila 'khor nang
sgyu dun// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam par dgod// gsus pa'i dkyil 'khor tshog yi// bsgrub pa'i ng khyod la bshad par bya// de la dang por lha nyid kyi// khyim dusngags pa zhugs nas ni//
a@#las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bsams nas de sta rdodzin// dkar de tsamo lnga pa nyid// cho gas bsam par byas nas ni// dbazhinagshegs pa kun sogs la// mchod nus phyag 'tshal 'di skad
gsol// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' kun// bdag la dgos pa ra mdzad du gsol// bdagan mi gamo zhes bgyi// dus 'donas ni bzung nas ni// ji srid byang chub snying bo'i bar// ji lta'i
dus gsum magonapo rnams// byang chub tu nis mdzad// byang chub sems ni bla medamag/ dam pa bdag gis bskyadapar bgyi// dag pa'i chos ni sdud pa dang// sems can don byed tshul
03/khrims dang// tshul khrims bslab pa rnam pa gsum// sosor bdag gis brtan por gzung// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byoralas
skyes pa'i// sdom pa drung nas brtan por gzung// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgyu yang// nga nyid las niso sor gzung// slob dpon dag kyang gar bar bgyi//kani chen rigs mchog

rnal 'byor gyi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyim re re drug byas nas// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po las byung ba// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba thag la
gsum// dam pa'i chos kyang so soragazung// las kyi rigasamatshog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// thamasacod so sor gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgya
byang chung semamani bla med pa// dram pa bdag gis bskyod par bgyi// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyis// sdom pa ma lus gzung bar bgyi// ma bsgral ba dag bsgul bar bgyi// ma grol bdag
sgol bar bgyi// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyungazhing// sems na mya ngan 'das la bzhag/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo 'dzin pa thams cad kyi rtsa mo las byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
lesnyoms par bzhugs de tshig 'di dag bka' stsalo pa/ de nas bsam gtana gnas a'adug nas// chos rnams thams cad bdag med par// yang dag rjes su blto bar bya// phyi dang nang gi
'a@#// bdag nyid can// 'di dag thams cad sems kyis brtags// sems las ma gtogs pa nyid ni// gzhan du yod pa ma yin no// chos kun rang bzhin bodagasal ba//
[E ]chos kun dang por ma skyes phyir// yid kyis a nut+pan+nabarjod// de nas nga sems de nyid 'dis// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal ba// 'dod pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pas ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam
par blta// otsatapra ti bi d+haM ka ro mi zhes// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chos dag pa// nam mkha' lta bur dri mamed// yid gnyis kun las rnam par grol/ mchog tu rnam par rtog pa'joms// nyon
mos dri ma thams cad dag/ dang po zla ba ltar bltas nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'di/ a sogs gzugs kyis 'jug par 'gyur// a A i I u u rab las mi ro med laM
abcom ldan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi/yon tan khyad par ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gru gsum rgya chen rang bzhin can// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan gnas//
'di ni asogs gzugs kyis ni// sangs rgyas yon tana'ajug par 'gyur// shel dang zla lta bu ni// de yi steng du'ajug par 'gyur// sems narang bzhin 'od gsal bas// de nyid dga' bar
byed ba'i rgyu// sngags pas 'di yi gas kyis ni// byang chub som ni skyid par byed// oM bod+hitsin+ta utra yAm// byas pa'i rjesaM su rim byung ba// sems can rjes su 'dzin pa 'o// dag pa'i
0 chos kyis yang dag gang// nyon mongs thams cad ngesang ra gnon// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus sun// byang chub zla ba gnyis pa can// 'di yang skar ma'i rnam pas ni// saa rgyas yon tan ka/
sogs kyi/ gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan lta bur yi// rnal 'byor gyisani 'jug par 'gyur// ka kha ga grung/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Da D+ha Na/ tatha darnyan/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ mar la wA/ sha 2sa hi
kA/ bad yi dkya 'khor chog kun// rgyud ni gzhan du ma gsungs so// de la dbus sutso lnga ba// 'od zer dkar bo bcas pa nyid// kun tubazang po'i sogs bskyodapa// brtanang 'byed pa'i rgyu yi phyir//
bdag nyid rdordzo'i gzugs brnyan du// 'di yi sngags kyis bsgom par bya// mo tit+tabadzra/ byang chub spyodang bla named// de yi sa ni rtogs pa 'di// yashes dag pa zag pa med// zla ba'i dkyog 'khor
dbus su ni/ tshangs par brtag par bya// nam mkha'i khams ni thams cad kyi// tshadadu yang dag gang pa yi// roN+Di'i lus kyi bdag nyid du// sngags pas bsgom par bya ba'o// 'dis ni gsakyi
rnal 'byor gyig/ spro ba dang nibasdu bar bya// oM badzraAdAkonyahaM/sas rgyas kun gyi sku gang ni// snang ba mad cing gnas pa med// ma skyes ma byas dag pa nyid// dngos po med pa la sogs lags/
[& ]gcad madadabyar mod gzung du med// chos kyi sku ni gzugs med pa// rje bdag med yong dag gyur// rdordzi'i sunagonganamod// de ltar yang de ni ngo tshes mtshan pa bsgom par bya ba bcom ldan b nas/
byabya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyon cig/ yang na rdo rje sems dpa' ni// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gzugs brnyan ni// 'di yi sngags kyis

klangasgom par bya// oM ya shA sarbata thA ga tAn+ta thAhaM/ skud gsang ba de bzhin spyod// spyod yul de nyid rtogs pa ni// mtshon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// sangs rgyus kun gyi bdag nyid dag de nas yang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chonapo de snying po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan bdus gsang ba'i rdo rje dang/ pad+ma'i rigs kyi ming ni lag
bcom ldan b jus kyis bka' stsal ba/rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun la gnas// pad+ma'i rigs ni lha mo chen mo ldan// de yi rdo rje pad+ma'i steng du gnas// de las ngobazhin gshegs pa thams
cadubaton// dunas du ltar bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bskyed nas steng dang 'og tu sngags kyi yi gi bkod de/ chog bzhin nga ri rab dang/ gru gsum rgya chen po brgyadapar bya su 'ong zer
sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa las yang dgapar byung ba'i mdzes pa'i gnas bsgoms nas/ dorapaMlas byung ba'i sna tshogs par nyima'i dkyila 'khor ro// rlungadang ma'i dkyil
'khor dang ldanub/ ya ra la was brgyan pa'o// de nas de yi steng du sngags kyis dbazhin gshegasab thams cad kyis gsol ba btab cing bstod par rab tu bsngags pa nor bu rin po che chen
00bo'od gsal ba dang/ kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu dpyangs pa dang/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i gos dang/ 'phan dang/ mi tog ga'i phreng ba dang/ sha dang/ do la phyedapa dang/ zla bas nye par/

mdzes par rdo rje nor bu'i rtsomor gzhal med 'dra bsam par bya'o/ hA gi sngagos 'di rang gi snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dusngags 'di bkod de/ de nyid gyur las rtsomi lnga pa bsgom par byago/ yang

sangs rgyas thams cad spro ba dang bsdu bar bya zhing/ rdo rje de nyidayang tshig 'gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa zla ba'i kha dog gi 'od lta bu ste/ zla ba'i dkyila 'khoragyi snyan
bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa// dang ba gonga shes rab dang dga' bo gcig pus mdzes pas rdo rje dang/ dril bu dang/ ral gyi dang/ lcags kyu rud dang/ thod pa dang/ zhags pa 'dzin pa
nyid do// g.yas pa kha dog nag po'o// g.yon pa ni pad+ma rA ga'i 'od do// zhal gsum pa dang/ phyag drug pa nyid dang/ spyan gsum pa nyidadang/ bzang po'i gzugs can te/ rang gi rig ma'i pad+ma la
bzhugs pa/ ngagyes pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par dkyil 'khor pa'i ng rab tu rtag par bya'o// shar du ni rnam par snang mdzad do// lhor ni rin chen 'byung
gnas so// nub tu ni'od dpag tumed pa'o// byang dun gdoname zabar grub bgo/ dbang ldan du nispyan no// mar ni mAm go/ bden bral du ni gos dkar mo'o// chung dun sgrol ma'o// phyi rol gyi
'phar ma la drag shul mni kha dog dkar mo'o// lce'un rdo rje gzugs brnyanam na kha dogasar mo'o// nupa tun 'dod chags rdo rje ma kha dog dmar mogo/ byang du nirdorje zhi ba mo kha dog/

ljang ku ma'o// dbang ldan du ni rdo rje gnod sbyin mo kha dog dkar sar ro// mdun rdo rjemakha' 'gro ma dmaras lta bu 'o// bden bral du sgra'i rdo rdzum ni sngon dmar lta bu// rlung du sa'i rdo rdzom ni kha dog ljangaskya
ma'o/ phyi rol gyi par ma la dbang ldan du ni gling bu ma'o// ma run pa wangama'o// bden bral ngani mu kun dma'o// rlung dun dza dra mgo/ gling bu ma la sogs pa ni phyag gnyis ma la zhal gcig ma'o//

phyi rol gyi snam bu la me tog la sogs pa'i mdzaMn ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya sto/ de bzhin du phyag gnyis ma'o/ shar gyi sgo la lha mo rdorje lcags kyu mnam mkha' sngo bsangs ma'i mdog
bri bar bya ste/ zhal g.yasapa dang/ gzhan pa gnag pa dang/ dkar ba'o// phyag g.yas pa'i dang po na lcags kyu bo// gnyis pa nan ral gri phyar ba'o// gsum pa la ni 'khor ba'o// g.yon
pa na ni zhags pa dang/ sdigs mdzub dang/ dril bu 'dzinapa ste phyag drug pa bri bar bya'o// lce'i sgor lha mo rdo rje zhags pa ma kha dog dkar ser to/ zhal g.yas pa dang/ gzhan pa ni gnag pa
dngadamar bgo/ g.ya se pa ni zhags pa dang/ rdo rjed par l gri'aphyar ba'o// 'khor lo dang/ dril bu dang/ sdigs mdzub zhags pa can te phyag drug pa'o// nub kyisgo la ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ste
cata/de bzhin du gzhan yang kha dog dmar zhing gzi brjid chab ste/ zhal g.yas pa dang gzhan pa ni gnag pa dang dka' ba'o// phyag drugan lcags sgrogs dang/ rdorje dang/ ral gri dang/ 'khor lo dang//
dril bu dang/ lcags kyu'o// byang gi sgo lan rdor dril bu ma 'jigs mar byed pa ste/ zhal gsum ni ljang ku dang/ nagamo dang/ dkarachogo// phyag drug na ni dril bu dang/ rdo rje dang/ ral gri dang/
'khor lo dang/ lcags kyu dang/ zhags pa'o/thams cad kyang sku skyeng du 'bar ba ste/ sna tshogs pad+ma nyima'i dkyil ba kho'i dugazhag par bya'o// ma'i phyogs nas brtsams ta ma tog la sogs
pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor ma de gzhag par bya ste phyag gnyis mar gsungs so// shar l sogs pa'i so rnams su ni rnal 'byor ma lcags kyu ma dang/ zhags pa ma dang/ lcags sgrog ma

dang/ dril buma'i lag pa ste/ sgo sus mdang yungadag par ldan pa'o// dzahU~Mbazhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi snying bo bstan ba ste the tshom mi za'o// nga lhor bkod pa dang byas pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyis

kyang mtshan ma dad phyag rgya dang ldanuba'i dpal rdo rjesems dapa'i phyi'i dkyil 'khorago/ gong ma lta bu'i de'i phyidakyis de'i nang du zla ba phyed pa'i dbyibs lta bu'i rlung gidakyil 'khoradang 'drapa ka ba brgyad
kyis nye bamadzes pa dang/ phyi rol du rimo bzhis yos subaskor ba'o// lha tshothams cad kyi gnas su ji skad gsungs pa'i gangana rnams ni dkaragol sogs par b tu brtag par bya'o// de la
dbus sun hIny+tsa'i yi ga rnam par bsgom par bya'o// de'i shar gyi ru'u mig la na hri'o// lho run ho'o// nub tu na gi// byang du ni bo// mdunihaM ngo// bden bral du jo
ba ngo ru du na lo ngo/ dbang ldan dun haM ngo// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bkod pa ni ma'i mtshams su na oM ngo// bden bral du ni u'o// rlung du ni a'o// dbang ldan du na la dgod par bya'o//
ka 'ar gyi sgo la dzago/ lho ru ni hUM nga// nubadun bi mo// byang du ne ho dgod par bya'o// phyi rol du dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor bsams te/ der dbang po la sogs

pa'i babyung po tshon po brgyudapo'ajig par byed pa dgod par bya'o/ shar du ha ri dA sa la// lha yi tshogs ni yang dag dra// lho ru tsuta'i shing la ni//gshin rje'i sa gtso bo'i dbang phyug bu// nub du a'o
ka gnas su// sprin gyi rgyal dar nidagod// de bzhin byang du byang chub shing/ gnodasbyin sde dang na mnyam par zhog/ de bzhon mar ni ka 21sa// drangasrong tshogs kyis yang dag khyab// bden
bral la tA dza tar ni// srin po la sogs de nas dgod/ rlung dab+ha li pa la ni// rlung gi bdag po yang dag bu// dbang ldan ba rtas la ni// yi dwags tshogs ni yang dag bri// drug bcas dbang
bcasanye dbang bcas// zla bcas nyi ma gshin rdzo'i cha// rgyas btab rmongs byas zis byas shing// thal ba'i dngos bcas 'tsho bar byed// thabs dang shes rab rnal 'byor gyis// g.yonapa
ca kha Ti brtana gnas su/ dril bu sa la sil sgra sgrog sa shing// khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa bsnams// g.yas su rtsordzob bar ba ste// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad// skyil krung
byed par byas nas ni// nyid kyi bam ste sa g.yon pa mnan// tshangs pa la sogs mnan pa de// grags pa nyi khami za ste// kun tu 'od zer sna tshogs kyi// sangs rgyas sprin dang mnyam pa 'dis
spro ba yang ni sbyin par bya// de ltar rnal 'byor bas sgomasan// daso grub myur du thob par 'gyur// dbal yang dag par sbyob las byungab ste brtag pa'i rgyal po gsum pa'i//
bcom ldan nal khyor rnal 'byor ma'i/ ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid kyi// gsang ba nyanA ba'i batshul lags na// thub pa chen pos bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'grom rnam
bar rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tsheg gi phyag rgya bka' stsal pa/ ko l+la i ratshoa bo wA/ mumanarakako// g+han gre ba Da ho pA dzA yi/
ka na ki a a naro lA/ ta hig la yats+tshai/ gla Tom saN pir i a i/ ha li kI pa chen a/ du rdzun 'dzia o/ tsa u sa ma kA ra yi// ka byA ra la i a i/ mA la a na shas lany+tsa/
taharu 'ai a i/ pho ba cha kha Ta ka renaM/ ba aban+tan mu Ni a i/ ni raM shu u0f00 gaN+Da lI/ dahidza sare ba pa Ni a i/ ma la yong rjenub kos Ni Ni ma ta hits+tsaM badz+dza oM amu khri/
tsa @#// go glu/ gru gyu/ mu rgyu/ lu gyu/ di3/ 'di rnams bltas nas rnal 'byor pas mtshan ma gsungs pa zhes bya ba la spro bar bya'o// 'di/ pu su/ mA/ yo/ b+hi/ d+hi/ lu/ ste/sa//
da/tho/ pi/ g+ha/ b+hu/ba/b+hi/To go/ twaM/ku/ khadza/ b+ha/ sU/ pu/ dza/ o a/ go// de mA/ ka/ o/ tu/ kokA/ la/kA/hi/bu/ gro/ so/su/nA/ si/ma/ku/ donas ngag gats+tsom yi// chog ma

pa bshad par bya// gang gis spyan dang sunamor yang// the tshom med pa shes bya ba// pe tung gi dang/ pra ti re hU~M gi dang/ ga tshu dang/ luslob dang/ nir ga dang/ tso go dang/ hridri ya dang/ ko ra ga dang/

kaN+Dikadang/ a li ka ma dang/ b+ha ra ha dang/ sha ba NaM dang/ mnan dang/ naradang/ tI li ka dang na ra ka dang/ a mu kadang/ kA khi lA dang/ mA sanadang/ ba'i d+hi dang/ bar rnye dang/ kru ra dang/

A an+tadang/ yul ka dang/ b+ha gi ni dang/ mu tig dang/ grihAnAdang/chudra dang/ dan+tasbakhrodza hwa dang/ rgyun bu hin dang/ a ka man dang/ sbyane ta dang/ kir dang/ lam po da ra drung dAn dang/ ni 'o

dang bi dza sde dang/ sgyu r+ya dang/ d+hu ma ba ya dang/ sa nudang/ sa ni ta dang/ oM gu lA dang/ bden dang ra dza ka dang/ ad+ha nadang/ puM ka tedang/ ts+tshan du ha dang/ tsa la dang/ mi ga pa didang/ maNAl
dang sus dang/ pho sgul dang/ ma hAklu radang/ ts+tshAn/ go ma g+ho ha dang/ a phyag dang/ spyi dong/ pan+tim dang/ mu kha par no dang ho dang/ nIkAdang/ shunus+samano dang/ a nu sbaran dang//
[7]/ steng dang 'og tu yodang ni phyag rgyu dang phyag rgya'i lan du gsus mo// yi ga dang ngag gi rtsom sku bzhi pa las rab tu byed pa dang po'o// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// yadani gcig tu
gyur pas nyon// gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma// lA ma yongs gyur byas bcas mo// mi ldog mo dang 'dod pamo// 'di dag mkha' 'gro bdun du gsungs// mngon par zhen pas blta ba dang/
smin m yon por gang byed cing// sngon gyi gzugs ni sdud pa dang// phyis nas 'jigs bar byed pa// de ni gzugs can m zhes bya// duba'i 'os gnyis yodra ston pa// sdug phabam gal
tu mi sdug pa'i// byis pa lta 'ing 'o byed na// de ni bo byed ma shes bya// mkha' 'gro mchog kyang danyid yin// byol song lta stangs khro gnyer gdung// 'di'i sman sbyar bsgrigs par byed/
gzhan du dbugs kyi 'jigs byed ma// de ne lAmar rnam par bstan// phag dngalce sbyang byi la dang// rta rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa// de ni yongs gyur ma ru gsungs// rab tu dga'
zhing gsal bar dgod// song bar gyur nas mi ldog pa// nga ni dus bcasamo ru gsungs// gang zhig skyo bas lag pa 'am// bong ba 'an nikang pas sam/ gas mtha' 'am yang na shing
gisan// des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur// de nimi ldog mar shes bya// dgod dang sna dang ngu ba dang// glo bur du ni khro 'gyur ba// de ni 'dod pa mA shes bya/ mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma
mor gsus// thod pa dgra sta mang ba dang// nusrin rgyal mtshan ral gi dag khaphang mdung dang ni bdun dugasus// yang dag sbyor ba'i chog 'di// rnal 'byor
rig pas rtag tu mtshon// lus srul mo'i mtshan ma dang phyagargya so bzhi pa las rab tubyed pa gnyis pa'o/// de nas lA ma'o mtshan nyid ni// yadrarago'ab tshu bshad po ra bya// dam
zhing dka' ba'i bu med gang// pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu'i 'od// dkar po'i gos la rtag dga' zhing// tsan dan gsar pa'i dri dang ldan// bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dgag chags shing mthong
zla na rjes 'gro ma/ khyim dupad+ma 'dra byed ga/ pad+ma gar dbang sikas las byung// smin ma'i dbus su rtse gsum son// lus ni sngo bsangs skya ba dang// ut+pal sngon po'i dri dang mtshus/ khyim
dudo rdza brunas ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed pa ni// ha ru ka dpal rigs byungob// de ni mkha' 'gro ma shar rgyu// mag dmar dkaradang dma' ba dang// de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar// ra skyes
khyen bya drag gis kyang// rtag tu dga' bar gyur pa dang// dwayi khyim du jo ldani// bre nas rtagatumachod byed pa// he ru dag dang la rigs byung ba/ mkha' 'gror 'di la rje tshom med// 'khor
khang gi dpral ba'am// lag par yang nimaMthong 'gyur ba// sebazhengesngo bsangs bud med gang// rtag tu gos sor dga' ba nyid// mo tog dkar po dri min dang// skal bzang phun sum
tshog sam de// khyim du khoralo badri bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rjes 'gro// gnag cing sngo bsangs bud med gang// son dkar zhing mtho ba dang// rtag tu gdug pa'i g.yon pa ni//
grani rtag tugrol ba yin// rtag tu khus la dga' ba dang// spyod cingamang du skya pa dang// rdo rje khyim du bris nas ni// rtag tu mchod pa byed bzhi// rdo rje phag mo'i rigs las byung// dkar zhing
gsor dam tshus pa dang// 'bar ba'i mig dwang ba stsa gang// de rje gang gi dpral ba'am// lag par yang ni mthong gyur pa// rtag turgyal sring dga' ba dang// sems Na bden par smra ba
da// mali ka yi dridang ldan// khyim du rdo rje brisanas ni// rtag tu mchongang byed pa ni// dum skyes ma yi rigs las byung// rnal 'byor dbang chen mo ni mchog/ shal dga' ba'i bud med
gang// mig sman nag po'i lta bu'i bod// dpral bar mdung cu'i rnam ba nyid// drag shul las la dga' ba gang// rtag tu dur khrod bgro gang dang// 'jigs zhes pa skyug bro ra pa dang/ de gang
gi dpral bar bsdusanas ni// khyim du thong ba 'dri byed cing// rtag tu mchod pa byed pan/ ha ru ka yi rigs las byung// char sprin mdog 'dra'i bung med gang// sonami mnyam par gnas/
shing// rtag tu srog shul las rnams dang// g.yon pa'i mcho ba byung ba ni// khyim du dgra sta 'dri byed cing// rtag tumachod pa byed pa ni/ rnam par 'dren ba'i rigs byung ba// de ni mkha' 'gror
ba/ @#// the mtshom med// gang gi spu na la ba dang// bzhin ni yongs su zlum pa dang// rtag tu kha la sbyar dang// smin ma ring zhing ba spu dang// gos dkar gtsang zhing zhi ba dang//

kyi ma skyong bdonapar sa ba dang// rtag tu dam nga ba chos dga' ba// drang 'a bo'i sring mor nas bya// pad+ma'i phyag rgyu sbyin par bya// yang na rus sbal phyag rgya bya// la ba spyi blug mchod byed pa//

phyagargyu'i lan du brjod nga ra bya// dri nitshes bcu'i ris dag la// khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar byed// mamachu 'phyang zhing mig yangs ma// gan dmar zhing ser ba dang// che zhing skal bzang bo'i dang ldan
so'ang tsamapa lta bu nyid// ring 'ang lag pa ring ba dang// sna tshogs gos la dga' ba dang// ri mo gsum ni dpral ba 'am// steng ga mtshams su nges par gnas// dgod pa dang ni dga' ba
'a nyid// lam gyi rnam pa gnon cing gnas//g.yul du zhi ba rnams kyi ni// gtam la rtag tu dga' nga lding de 'dra'i rab tshes mthong nas ni// mdung rtse phyag rgyu rab bstan bya// rkang pa
g.yon pa bskums pa yi// garanying kya ni rab bstan bya// g.yon gyis yongs bskor ba ni// phyag rgya'i lam du brjod par bya// de yi bcu bzhi 'am brgyad pa la// de khyim mdung rtsabris
shing mchod// 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshan nyid yin// dmar zhingadakar ba'i bud mang gang// mig ni ljang shing ser ba dang// de bzhin sgra ni 'khyil ba dang// dar dpus bcings
[re/ ]snang ba nyid// ri mo gcig par rab tu gnas// de bzhin steng du ring ba dang// rtag tu gos dmar la dga' zhing// rtag tu dgod cing glu len dang// glo bur du na khro ba dang// khyad par du ni
sems gso dang// rtsod la rtag tu dga' ba nyid// de badra'i rab myos mthong nas ni// 'phangamadung phyag rgyu rab bstan bya// gnyis pa tshos kyang 'bad pa yis// dril bu'i phyugargya rab tu spyan//
g.yonAnas yongs su bskor ba dang// phyag rgya'i lan du brjodo bar bya// thung shing byin pa sbom pa dang// rtag tu gos ser dga' ba dang// mgrin pa nus ni gos 'phyang ba// de 'dra'i rab myosa mthong
nas ni// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rab bstan bya// gnyis pa bang rab tu 'bar bas ni// dung gi phyag rgya spyan par bya// de bzhin ngo sa su bskor ba nyid// de yi dus ni bcu bzhi la// khyim du/
jo rje 'dri bar byed// yan lag kun la bsdur bcas// mig ni gnag cing sar ba dang// gtsigs shing rnam 'gyur 'jigs pa dang// bzhin sngom khano sngon pa dang// ma mchu 'phyang/
zhing khung mig dang// sa ni nyams par gyur pa dang// rtag tu dri za 'dod pa dang// sbyin gyi kha dog lta phyi ba// de 'dra'i rab myos mthong nas ni// klu yi phyag rgya rab sbyin bya// gnyis pa yang
ni 'bad pa yis// 'phangamadung phyag rgya sbyin par bya// yongs su bskor ba gong ma bzhin// de ni bcu gcig tshes lan// mchab 'drizhing rtag tu mchod// mtshon ma'i phyag rgya ste pa'i
dang las rang du byed pa gsum pa'o// 18nas yan lag phyag rgya yi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya/ bud med gang zhig spyi gtsug rig/ spyi bo
zad pad+me rab bstan bya/ grang zhig dngul ba ston pa la// mkhur tshos de yis rab stan// gang zhig so na ston pa 'a// lcand yis rang stan bya// gang zhig man chu ston pal// kos sko de yis
rab bstan byu// gang zhig mgrinapar rag pa la// lte ba de yis rab bstan bya// gang zhig lta ba ston pa la// lte ba de yis rab bstan byu// gang zhig mjug du ston pa la// sani de yis phab bstan
zla[S/ ]gang zhig gsang ba ston pa la// ling ga de yis rab bstan rgyu// gang zhig pus mo ston pa la// byin pa de la rab bstan bya// gang zhig lag ba ston pa la// dpung ba de yus rab bstan bya//
gang zhig nang ba ston pa la// rkang mthil de yis rab bstan[S]/ gang zhig sor mo ston pa la// senAmo de yis rab bstan ga/ gang zhig sa ni ston pa la// nam mkha' de yis rab bstan byu//
sgyu gang zhig nam mkha' ston pa la// nyi ma de yis rab stanabya// gang zhig chu bo ston pa la// rgya mtsho da yisu rab bstan bya// gang zhig sor mo gcig ston pa// legs par 'os shes brjod pa lag
gabazhig sor mo gnyis ston pa/ shin tu legasa'os brjod pa yin// g.yas pa'i smin ma sgyur tshul dang// g.yon pa'i smin sgyuratshul ston pa// slob dpon ganyis dung ba dub ston// rgyud
thams cad kyi gsang ba dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i brda ste brtag pa'i rgyal bo bzhi pa'o//(de nas skye bo dam pa kun/ khadu ba yang dgarab
bshad bya/ dol zas gcig bzla'i bar ga sna tshog saM su yang m lus brtson[>bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' ma pa/ gnas dang nyaba'i

gnas dang ni// zhing dang de bzhin nye ba'i zhing// tsan+do ti ba'its+tshin+dodang// 'du ba de bzhin nye bdu ba// dur khrod nyi ma'i dur khrod dang// bathung gtsod cu ba'i bzung gtsod nyid// 'di rnams san cu gnyis
tu sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po 'di// 'dinagazhan gyis brjod mi bya// bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags/ dub nyin dus gnu gnyis po rnams rgya chen po las byung ba bkar
na gyis ni bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gnas ni dza lan+d+ha ra' gsungs// de bzhin du ni u rgyan nyid// gnas ni ko la gir dang// de bzhin du tunyidad/ nya gan
go da ba ri nyid// de bzhin dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang// de bzhin de wi ko la bshad/ de bzhin nA lab nyid dang// de bzhin kA ru par gsungs// cho dri zhing na nyid du gsus// rtazhing dri ba kun
dang// dbazhin kog la nyid dang// kau0f38kar nici gsus pa'o// de bzhinalaM pa ka nyid dang// ka'i kha kha'i gnas nyid ni// ts+tsharjor yang dag gsungs ba dang// lto ba mi yang mo'i// bu
uka/ a hi sa rung// de bzhin khyim gyi lha nyid dang// so wAdang gser gling nyid// 'du ba de bzhin du 'du ga/ nAgar dang si ni// durakhrod nyid du brjod pa dang// ma ru dang ni

ku luta/ 'anye ba yi ni dur khrod nyid// snying rje de bzhin las kyi brang// gur ki la nyid dang ni// lan tshargya mtsho'i nang song dang// bcu gzhon nu'i grong khyer nyid// 'thungagacodatu ba'i 'thung gcod do//

do dang nye ba'i dur khrod nyid// rab song dge 'dun rgya mtsho'i 'gram// spyod mos tshal gyi rdzing bu'i 'gram// chub 'i dur khrod brjod par bya// de nas gnas la lhag par gnas pa'i chog bshad par bya ste//
rdul bral gnas su tshu ta gnas // kongaka nar ni zla ba'i snying// ka pany+tsar gnas tshur trar// aT+Ta ha sar ka dam pa// lha mo'i mkhar du ra gnas/ ha ka lar hA ri gnas// u rgyanaa sho kani
gnas// dzol mar gserashanga gnas // gnas 'og tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin tu gnas dri mamed// zhing ni 'du byengashes par bya// nyi ba'i zhing ni bod 'phro can// rjoman du gyur par
sa// ba'i ro sbyang dka' ba// 'du ba ring du song ba ste// nyo ba'i 'du ba mi g.yo ba// dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid// nyo ba'i dur khrodachos kyi sprin// pha rol phyinobcu'i sa rnams
Da la// rnal 'byor ma yi kla klo'i skad// bu la sogs pa ci gsungs pa// phyi dang nang du bsam par bya// rnal 'byor ma rnams lags 'du ba'i// nyin par nyid kyang legs bshad bya/
yi dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang// brgyad pa la yang khyad par du// rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bsnyanyid// skye ba bdun pa khyad par du// bcad pasasnyingadzrab rgyud nas ni// mkhas pas gsod par/
bya ba nyid// snying rje med nami grub pas// de phyir snying rje yang dag bshad// ji ltar bdag gzhan sems can nyid// ji ltar sems can de bzhin bdag/ 'di ltar soms pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ dngo
grub myur du thob par 'gyur// 'du ba'i gnas te lnga po las rab tu byed du dang po'o// gsangaba'i pad+ma'i mtshan nyid ni// ye shes dbangapo nyanapar wAtshal// ye shes sems
dngab dris pa yi// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim pa ni// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas ban mnyam par gnas nas ni// rdzogs bya rim pa rdo rje'adzin// mnyam nyide sams ni
bskyidanas ni// 'dod chags la sogs ring du skus// yod dang mthun pa'i gnas su ni// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/ brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun// sAng ngas phanapa'i
bsam par byu// spyi bo med pa'i spyi bo dang// sgra mtha'adi bzhin gsangapad+ma// chani sna tshogs yig 'bru rnams// dbazhin du yang bstan rnams nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi ni// chos
kyi dbyingasakyi rnam por byed// bsdus nas gong bu'i rnam 'byoragyis// rdo rjesams dpararang nyida'agyur// chu khamA datshe yi khams// ro gcig mchog gi gnas suni// thabs dang shes
rab bdag nyid sbyor// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dbang po drug/ bstan bcos tshad ma slob dpon dang// lung gi rjes 'bras de nyidashas// gsang don de nyid dngos
po yang// de nyid las ni gcig las gcig/ sngar gyi mtshan nyid thams cad kyi// stod sogs de nyidamtshan nyid kyis// lus kyi dris bkrus nas ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par sbyar
zla ba'i dkyil 'khoradabus gnas par/ ye shes soms dpa' bsam par bya// mdog dkar kund zla ba yi// 'od zer rnam par spro ba ni// phyug gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo lung// pa/
gnasal yang dag bzhugs// rgyuna rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par ma tshon// phyag rgya chen po phyag gnyis kyis// snying gi gnas su gzir bar mdzad// gzug
dang gzi brjid yongs gang ba// yashes sems dpar bsgom pa nyid// chushing ma tog lta bur ni// lte b.run yang dag gnas// langs nas snying khar kun tu gnas// sngar gyi mtshan nyid yong
gangabar// bton nas dang borapad+ma ni// 'dabam brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// khro ba dang ni 'brur bas/ yi ga rnam dgod dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yi// phyag gnyis zhal
gcig dkar po ni// bzang po dramod dbus su bsam// de yi dbus su rnam shes dang/ yi shes de nyid sbyar bar bya// dang po shar gyi 'dab ma la// byams par ldan pa'i mi bskyod pa// lho
yi sgor nisA rje nyid// mi chen de nyings sngon gnas// nub kyi sgo yi 'dab ma la// 'od dpag med pa'i sa bon dgod// byang gi sgo yi gnas su ni// sems kyis don yod gtso bo nyid// dang po'i
dbyangs sogs sa bon gyi// zla ba'i thog la dribazhin nam// zla ba'i 'od zer dkar brgyan pa'i// yi ga bzhin dgod par spya// mtshams rnams su ni ma ning nyid// rnam pa bzhi po sngar gsu/
pa de yi dbus su de'i sems kyi// yi ge yis ni sbyar bar bya// sems la the tshom 'khrungs lags pas// bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol// stong ba mtshon du med pa la// yi ga
rnal 'byor la sogs ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de nyid ji ltar rdo rje nyon// mtshan gzhi mtshan nyid stongab nyid// snying po med pa'i chu shing las// snying po bdud rtsi 'bras
'byung ltar// 'bras bu rnam shes ye shesan// gzugs med pa las ye shes gzugs// ye shes sku ni skyon medang// mtshan nyida mtshon du med pa nyid// daso dang dngos mod rnam par
rgyalaM// yig 'bru med las yig 'bru'i gzugs// de dbus ngo bo stongang// de nyid rnal 'byor pa yis gzung// ji ltar mtshan nyid shes kyang ni// mnyam nyid ya shi ems kyis ni// de yi
rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam// myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur// bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni// ye shes rnam shes ngo rgol sa// mtshan nyid bstan bcos mdor bsdus pa// de nyid dpa'
de ston pa po// 'di yasgom pa thams cad kyi/ 'od zer dkar pos rnam par rgyun// lcags sgrog lnga po mchod rten gyi// bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsam nas mi/ kha dog dkar po 'od
gsalab// bdud rtsi'i rgyunanu'adzag par gyur// snying gis bonapad dbusasu// mtha bong yongs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// de yi dbus su sa bonani// A li kA la yos btus ba// khadog dkar ngo shin
tshe du mdzes// zla ba'i 'od ze'i 'phro ba ni// de yi dbus su sgo rnams kyi// theg pa'i gzugs su rab tu grags// sku yi rtse mo brgya stong can// phra phab gzugs su yang dag gnas// rnam par shes ba'i/
rgyur bzhin las// ye shes can gyi mtshan nyida mtshon// go 'a thang gnas kyi thag la ltos// sems kyi mtshan nyid thams cad shes// snying la tshangs pa'i sgo yis// thig le no yi lam lasani/
bla ma'i man ngag brtson pa yi// rnam shes ye shes kyi yang rlung// lam gyi pha zol bstan bcos kyang// ma ya na ring bar gyur pa min// bstan bcos rnams ni red sla yang// sbyor ba de la rnyed par
dkab// rnal 'byor pa yi thabs kyis ni// bla ma gsol ba 'debs la brtson// bla ma'i man ngag lam gyis ni// rnam par mkhas pas mthong bar 'gyur// mnyam gzhag dngos bo'i rang bzhin
gyis// g.yo ba mngacing 'tshe ba med// yid ni chos rnams sngon du'agro// yid ni dag cing yade ltar mgyogs//yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' 'drin gyis// smra bo dag ni byed par 'gyur// de phyir yid kyis
bdag nyid kun// yid las byung bar blo ldan pas// sang khar sems bsgom sdom pa ni// gal te 'dod na pho gas pa zlog/ rgyu 'gyur pa'i sa bon te// de nyid dpyad pas ma yin no// 'bras
bu rgyu yi sa bon te// de nyidra mthong bam yin no// gzugs sogs srid pa'i las spyod kyi// dmigs pa'i sa bon rnam pa lo// spyi bos med yang dag gnas// kun nas 'dunagyis 'bab
pa'i gyur// rtag turtsa ba'i sa bon gyi// yang shos rnamashesas po las// thig las dang yang dag ldan// 'khor ba'i longasaspyod 'dzin pa yis// yid kyi bzlas pa yang dag ldan// yi
ga dag ni rnam par sras// nges par rtag tu go 'phang gnas// rtag pa dang ni chos kyi phyis// rtag tu smra zhing skyon mdang// ye sham la ni rnam shes nub// yeshos das pas rnam shes kyi//
rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim mthong 'gyur// dang por mtshan ma thams cad kyi// mar ma'i rnam pa nam thong bar 'gyur// gnyis par mtshan ma me khyer gyi// rnam pa ba rdul du mtshon bar byed// rdul dkar
tsan gdabyibs su// phyogs bcur de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur// gsum par nyon mongs bcom pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag/ lhayalas spyod 'dod pa yang// bzhi par yang ni bstan
ba'o/ lha yigazugs nithamasaM cad kyang// lnga par sems kyis brtag par bya// drug pa gcugs ni med pa'i tshe// bdun pa chos kyi dbyangs nyid de// brgyad par rang 'dod rnal 'byor pa'i dmangs
bu// rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu'i don// rdo rje sems dang 'a snying rje che// yod na gcig tu gyur pas nyon// nges par dngos po thams cad kyi// dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod// phyisani reradabye
ba yis// lha rnams kyis ni brjod par bya// lus can rnams kyi phung po dang// khams rnams dngan skye mched rnams// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag/ nyon mongs mi shes sgrib sbyang bya// rang rig khag
rmi nyid dag pa nyid// rtag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol man// yul gyis dngos po la drag pa'i phyir// rang gis rig pa'i bde ba'i mchog/ gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gang dang// gzhan yong rnal 'byor pa snang
kha dgunarang bzhin dag pa ste// de phyir sangs rgyas sna tshogs dngos/ kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la sogs pa'o// de ci'i
slad du zhen/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa// gzung bdang 'dzin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya// sman rnams mnyan par
ka bya drin stsa yis tshor bar bya// lce yis ro rig par bya// lus kyis dngos po rig par bya// yid kyis bde so gas thob pa ni// dag pas dug med byas nas ni// bstan bya 'di dag bsten par bya//

gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// tshor ba rdo rje nyi ma ste// bdushes pad+ma gar dbang phyug/ de bzhin 'du byed rdo rje rgyal// rnamashas rdo rje sams dpa' nyid// kun gyi ngo bo he ru ka/ mag la gto

mug rdo rjer bshad// zhe snangadzomasngon thos ba// phrag dog rdo rje de bzhin sna/ kha ni 'dod chags rdzoN+Dir bshad// rig la ser sna rdo rje ma// khams dang skye mched thams chung gi/ dam nga'i drab ng phyug
he ru ka/ sa yi khams ni ltung byed ma// chu khams gsod par byed mar brjod// me yi khams ni 'gugs byed ma// de bzhin rlung ni gar dbang phyug/ nam mkha'i khams su jarjod pa ni// pad+ma
'bar ba 'khyil pa nyid// 'di ltar lus can rnams kyi lus// phung po la sogs lha bdag nyid// bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin las/ nyon mongs la sogs des bskyed pa'i// bskyed pa'i cha la
legs gnas pas// srid dang mya ngan 'das pa thob// phung po dang skye mched rnam par dag pa ste lnga pa las rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o////de nas spyod pas rtog pa rnams// 'jig
par byed pa bshad par bya// chos rnams kun la mnyam byung ba/ de nyid spyod pa gong na med// sangs rgyas sras la phan pa'i phyi'i// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam gnas pa// gapa zhig yang ni res
las// rdo rje yan lag med pa yi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ skye ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs chen por// sgo ga'i rlabs kyis 'khrugs pa las// sems can thams cad slol bar byed//
tshong pa dge bar 'gro ba dang// myur du dngos grub gsal byed cing// snying bo'i yon tan kun gyi gnas// sems kyi rin chen las byung ba// 'dod don rab tu sgrub par byed// jorje 'dzin pas rab/
bsngags pa'i// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yon tan na// lus byung bdi la ma gtogs par// dga' ba'i dngos grub 'byung mi 'gyur// mkhas mchog spyod pa mtshungs m pa 'di/
grol bar 'dod pas spyad par gyis// lha yi dag dong brgya byin dang// grong khyer sum brtsigs dgra bo dang// nor sbyin tshangs pa la sogs pasaM// zhabs kyis ma skyes mchod pa yi// sdig pa
'jag byed 'di laspyodo// myur du de bzhin gshegs pa yi// gnas kyi mchog ni thos par 'gyur// dpal ldan rdo rjesems dpas na// gang zhig bgro la phan nga rano// kun 'dar gyi ni spyod pa gsu/
de ltar mchog tu bsam yas gnas// shin tu gsang ba yags bsgom// rtog pa thams cad bral bar ni// dam tshig la ni spyad par bya// rgyumathun 'bras bu rang bzhin las// dang po'i rtsom par
yo gi gnas// de nas bsgom pas dub pa na// bsdus nas byis pa'i rtsa ba bya// sna tshogs gdul bya'i 'jig rten 'a// 'jum pa'i gzugs can ranyid bsgom// grub par grags pa ma lus pa//
rtsi gsungs rnam pa sna tshogs pa ni// srodapas bla na med pa yis// kun bzang mtshungs pa med 'grub pas/ spyod pa nges rig rdorje can// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// dpal ldan slog

dpon rdo rje can// kun gyi mgon la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i spyod pas gnas nas ni// blo gros chen po bya ba byas// de nas rang gi 'ad sgyur bas// sbyor ba kun la kha phyir bltas// kun tu seng gi lta
surani// de nyid ldan pas bdag gis spyod// ji ltar byung don yang dag rig/ 'gro ba 'don pa'i bsam pa yis// yang dag lta ba rab sgyur bdag/ brtan pa'i sems ni gnas med pas// phung po khams
sogs mtshan nyidAn// thams cad rmi lam sgyu ma ltor// khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni// mdor bsdus nas ni 'dir shes bya// sgrib pa kun las rnam par grol/ 'tsho bar dbang phyug
'dub rung// de bzhin 'jig rten chos brgyad nits+tsaM/thams capashin tu ring du spangs// rtag tu rtog pa med gyur pas// gnyis su med par nges byas nas// pha rol phyin drug rnal 'byor gyis// sangos
rgyus dngos grub rab grub phyir// sems can ngon la legs nus kyang// sems can yongs su brtag mi bya// byang chub la ni soms bzhag nas// phyogs las rgya' pa'i spyod pa brtsam// thabs dang
shes rab ldan pa'i bdag/ sbyor ba kun la rgyab kyis phyogs// de nyid goms par dpa byas pas// skye ba 'dir ni 'grub par 'gyur// rtog pa kun las rnam par grolo// sems can bsam
pa khyad par las// skyag ltar rtogs rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad nyid nibaza' bar bya// chos kyi dbyings las yang dag byung// mi mthun phyogs ni gang yang med// dogs pa med pa'i sem
kyis ni/ ji ltar 'dodob rab tu bza'// longs spyod rdzogs donabadi dag kun// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpas rnam par sprul// ge/
mthub yas thob pa yis// de bzhin gshegs phyag ma bya na// rtag tu sgom par ldan pa yis// dbang bskur med sogs smos ci dgos// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin
las// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// de phyir de nyid lha rnams 'du// dkyil 'khor bsung bu mi bya zhing// phyag rgya mchod rten las mi bya// dpal ldan
rdo rjemagonapos ni// gang yang gzhan du bstan pa rnams// lhag par mos pas gnas gang yang// de rnams kyis kyang de skyod rig/ ji ltar bdud rtsi don gnyer bas// snying de byas nas
dur ba spong// de ltar chos kyi sAng po ni// thob nas rtog pa thams cad spras// rtog med gang tshe blo ldan pas// dogs pa spangs shing gnas med gi/ thugs kyi rdo rje rtse gsungs bzhin//
dra tshe 'grub 'gyur tho tsom med// rtog pas dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur te// 'gro ba drug gi 'khor bar ni// 'khor ba mu ni 'khor bar 'gyur// rtog pa med na grol 'gyur zhing// gnas ni dri med zhi ba
nyid// de phyir rtog pa'i dra gzhos phyir// dam tshig sas rgyas mdzad pa gdaM/ de ni rtag tu goms par bya// gang gis dam tshig gnas gyur pa// sngagasashes bsam gi nus pas bya//
dngos po kun la blta bar bya// nges par thams cad m skyes ba'i// rnam pa yi ni rnal 'byor gyis// khyi dang bong bu rdza mo dang// glang bo la sogs khrag 'thungs nas/ sha yang rtag du bza'/
ba nyid// lha chen khrag gis gos pa ni// thams cad khyad par du ni blta// dman bshani thams cad dang// srog chags 'bum phrag brgya ldan pozab// rnam snangashin turul pa yi// srin bu brgya phrag
zi khri ldan// khyi dang mi skyugs bsrasanus nI shani rdoyi chu go ldan// rnal 'byor bas na spro ba la// nam snang bsus nas bza' bar bya// jo lnga'i chu ni btung bar bya// gang gi tshe'abang bza' ba
ma gyur na// gzhan du rnamo par rtog pa'isha'i rang gi ngo bos bza' ba bslab ban bya ste// gang zhig gzhan pa'i 'jig rten sra ba de bza' bar bya'o// de kho na'i sgrub pa po'i dbang po gang zhig
bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa de la bgrod par bya ba dang/ gang zhig bya ba ma yin pa de ni de'i bya ba dang/ bgrod pa dang bgrod par bya ba ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa dang/ bza' ba dang bkra' bar bya
ba ma yin pa dang/ sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang/ btung ba dang btung ba ma yin par sngags pas mi bya ste/ sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs mnyam par gzhag par gzhag par bgyur ro// ji lta
ji ltar yang sems 'khrul ba ma yin pa de ltar chang rnal 'byor pas rtag tu btung bar bya ba dang/ man pas yon tu sgog pa dang/ rigs dang bcas pa dang/ 'gas med pa dang/ sdug cing 'phongs
pa'i sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa'i tshul gyis rgyal lta bur blta ba dang/ glegs bam bklags par gsungs pa mi bya ba dang/ dkyil 'khor dang ma rtog bsdu bar mi bya po dang/ sngags
kyi bzlas pa mi bya ba dang/ lha dang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa la phyag mi bya ba dang/ brdzun du sku pa dang/pha rol gyi bud med skal ba bzung ma bstan par bya ba dang/ gdug
pa can la byams pa mi bya ba gsungs pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang srog chags gsad pa dang/ rgyal bsamatshod pa'i slob dpon dang/ngashes kyi dam tshig ni sems can te/ dam tshig rtag tu
dngos grub sna tshogs sbyin par byed de/ blo dang ldan pa la phyogs bcur rnam bar bzhugs pas mchod par byed do// gang gi phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams
ga zhig slob dpon gyi ba spu'i khung bu'icomo la mthong ba de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpas slob dpon lasangs rgyas kyis mchod pa byed pa mthong ngo// nges par rang gi dam tshig sangs rgyas 'dod

pas dngos grub sbyin par byed pas bla ma dam pa la smad par mi bya ba dang/ dordzi snyan la mi gus par mi bya ba dang/ gang zhig byin pa de bzung nas mchod rten la phyag mi bya ba dang/ spun dang/ bu dang/
dang/ rgyal srid kyi wis sbyod dang/ gter dang/ nor bu dang/ 'bru thams cadol rtsa lta bur mthong nas khams gsum gyi rgyal po bsgrub par bya// 'khyud pa 'am spyod pa so lnga pa las rab tu byed/
pa gsum pa'o/// de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// spyod pa pha rol phyin mtshan nyid// gang gis ring nas shes pa'o// rdzi ya gir the tshom med// mkha' 'gro ma sogs/
ta7 gtor mni// ji ltar rnyed dang bza' btung ni// de bzhin rnal 'byor pa yis bzab// de yi dkyis ma'i gos bzang dang// ro bsreg thal bas rnam par brgyan// thu chagashin tu gsang ba ni//
mtshan mo'i dus su rgyu bar bya// ba'i mdo dang ni ri bo dang// shing gcig gAm ni dur khrod dang// bzhir ni de nas sngags pa yis// sgom pa bzang po bya bar brjod// mcho'i khyim dang mtshan
mo dang// yang na dbon pa 'am bas mthar ni// cung zad drod ni thob pa yis// grol tu spyod pa byed 'dodan// bdag nyidAgal te 'grub 'dod pas// byis pa bzhin du spyad nas ni// semA
can rjes su gzung pa'i rgyur// blo ldan na bos rgyu bar bya// zhen pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// kha drog can gyis rtog sgrib pa// ba spu'i khung bu'i rtsa bug gnas// phyogs bcu rnams su/
dbyung bar bya// 'jam pa'i rdo rjer rang gyur nas// dkyil 'khor par nu rab tu brtag/ patsA'i tshal ni nyams dga' ba bam// chu bo 'dus pa rnams su yang// dur gnas
bsgoms na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// phug gram ri yi rtse mor ni/ shAn tu mnyim par bzhag dras gnas// ji ltar rnyed pa bzhin du bzang// zos shing zes nas gtor ma sbyin//
'bras bu sna tshogs rdo shel sogs// 'ol mazi sog de bzhin smras// srog chags yan lag gos gon zhing// bde don gnyer la bde ba sbyi// res 'ga'alegs sbyar zur bcag ni/
bzlog pa yis ni 'don par byed// bza' dang brdab mni rnyed pa// smonaba'i sbyorabs bza' bar bya// gzhan pa'i yul 'khor grub pa dang// ri yi thug dang tshang tshing dang//
gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod che// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram du yang// de gnas shes rab can gyis bosgom// skyag pa thams cad rnam spangs te// ji ltar byas nas rnal 'byor bas// yang ni
phyogs las rnam rgyal btsal// sgrib pa kun las rnam por grol// phyogs bcur rnam par gnas pa yi// skye ba'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa yi// kun gyi bsam pa yongs su bgangs//
gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa kun// sgom pas spras shing rnam par spangs// 'dis ni sgom pa thams cad kyis// phyogs las rnam rgyal mngon par brjod// de ltar re zhig gnas byas nas/
de nyid mi shigs rnal 'byor pas// rig ma'i lha mo 'dod pa yi// shin du gzugs can bsdus nas bya// chus byung yid 'ong mi chen dang// rig pa 'dzin pa'i nyams dga' ma// lha yi bu mo
gnod sbyin mo// yang n klu mo rkang 'og tu// gnas pa dang ni lha min mo// 'di nang yo gi rig ma gsog/ rang gi sems la mngon 'dod pa// lcags kyu zhags pa nyirab 'byor bas// rnal
'byor pa yis bkug nas bsgrub// lta bar dgos pa rgyas pa kun// ma bsrungs par ni lha yis ster// sgadang nad las rnam par grol// gnyis med gnas gsum sdig pa yod// lus kyi sbyin

tab/ ba byin nas ni// phyis ni spyod ba yang drag brtsam// sal dang skal min rnam dpyad pas// de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya// bsra' brtsab de bzhin btung pa nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa bza' bar bya// yid 'ong mi

'ong rnam rtog phyir// zhan pa tsam du mi bya 'o// bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol// de bzhin ngo tsha'i bya ba nyid// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// yo gis rnam dpyad snying rje cha// mchod sbyin sbyin
sreg dka' thub 'dus// sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs// dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol// shin tu rnal 'byor ldan spyod kyis// nges par sngon du lha min gang// brgya byin lta bu yiso
na yang// de la 'jigs par mi bya ste// seng ga'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rtag tu snying rjes btung bar bya// rnal 'byor btung dgakha rnal 'byor pa//
gzhan pa'i btung bas bzi ba med// yang na dpal ldan rgyal tshab che// brtulaM zhugs spyod pa'i ng bsgrags pa yang// gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//
som pa po yis rnam gzung ba// rna ba dag 'a rnacha bzang/ spyi bor 'khor lo rnam par 'an// lag pa dag la lag gdub nyid// da pa la ni sku 'gag nyid// rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub bo//
dpung pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan 'di// mgrin pa la mnor bu ste// bgo ba stag gi bags pa nyid// bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de// ha ra ka sbyor skyes bu nyid// mnyam par gzhag pas gnas par bya//
tu bzhin bzungamig yang ma// rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can// rdo rje bu mo 'di khyer nas// rtsod pa'i brtul zhugs rtogs par bya// rdzogs rigs kyi daa med na//

gang zhig rang gi 'dod pa'i lha'i// rigs kyis kyang ni bya ba'o// yang na gzhon gyi rigs byung ba// byang chub sa bon bcug ba yis// sbyang bar byas takhyer nas no// gang tshe rdorje mchog ldan par// de tshe
glu ni blang bar bya// gang tsho dga' ba skyes pa na// thar pa'i rgyur ni gar bya ste// de tsho rdo rje rkang pas gar// rtag turnal 'byor pa yis bya// 'khor lo gzugs kyis mi skyod pa// rna cha'i bdag
da 'od dpag med// mgul gyi 'phring ba rin chen bdage/ lag par rnam par snang mdzang brjod// sa rags la nangon yod gnas/ shes rab la hUM ga gzugs can// thabs kyi gzugs
kyicang 'a// sman ni rnam par bza' bar bya// muni rtag tu btung bya ste// gshis zil gyis mi non cing// kun tu bsrung bar gyur pa yin// rkun ma'oskus byas cod pan can// de la hU~M byung
sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas lngaya thod ba rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin// sor lnga'i dum bur byas nas ni// cod pan la ni rnam par 'dzin// thabs dang shes rang bzhin lasaM//
sgo yis sa 'gas nyis skor nyid// thal ba sgra yi mchong phyir thogos// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dze/ cang te'u sgra ni bzlas pa ste//soms can thams cad mgron gnyer ba'o// kha TaM ga me/

[“]rab ste// rdo rje bzlas dang sgom pa yis// thod pa can du rang gyur pa// brkam dang rmongs dang de bzhin 'jigs// khro dang ngo tsha'i bya ba ni// rtag tu rnam par sbyang bar bya// han ka bdag rnal 'byor ba//
rigs lnga la ni gnas par bya// rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan par// rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag/ gas gcig du ma skyid kyis// gang phyir dbye ba bskyod mi bya// bdag nyid kyis
ni gnyis spangs nas// the tsam med par spyod par bya// dpal yang dag par sbyor ba las byung ba las spyod pa'i brtag pa ste lnga ba'o// lha logs mnyan par 'tshal lag
na// rang byin brlab pa'i dam ce lags/[” ]gsang ba lasogs dgos pa so// rdo rje soms dpa' snying rje mo// yid ni gcig tu gyur pas nyon// thams cad rgyud kyi gtan phab pa//
mdor bsdus nas ni bsgrag par bya// ma yi rnam pa gang gsungs pa// gnas kyi mtshan nying mi gsal bar// 'gro dang rjes su 'ong ba nyid// khams dang sems kyi rtag 'gro bu'o//
khams zhes bya ba'i sgra du lags// bcom ldan 'dus kyis bkab stsal pa// 'di ltar gsangabu'i yi ge bcu drug brjod par bya ste/ rwa yi rnam pa khrag gi khams// hani de bzhin reg bya nyid/
skye ni bad kan zhes byur gsungs// pa yi rnam pa sems nyid dang// ra yi rnam pas de nyid de// mos ni de bzhin ste tshel dag/ ra ni ma nyid du ni gsungs// ma ya rnam pa sha ru gsung
0 @#// sa yi rnam pa bshang bar gsungs// rma ye rnam pa ga de bzhin tshil// nu pags pa nyid du gsungs// ni yi rnam pas nus pa nyid// sa ni gce nga nyid du gsungs//
gled pa'i rnam pas glo ba nyid// sbyin pad+ma nyid du gsus// shin tu mdzes pa 'i rdzas dang ldan// ta yi rnam pas khu ba ni// byang chub sems las byung ba yi// rtsa yi sgra pa rang bzhin las// de
u0fc4 ltar lha ma bsgrags pa yin// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin lus// cha yi bdag nyid 'gyur ba nyid// ra na ma zhes bya bar gsus// khrug los mkhris pa yang dag byangs// mtshan nyid
lagacig 'dod bad kan las// rdul dang chu rgyus yang dug byung// de yi mgon por brjod pa'i rlung// ha ni kun tu 'gro bar gsungs// rus pa'i mtshams ni 'di rnams su// sa bon lnga ni yang
dag btab// kan tu ra dang thams cad du/ sa bon bozhi na dam pa nyid// dang po'i ri mgo gnas der ni// sa bon lnga ni mdzes pa nyid// han dbyas kya drug ldan nga// rnam par shes par
tsha yos su grags// ha yi rnam pas thams cad du// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par gyur// sgra yi tshul las byung bton zhing// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul nyid// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba
thog ma dbus ma ba yang dag gnas// srub dang srub byed sbyor ba las// ji lta ba ni de bzhin no// sngags bzlos bsam gtan la sogs ldan// rgyud las gsungs pa mnyan par gyis// rtsa
gnyis skye gnas dbus su ni// g.yon dang g.yas su de bzhin du// g.yon du bu ba rnam shes bya// g.yas pa la ni khrug nyid de// de yi phan tshun bsdu ba yang// chos kyi duphyis ni sdud pa yin// snying

stobs sku dang rdul ngag bcas// mun pa sems kyi rang bzhin las// snying stobs khu ba rin chen rdul// mun pa skyed par byed pa nyid// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas// dngos dang dngos med ro gcig 'gyur//

bshang ba gcib bad kan dang// khrag dang lnga pa khu ba nyid// bdud rtsi lnga yi gong bu dngos// de phyir rdo rjen du brjod// rus pa rkang dang khu bani// pha las skyes par de bzhin gsungs// pags pa dang ni
ngag dung khrag/ ma las skyes pa zhes byar bsgrags// gong bu'i bsdu ba rnams kyi yang// tshong ni 'di dag gsungs pa ste// gong bu gcig pu gnyis su 'gyur// gnyis su gyur pa du ma rnams//
gcig du du ma'i rang bzhin gyis// de phyir rdo rjecan 'dar gsungs// rtswa yi spyod yul nyid gsungs pa// de yi sgo yang de gnyis la// de rnams 'du ba'i dus su// lha ni dmigs par 'gyur ba yani/
steng gi sgo dang 'og nyid de// 'og gi sgo ni rnam par shes// stong gi sgo ni dbyings nyid do// rtsa na thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// rnal 'byor pas ni'ajug par bsam// de yi lus kyi steng sgo la'ang//
rdo rje can gyi rtag rgyun bzhugs// steng gi sgor na sbyor ba gsum// sgo dgu rnams kyis yongs su bskor// kye bcom ldan 'das/ sbyor ba gsum ni ci zhes bshad// ji ltar gong gi rnam pa yas/
tsa @#// sems kyi rtag tu 'gro ba lags// bcom ldan bdas kyis bka' stsal pa// gsum nyid sbyor basbyor ba gsum// rnam gsum dbye bas rnam par gnas// sku gsung thugs
kyi rang bzhin gyis// thum 'bring po dam pa nyid// ka ba gcig dang sgo dgu pa// sbom po lnga ni lhag pa'i lha// dug pa dogur nison pa'i sgo// dgu yi rnam par yongs su grags// tho ma'i sgo ni skur
ldan pa// sbom po lha yi sprul pa 'o// sems dang skyes bu skyes bu can// khyad par rnal 'byor pa yi don// rtag par kun tu dus su ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i khyad pas las// rkang med rkang gag
rkang gnyis dang// rkang bso las sogs pa yi// rlung la sogs pas rab dbye bas// rtag tu 'gro brlung rnam bzhi// sems kyi gnas pa rnam pa gnyis// nub dung rang rgyu'i cho ga yis//
rtag tu nub dwang rob rgyu ba// sems can kun la 'gro ba ko/ de ltar grang zhig ma rig pa// sems med skyes bu yod pa dang/ yid dang ldan pa med dang dang// rnal 'byor pa yi don med pa// me nyid gang

chu dang rlung dang ni// dbang chen dang ni de bzhin chu// bakhor lorasams kyi kun spyod pa// stong dang ngos dang drang 'og 'gro// zla ba khyima'i rab dbye bas// gsum pa'i sgron yang dung bcas// rdub dang dbyung
ba ba gnyis ka yang// sgo yi dam pa nyid yin te// gtsobo dam nga yi ni sgo// stong dang 'og tu rab tu grags// 'og gi sgos ni rnam pa shes// steng gi sgos ni dbyings nyid de// rnam snang la sogasaM
[o/ ]sangs rgyas rnams// stong gi sgor ni g.yo shang gnas// de rnams 'og tu rnam par gnas// stong gis gshegs su gsol ba nyid// dgug dang gshegs su gsel ba yi// tshul gyi sems
kyis rtag tu 'gro// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo rnams// 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa la// yon tan skyon ni'abu brjod pas// bde dang sdug bsngal rang
bzhin gyis// lhan cig skyes pa grupa pa'i gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen po// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan lha mos ni// kho kak+ko lar bcug nas// sems
dang 'a chen po mnyis byas to// tshig ni 'di dag yang dag gsol// dpyade rtses bgyi ba ji ltar lags// theg le bgyi ba ji ltar lags// mi phyed ma sogs ji ltar gnas// de yi gnas ni ji ya
lags// bu wer sogs ci gsungs dang// 'khor la bkod pa de bzhin gzhan// ji ltar rtsa yi rdzogs pa yi// do yi dbye ba bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
lha mo bshad par bya yisanyon// gsang ba las ni rjes gsang mchog/ rtsa yi rang bzhin dang/ gnas la sogs pa dang/ sa bcudang pha rol tu phyin pa'i sku dang/ ga sung dang thub kyi 'khor lar
son pa gnas kyi nang gi rab tu dbye bas nyi shu rtsa bzhir gsungs pa/ spyi bo ma la ya yi yul// de bzhin spyi gtsug 'ba' ba 'dzin// de bzhin du ni u rgyan nyedi// rna ba g.yas pa nyid du brjod/
rtsib ma'i rgyab nas duta// bzhi ni gnas zhes bya'o// rnab g.yon pa'i rang bzhinAni// de bzhin go du ba ri shes// dga' ba'i dbang phyug bshad pa ni// nama'i dbus gnam
btu bskul// de bzhin mig dag lha mo'i mkha'// lag pa'i rtsa bar mA la ba// de lta nyiba'i gnas nyid de// thugs kyi 'khor lor rnam par gnas// gnas kyi khyad par rang bzhin gyi/ mkha' spyod
rnams kyi yang dag bshad// man khung ka ma ru pa nyid// num o trar rab tu grags// 'di dag zhing du yang dag brjod// lte ba tri sha kunir brjod// sa yi rtse mor ko shA lA// nye ba'i zhing du brjod
pa'o// kha ni ka ling ka ru brjod// mgrin de laM pa ka ru gsungs// rno hazhes rnam par bshad// snying ni kar brjod pa ste// dbang po he ma la ya da// lta ba yi ni rtsor brjod// de ltar yul
rnams thams cad du// gsung gi 'khor lor rnam par gnas// gnas kyi khyad byar yul gyi ni// sa spyod rnams kyi yang dag bshad// rtags la yi dgas lhag par gnas// gsang ba la ni
khyim gyi lha// 'di dago 'du bar brjod pa'o// badran sopAny+tsar brjod// rje drar gnyis n gsar gleng gi/ rang gi ngo bor rnam par bshad// nyo ba yi ni 'dub nyid// sor mo na gar ru brjod// rkang pa'i
rgyab ni sin+d+haranges// dur khrod du ni yang dag brjod// mthe bong la ni ma ru zer// pus mo ku lu tAn brjod// 'di dag nye ba'i dur khrod nyid// mkha' 'gro mar ni gsungs pa'o// 'di dag lul dang/
rang lus skyes// rang gi nang dang phyi rol gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la// nyishu rtsa bzhir bya ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni kun gyi gnas// thams cad du ni sang drag bshad// 'di
rnams gnas su mkha' 'gro ma// rtsa yi gzugs kyis yang dag gnas// drug pa las rab tu byed pa dang ngo co////de nas gzhan yang dam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i

ji ltar gnas su son pa'i rtsa'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o// snyingagi nang son pa datso/ 'dab ma brgyad pa snying por bcas// de yi nang du son pa'i rtsa// mar me'i rang gi ngo bo can// chu shing gi ni ma tog

lhar// brkyang zhing/ kha ni 'og tu'o// de yi nang gnas dang 'gro ga/ yungs kar gyi na sbom phra tsam// mi shig hUM gi sa bon ni// kha ba lta bur 'dzag pa chung// lus can rnams kyi sing dga' ba// dpyid
ces bya bar rnam par bshad// rgod ma'i ma yi gzugs kyis ni// bdag med ma ni thig ler brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yis// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du ni 'acan// ngapyid thog
pa yi tshog ngashes pas// snyoms par 'jug pas rnam par gnas// dpa' bo shA ni he ru ka/ bdin dpyid kyi thig ler brjod// rnal 'byor ma yi gzugs 'dzin ma// rgyu dang mi rgyu bcas par gnas/
sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas ni// sgo ni rnam gsum byung ba las// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong bar byed// 'di ni kun gyi lus la gnas// lte bar a yi gzugs kyis ni// zung dun ni sib tugrags/
'a@#// su la yung ni hUM nyid ni// ring po ma mo gnyis dang gnas// mgrin par a gyi gzugs kyis ni// ma mo gsum brjod pu lu ta// dpral bar hU~Mgi rnam pa 'di/sgra dang thig le
mishigs pa// 'khor lo bzhi ni rab dbyebs// sasogs 'byung ba chen po dang// thun bzhir byin gyis brlabs pa dang// brlabs las byung ba dang// dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor bzhi ni
mngon du'o// mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo yAsi// bya dang byed pa'i dngos po las// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs kyis ni// 'dzin ji ltar bdo bar rol// 'dab ma rnams kyi gzhi la yang// 'byung bzhi
pa'i yi rtsa rnams ni// mar me'i rang bzhin lta buran// phyogs bzhi la ni rnam par gnas// rtswa rnams bzhi yang mtshams rnams su// rnam par gnas shing rir son pa'i ng// bdud rtsi lnga ni 'bar
pa ste// de mchod rang gi gzugs gnas pas// de yi dngos po'i ngo bo las// mchod pa bzhin rnam par bshad// lus kyi snying ginang du ni// rtsa lnga rnams ni rnam par gnas// sku gsung thugs
kyi dbye ba yis// ti shu rtsa bzhir 'bar brjod// gnas sogs dbye ba la gnas nas// gnas dang gnas la rnam par gnas// spyi bor yang dag byung ba yi// rtsa ni spyi bo skyes zhes brjod// dul
dang snying stobs mun pa'i tshul// de yi nang nas gtso mo ni// pu werar ni mi phyed ma// so dngasemamo 'bab par brjod// 'bar ba 'dzin pa phra gzugs so// de bzhin sgra dang ba spu 'bab// u rgyan
gnas ni chen po la/ rtsa ba ma ni rnam par gnas/ rna ba g.yas par gnas nas ni// pags pa drin 'bar ma gnas// achu dur ni g.yon pa ma// mkha' 'gro ma ni sha 'babam// gang zhig
chuN+yas 'bab pa'i rtsa// nga yi mchog sbyin rnam par gnas// nga ni sra ba'i tshul gyis gnas// thung ngu mar ni rnam par bshad// gang zhig jaga' ba'i dbang phyug ga gnas// de bzhin rus sbal skyes mar
gragis// sra ba'i dngos pos gnas pa'i phyir// rus pa'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs par gnas// lha mo'i mkhar dugang zhig rtsa// 'jam pa sgom pa ma ru brjod// de ni rtag tu mchin pa 'bab// thams cad
lus la rtag par gnas// mA la war ni dbang ma ni/ rgyal ba'i dbang phyug snying la gnas// rtsa ni gang zhig mig 'bab ma/ 'dod pa'i gzugs su rnam par gnas// gzugs ni mtho bar 'do
pa ste// skyon bral ma zhas rnam par bshad/ oTar mkhris pa 'bab pa'icu// gang zhig 'jug ma chen mor brjod// tIsha ku ner byung bani// ma mo nges par glo bar bcas// keg laranemtshan

mo nyid// rgyu ma'i 'phrengabazang khyab cing 'bab// ka ling krar ni bsil sbyin m// sa kyi cha rgyus yang dag bshad// tshob ma ni lto gnas ngas// laM pA kan ni rab tu grags// tshad ma ring ni kany+tsir
gnas// thems cad du ni bshang ba 'bab// mtshams kyi mtha' yi nang du yang// kha ba'i gnas su ras pa'i gdong// thin tu gzugs can bad kan ldan// yi dgas lhag gnas yang dag gan
[s] ]@#// gang zhig rtag tu rnag 'bab pa// khyim gyi lhar ni yang dag gnas// mkha' 'gro dam pa'i dbang phyug ma// sbyim nyid du rnam par bshad// sorawAr na gang zhig rtsa// rgyu sbyin m ni
dmar po 'bab// rdul ni 'bab par gyur pa ni// gser gling dun yang dag bshad// yan log gzi brjid kun khyab ma// sbyor bral mar ni 'ab tu grags// na ga rar ni sdu gum// tshil can sbom zhing myos
ts+tshA byed 'bab// sin d+hun shin tu grub ma 'di// mya nganamachim 'bab mar brjod// ma rur gnas ma ludasam 'bab// 'tshod ba ma zhes rnam par bstan// ku lu tar na yid bzos ma// sha dang snabs nib
ma'o// drug pa las yul gyi dgod pa ste rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o/// lha lags mnyan par 'tshul lags na// nang gi dkyil 'khor mchod pa las// sogs pa'i las ni ji ltar lag
sbyin sreg las mi 'tshol bas// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa// ha ru ka la sogs pa'i lha// rtsa gzugs mdzes par yang dag byung// lus kyi dkyil le'i
nyams dga' bar// sgo bzhir ji skad gsungs pa'o// rang gi yan lag brgyad byung bas// ka ba de yis bskor nas gnas// dngos po kun gyis mnyam pa'i phyir// gru bzhi pa ni rab tu grugs// sku gsung
thugs kyi ngo bos si/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lor gcig tu gsungs// rini mgo bo'i zi 'bru la// ji ltar rtsom chen la sogs rim// bla ma'i dus thabs rim nyid kyis// da ni rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gnas//
rkang nga 'i mthil du rtsom chan rung// gzhu yi dbyibs su rnam par gnas// sum mdo yi ni gnas su ni// de bzhin gru gsum 'bar ba nyid// zum pa ba rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// chu'i lto bar rnam
par gnas// snying kar yang nas nyid du// kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do// sgal tshigs dbyug gu'i gzugs kyis ni// ri 'bar rgyal de bzhin no// don spyi bo'i char gnas pa// 'dab skyes 'dab masum cu
