rkang pa'i las ni sams kyi 'jug pa'o// thar pa'i cha dang ldan pa ni dag ba'i rtsa ba la 'dun pa'i bdag po dang/ rab tusbyor ba'i bdag po dang/ dmigs pan cha gso pa med pa'i bdag po dang/ brjed
pa med pa'i bdag po dang/ rnam par 'byed pa'i bdag po ste/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga po rnams rig par bya'o// de la za ba po dang bza' bar bya bas stong pa bka'
stsal pa/ nang gi skye mched rnams nas brtsams te/ phyi rol gyi bza' ba stong pa nyid dang/ de'ilus kyi za ba po dang/ bza' ba dag gang zhig byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus de'i stong pa nyid la'ang lta

zhing skyo bas 'du byed spong bar byed de/ dag ba mi zad pa dang/ gang yang khyad par du bltas pas naang dang phyi rol stong pa nyid du gsungs so// rab tu gnas pa'i dngos po snod kyi 'jig rten rgyas pa'i

phyir de stong pa nyid ni chen po stong pa nyid ces gsungs so// de'ang nang gi sku mchod rnams la sogs pa gang gis stongapa nyid mthong ba stong pa nyid kyi yi shes kyi de'i stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do//
ji ltar don dam pa'i rnam pas mthong ba'i de'i stong pa nyid ni don dam pa'i stong pa nyidado// de'i don du'ang byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu spyod do// de'i stong pa nyid kyi don ji ltar 'tshal bar/
bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge ba gnyis 'thob don du dge ba'i 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas gnyis so// rtag tu sems can la phan pa'i phyir dang//

rgyus sems can la shin tu phan pa'i don du 'khor bami spang ba'i phyir de'i phyi'i stong pa kaudagithog ma dang tha ma med ba stopatid do// rgyun mi 'chad par 'khor ba stong pa nyid du ma mthong bas skyo ste/ 'khor ba

yosasu sbyong bar byed do// gang yang dag bam zad par khyad par du lta bas myun las 'das par yang mi byed cing/ de'i stong pa nyid sbyong bar yang mi byed d/ 'din blang ba dang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/

de rigs kyang rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la/ rigs ni rang bzhinati/ ngob rnyed do// mtshan dang dpe byad thob par bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba la/ skyes bu chan po'i mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas
bar thob par bya ba'i phyir dang/ dag par bya ba'i phyirasas rgyas kyi chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa' rnams rab tu spyod do// khyad par gyi stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sbyong ba'i phyir
zhig stongapad 'acu ba rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o// yang 'di stong pa nyid gangazhin/ chos dang gang zag gi don dao lo mad pa stong pa nyid de/ de'i phyir de las byung ba don dam pa'i dngos po
tshadiradi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi rol gyi chos dang gang zag dngos la mdo pa stong pa nyid las byung ba'agacig pa dngas pa'// dngangasku bcug dag par
dang/ phyi sol gyi chos dang gang zag dngos po med pa stongapa tid las byung ba'i gcig pa'i dngos po'o// der ji skad gsungs pa'i zab mo la sogs pa stong pa'i phyir stong pa nyid bcu drug/
dumtshan nyid bshad pa'i don du gzhung gnyis su stongapa nyid rnam par gzhag par bya ste/ dngos bo mad pa stongapa nyidadang/ dungos po med pa'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid do/ chos dang gang zag la ya

'jug pa de'i stong pa nyid jisad ba yos su spang ba'i don du rim pa lha ba de ltar stos nyid kyirab tu dbye bar shes par bya'o// dziltar b sgrub par rnam par shes par bya zhe na/ gal te 'di kun nas nyon mongs

ba can du ma gyur na lus can thams cad grol bar 'gyuralo// gal te 'de rnam par dag par m gyur na brtsams pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro// gal te chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid glo bur gyi kun nas nyon mongaH
pa ma skyes pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyis kun nas nyon mos pacan du ma gyuran kun nas nyon mos pa dngos po med pa'i phyir 'bad pa med pa nyid du sems can thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas
ma skyas pa'i yang mimathun pa'i phyogs kyis rnam par dag par 'gyur nye thorapa'i don du rtsom pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur ro// de ltar byas n nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa dang/ dag pa
0 @#// zhing dag pa'i ng ma yin no// de ltar stong pa nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba gsus so// de la stong pa nyid kyi mdor bsdus pa'i don sgrub pa yin no// yang gsungs pa/ 'dod chags kyi gzhon/
borami sdug pa la sogs pa dang/ zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams pa dang/ gti mug gi gnyen por rjen cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// de la ji lta'adidachags rnam par ldog can/ gal te de dang 'gal ba'iphyir
ba zhin/ yin mod kyi gang zhig de skad du 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid du byed pa na 'dod chags dang bral ba yin no// de bzhin du gsungs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu a ma'osangs rgyas thums cad
kyi 'dod chags kyi yoshesanarnyog pa med pa sto/ 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral ba bcom nas bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed do/ 'dod chags la sogs pa ni nga bzhin gyis kha na ma tho ba med pa dar
gnas pa ste/ gzhan du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'dod chagasarnyed pa yin na de'i 'dod chags la sogs pa yongs su mi sbyong bar spyod na/ 'onate rim pa'i khyad par las yon tan gyi khyad par 'byung bar 'gyur
ba dparan ke ta ka'i me tog dri'i glang bo chas zos na glartsi la sogs pa'i dngos por 'gyur ro// glang po che phal pas zosonalce ba'i dngos por gyur ro// dbas na de la ka ta ka'i ma tog gi skyonam

yin te// de bzhin du 'dodachags la sogs pa'i nganam par dag pa'i rim pa la gnas pas bsam pa'i khyad par gyi sbyor ba la khyadaba' dul bags pa nyid kyi 'bras bu smin par 'gyur go/dpar ma sbrul la sogs pas
'thus na dug gi dngos por 'gyur ro// gzhan yang skyes bus ba thusan bdud rtsi 'i dngos por skye bar 'gyur ro// de ltar rigs kyi bu 'dod chags la sogs pa bsam pa'i khyad par gyis rang bzhin gyis

khanam blo khamad pa'i phyir sbyor bas dngos po khyad par can gyi 'bras bu 'byung bama'agyur ro// gang dngagang khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyun gyi dngos po dang ldan pa de dang de'i 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa
'byung ngo/ dpa' na ta ka la sogs pa de rnams kyi khyad par du 'phags pa'i rim pa la gnas pa// 'dod chags la sogs pa'i rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal yang dag par/
sbyor ba'i thog le zhes bya ba rdzogs so///rgya gar gyi mkhan po kAyasbyapa ga ya d+hur zhal snga nas dang/ bod kyi lo tshu pa dge slongashAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtanal

phab pa/ slad nas yang bod kyi lo tsA ba gzhan rnams kyis bsgyur ba la zur mi 'dra bar bcos nasarang gi meng bcug cing/ gzhan gyi ming 'phyi ba de dag dang/ mingeshas pa de dag sun dbyung ba'i phyi'i slad
nas yang rgya gar gyi rgyud bzhi dang/ dog slongashAkya ye shes rdo tid kyis gtugs nas bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// thaM// rgya gar skad du/
shrI gur+ya badzratanArAdze bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpalardo rjemakha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// gsang ba'i 'khor lo mi gsung ba
[B93 ]@#/// bdag gis zab mo'i don ma rtogs// de phyir khyed kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal pa// nyon cig lha mo spyan bzangaring// gsang ba'i
'khor lo'agan tu zab// rgyud rnams kun tum gsus pa// khyod kyi ngor mdzad nga yis bshad// gsang ba rdo rje'irgyud kyi rgyal po las gling nga slang ba'i le'u ste dang bo'o///
rgyu/ lha mos gsol pa bam ldan 'das// gsang ba zhes bya ji ltar lags// de yi 'khor lo ji ltar lags// de yi rdo ji ltar lags// de yi pad+maji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das
kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// gsang ba'i pho brang dang po ste// de nas gsang ba'i dbang bskur phyir// gnyis pa rig pa'i the brang sa// bzhi ba'i dgon pa'i phyir/
gsum pa rta mgrin 'khor lo ste// de yi mgrin par gnas pa'i phyir/ bzhi pa gsang ba bde skyong ste// sdig pa spong phyir bde skyong yan// de rnams don ni gsang bsku// brtul bzhugs byed cing
gtong phod che/ a khaM zab cing chags la raga'// khu ba 'dzag cing rak+ta'abab// 'di la ston gyi gzhan la gsang// rdo rje pad+ma zhes bya ba// bzhi po gnasapa'i rten yin to// dper na khang rten ka ba
bzhin// rgyud kyi denanirgyun yin no// gsang brdoNi'irgyud kyi rgyal po las rtog bsal ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// re re'i dbye bas ma 'tshal/
tsa07 bas 'jig rten kun rdzob nyid du lhung// 'khrig pa'i zug rngu mi bzad pas// bdag ni bde nyid du ni 'gum// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i pho brang rim pa drug/ 'dab ma'i grangs/

nyis 'gyur ro// rta mgrin grangs nidagu ru shes// gsang ba bde skyong rim pa gnyis// brgyad dang lnga bcu'i grangs yin no// rig pa'i pho brang 'dab ma lnga// rigs ni mi tog lta bu 'o// b+ha ga rab 'bring/
gsum yin te// rnal 'byor mkhas pas btsal bar bya// sman dang snum gyi ril bu yis// rnal 'byor sor mo la bsus la// gzhang khanas ni phye mas bdug/ gsang ba nas kyang snum gyis bdug/

da nas rnal 'byor pho ba'am mos// rtsa de sor mos legs par batsal// ro rdung tshad ni solaga'as nas// sor brgyud par ni gar gnas pa// shes rab b+ha ga che chung dang// de bzhin b+ha ga grangadro dang// chu

rnams che zhing bde ba chung// de la rnal 'byoramakhas ba yis// b+ha ga chan bde ba chung// b+ha ga chen chung du bya// chung na de bzhin bskyod par gsungs/ grongan de bzhin bsro bar bya// chu rnams chen chung bar
'di 'dra'i b+ha ga gang la yod// bud med 'di la thug ma ba// de phyir bud med bcom ldan 'das// thabs kyi rdo rje phra sbom dang/ ring ba dang ni klung ba ste// shes rab ji bzhin thabs la'o//
de yi gnas su gzung bar bya// gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud phyi rgyal po las gsang ba rtogs pa'i le'u stagasum pa'o///lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// e baM rnamapa'i
dbus gang du// bad ba'i khyad khar 'tshol ba la// 'di las khyad par med dam ci// bcom ldan 'adas kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu dpan pa'i gnas btsal la// bza' ba bcud
can sna tshogs dang// btung ba zhim po mang bo dang// gur kum la sogs dri zhim dang// shin tu 'jam pa'i stan btingal// rnal 'byor ma yi gnas bcu ru// zhim thig le rer bya// rnal 'byor pha yi
gnas lnga ru// de bzhin thig le lnga yang bya// de nas mkha' gsang byin gyis brlabs// sa las gru gsum gting ring bsam// de yi nang du paM las// pad+ma bdubam brgyad du bsam// de yi dbus
su 'khor lo bsam// 'khor lo'i dbus su rogami bzod// de nas thabs kyi rdo rje yang// hU~M las rdo ratshu lnga bsam// o las rjerdzamago borab sam// phaT las rdo rje b+ha ga bsam// de nas bde ba'i stan
thog tu// sbyor ba rnam pa gsum bya ste// yan lag thabs dang sbyorab dngos// 'khor lo ri shu rtso dgu 'am/ chags pa skye ba'i dri yis byugs// bde ba skyo ba'i zas zos nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug na
pa ni thabs kyis gnas dgur 'o yang bya/ shes rab kyis kyang gnas lngar bya// thabs kyis shosarab pang la// 'khyas parma rgyus su gzhug/ shes rab kyis kyang de bzhin no/ chags pa skya'i/

tshalta rtags 'byung ste// de nas gcig gis gcig 'khyud nas// he ru kadang phag morab sam// shes rab rkang pa gnyis brkyang nas// thabs ni thabs ldan gyis bskyod nas// nang rtags phyi ru bstan pa'i phyir//
shes rab ma la rtags gsum 'byung// lus 'dar 'pha sku yi rtags// mi bzod skad 'donangag girtags// shes pa rgyal bathugs kyi rtags// de la ngo bor bshad pa'i phyir// 'di ni gsang/
ba'i dkyil 'khor te// 'di yis skra dkar gnyer ma spong// nad kyi zug rngu thams cad 'joms// 'di ni gsang ba'i bcud kyis len// phyi yi dkyil 'khor sgom pa min// gsang ba'i dkyil ba khong nyid la
gnas// sbyin sreg la sogs bya bamin// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i rgyud 'di ni// kun kyis thob par mi 'gyur te// grags bam sor zhibcu gnyis bya// glegs bam gsang ba'i gnas su spa// yongs su smin
pa'i rnal 'byoram// 'ga' yis mthong gi gzhan la sba// gsang ba ston pa'i tha mni/ sangs rgyas nyid ngas btsun pa yin// gzhan yang 'dod pa'i stan thog tu// gsungs pa'i sbyor thabs kun byas/
nas// lnga bcu nas bzung stongagi bar// rnal 'byor ma kun bde med kyang// sbyor thabs mkhas pas bskyod byas nas// bcu gnyis ma dang bde ba mnyam// sbyor thabs mishes rnal 'byor pas//
rlungamakhris bad kanakun nas su// shes rab kyis kyang thabs la ste// sbyor thebasamakhas pa'i shes rab m// thabs kyis rtag tu bstan par bya// sbyor thabs mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas//
rnal 'byor mni gsang la bstan// lha mos gsol ba/ gsang ba bstan pa ji ltar lags// khacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ming sring tshul lam rdzo'abs tshul/ pha spad tshul
mkhan slob tshul// gzhan gyis mi rig ngo tshabasrungs// dben pa'i gnas su sbyarab bya// gal te ma bstanadam tshig nyams// tshe 'di nyid la dmyal bar lhung// lha mos gsol
mkhan patshul/pa bcom ldan 'das// thabs medarnal 'byor ji ltar lags// bde ba khyab mad ji ltar lags// phyag rgya ma bstan ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bde ba la gnas
tsa gsang ba'i don// khyed kyi ngor mdzad ng yis bshad// sbyor thabs ma deshes rnal 'byor dang// stan yang gcig la mi 'dug ste// 'dod chags bsam pa yang mi bya// gal te de 'dra bstan
gyur na// 'jig rten phal pa'i 'dod chags te// shi nas mnar mad dmyal bar skye// 'dod chags spyod pa shal ma li// lcags kyisor ni bcu drug pa// ar la 'dzeg cing mar la 'bab//
thabs mad rnal 'byor 'du pa 'bod// de phyir sbyor thabs mkhas pas bstan// sbyor thabs las ni bod bskye// de phyir bde ba khyad par 'phags// bde ba thabs med lus zungs nyams// rlungam/
bad kan kun nas skya/ las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu bstan// phyag rgya ma bstan dam tshig nyams// phyag rgya bstan pa'i dus su yang// rnal 'byor ming sring brdayis mtshon// gang zhig mdzub mo ston
na 'os sam zhes ni 'dri ba yin// sor mo gnyis ni ston pa dang// mthe bong drang por ston pa dang// de bzhin srin lag drang por ston// rdo rje bo la zhes bya ste// pad+ma kak+ko la zhes bya// de ltar/
ta mabyas dam tshig nyams// brda yi bye bragamalus pa// saM pu Na ru shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rdordzipad+ma dga' ba'i gnas// de ru gzung ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das/
kyis bka' stsal pa// dar gzung ba rnam pa gnyis// 'ab kyis dbugs dang shes pas gzung// dang po btsan thabs sbyor bas gzung// sbyor ba rnam pa bcu ru gzung// gcig ni sbom po khrims
gzung// gzung ba'i brtan ni rnam pa bzhi// man ngag can gyis shes par bya// gal te de rum in na// 'khor bar ltung bas rang gisasu// ting nge 'dzin gyis haM la bsdu// lce yis byang chub
sems blangs la// roma'i 'khor lo ru zhi bstim// de ltar ma byas dumatshig nyams// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// shes rab sbyor thabs 'ba' zhig gis// thabs kyis bskyor pa
'ba' zhig gis// rnal 'byor pha dang rnal 'byor ma// bde ba khyad par med dam ci// bde ba'i ngo bo ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bskyod pa bud med kyis kyang bskyod/
sbyorathabs kyang ni thabs kyis kyang// de las bde ba khyad par 'phags// dpar na dor dang snal ma bzhin// thabs kyis snal ma'i cha tsam myong// shes rab dar gyisham bu tsam// de phyir rnal
byor ma yi rgyud// rnal 'byor ma yis 'grub par gsungs// rgyud kyi nang na mchog yin pas// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang// mchod dang bzlas dang gtor ma dang// khrus dang srung ba
la sogs pa// gsang ba 'di las gzhan namad/ 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog ste/ ye shes lha yi spros dang bral// de nas lha mos 'khor dpag tu med pa dang mkha'
'gro ma rnams 'dod chags kyi the tshom yongs su zad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun gyis 'khyud nas gsang ba'i mchod pas bde ba chen po'i ris gang bar mchod nas mi snang bar gyurado// gsang ba'i
yang gsang ba gsang ba rdo rje'irgyud kyi rgyal po 'khor lo sdom pa'i rtog ba rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhipa'o////gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya la/
rdzogs so////paN+Di ta rat+tabadzra dang/ lo tsA ba dge songashAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//@#// rgya ga
skad du/ shrI gu byas rbats+tshan+ti tan+tarA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rjesaMms dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis gles pa dus gcig
na / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs roji btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdodz+dzasnying po la sogs/
pa'i 'khor rnams kyis g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba
zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi gcod pa ji ltar lags// rgyud kyi donani ji ltar lags// de yi rgyal po'ang ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang
ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// dang po bus dbang dang 'brel ba'i [“]bskyod pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te// rten dang brtan par sgom pani// snod bcud gzung 'dzin rnam rtog rnams// spong phyir nga yis
gsungs pa yin// de yi khyad par dgongs pa'i don// dang po stong nyid la sogs pa// rgyud gzhan du na nga yis gsungs// rtenadang brten pa'i bya brag la// dang po rten gyi dgong pa yang// thugs
kha'i yi ge hU~M las ni// mar ma gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// kha dog nag po'i e 'phros pas// gru gsum rgya che gting ring bsam// gru gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dug gsum 'dzem
pa dgos pa'i don// logs ni rnam tharagasum yin// lus ngag yid gsum las byung ba'i// mi dag bcu 'dzoms dgongs pa'i don// chos kyi sku ni dri mdakyis// rang bzhin gyisani kun la khyab//
de phyir stsachen dgongs pa'i den// 'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang// byang chub sems M dpa' rnams kyis kyang// chos sku rtogs pa ma yin pas// gting ring sa ru dgongs pas bshad// de nas
(thugasakha'i hU~M las yang// hUM 'phros pa las rdoN+Dar gyur// rdo rje gur du gyur pa yapa// dang po tshayi bar chod dang// gnyis pa thar pa'i bar chod de// khagags ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// phyi mi
/bag gas dang nang gi bgogs// phyi yi tshayi bar chod byed// nang gis tharapa'i bar chod byed// bar chod rnam pa gnyis bsrung bas// rje gur gyi dgongs pa'i don// yaM/
las byung ba'i gong dang 'dra// dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu ste// rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang// mi rtog pa nis pa la// dbang du byed pas dbang gi don// ba dan bzhi mo dgos ba yang// chos rnams
dus gsum gnas pa yi// dgongs pa min pa'i ng nga yis gsungs// raMlasal yi dkyil 'khor ni// zur gsum drag po'i dgongs pa yi// rdortsa gsum sku gsum don// khaM las chu yi dkyil

'a 'khorate/ zlum po spros pa zhi bar gsungs// bum pa chos sku'i yan lag ba zhi// laM las gsar gyi sa gzhi ste// gru bzhi rgyas pa'i rang bzhin de// rdo rje rtse lnga ye shes lnga// de steng ri rab rtse mo
brgyada rnam thar brgyad kyi dgongs pa yin// snod bcud rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yon// go rim bzhin du dgod par bya// cera'i bye brag rnam rtog yang//
bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// gnyen po'i stobasani yos su rgyas// shing rnams rim bzhin rtag tu dgod// rnam rtog mi dag bcu yi don// 'joms pa'i rtags su phyogs skyongadagod//
yi/ 'dod chags zhe sdang ma rig pa// gdug pa 'dzoms phyir klu brgyad dgod// thugasarje chen po dang ldan pa// gzugs sku gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis// lus dang ngag gis sems can gyi// den
mdzad phyir nichar sprin mdog/ nang dang gsang ba de bzhin no// de bzhin mthar thug bzhi pa yang// snyan chas brgyud pa shes par bya// de nas nang du gzhal yas khang// hU~M las 'khor lo rtsibs
brgyud de// rtsibs brgyad rnam shes brgyud kyi dngos// yongs su gyur pas rnam snang sku// phyi nas bltas pas nang du gaMsal// de bzhin nang nas phyi ru gsal// thams cad gcig tu snang ba'i don// rin
chen sna lnga sku lnga'i don// kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga'i don// gru bzhi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir gsungs// logs bzhi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste// sgo bzhi dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi/ ka ba brgyud ni
rnam thar brgyad// gdung bzhi ya shes bzhi yi don// tu ra Nal sogs pa kun// stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs// de nas nang du gdan rnams ni// pad+ma'is bon dbyangs las sku//
'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs kyis// ma gos rtags su pad+ma'i gdan// de stong nyi ma zla ba sdu// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi brda// dang por ro nang bdag gam// rnam rtog 'gaM
phyir gsungs pa yin// yan lag bzhi ldan gtso bo'i gdan// 'khor la re ragadan du sbyin// gtso bo'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir// dgongs pa'i donadang bcas pa yi/ rten gyi dkyil 'khor
rdzogs pa 'o// de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni// skye ba bzhi yi tshul yin te// skad cig las byung brdzus pa'i tshul// dpar na chugating las ni nya// rgyun las skyo ba drod gsheratshul// dpar
pa// mnyi mas pad+ma bzhin// spro zhing bsdu ba sgong skyes tshul// dper na rdo las zangs bzhin no// sbyor ba lasabyung mngal skyes tshul// yar la bsreg cing mar la gso// dparan snga
tshel las ni lugs// pho brang rnamapar snang mdzad rdzogs// rjes su skyod pa haru ka/ dbang bskur bcom ldan mi bskyod pa// bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin// mchod pa donayod grub pa'o//
bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag mad// yan lag drug las byung ba yi// dngos grub 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de nas bzlos pa'i m sgom pa ni// dbang po rab 'abring thama'i steng// rab kyis yongs
su rdzogs pa yi// sgom pa'i m bzlas pa bya bar gsus// 'bring gis gtso bo yab yum yin/ mtha' ma dbu ma'i spyan la 'jug/ dbu ma'i spyan la brtan gyur nas// sum cu rtsa bdun
rdzogs par sgom// 'bring po yis kyang de bzhin te// gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung// bkod pa sems dang dman pa dbyibs// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang// mthar thug chos dang yan lag
bdun// 'di yisakhastayang shin tu zab// gong dugasus pa thams cad kyang/ rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya// rer la yang bzhi bzhi ste// du ma'i tshulani shin tu brab// phyi dang nangani sngags kyi den/
gzugs brnyanadakyil 'khor phyi lo den// phyi la ltos nas nang yin te// de nyid gsang ba gsangaba'i don// las su rung ba mthar phyin don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don/ nang du dkyil
'khor mtshan nyid ni// phung po sku mched khams rnams la// rer lha ra byin brlabs la// lnga 'am drug gam sum cu bdun// g.yas g.yon stang 'og sgo la sogs// bla ma'i zhal las shes par byas
jorjesnying pos ya nga gsol pa// sumacu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba'i// yongs su rdzogs pa ji ltar lags// bskyod pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'os pa ji ltar lags// gzhan yang rten gyi dkyil/
'khor dang// thun dang thun mtshams ji ltar lags// lta spyod zung du ji ltar 'jug/ dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag rgyu//
'bras bu gnyis mdaya shas bslad// da phyi 'bras bu sngon 'gro ba'i// rgyun gtso bor gyur pa yin// haru kar gyur gcig la yang// rgyu rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ste// gnas ni ti ku rtsa bzhisogs//
bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyunorapa las ma yin te// gro las nas kyi myu gumane// ma tshang ba las ma yin te/ 'bru nyams pa las myu gu med/ rgyu mad pa las ma yin te// nam mkha'i me tog a
madri rgyu de rgyun mad pa las mad// nags srag ma la rlangamad bzhin// de ltar yan lag bzhi ldan pa'i// las dang po yis rnam rtog spang// lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas pas// bskyod pa zhes gsung
pa yin// phyi dang nang du du ma'im// de yi rim pa ra bshad pa yin// rten gyi dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang// khyams dang bla gab med pa dang// bla gab bcas dang rnam pa gsum// mos pa'i dbang du/
gsungs pa yin// 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin thun bzhi ru gsungs pa yin// mtshams kyang bzhi ru shes par bya// dbyag gu chu tshod 'pho ba dang// thun brgyad sgom pa'i/
rnal 'byorapa// thun dang mtshams nimanyam par gsungs// mtshams kyi tsho narnal 'byor pa// dbang po 'bring dang tham yis// lha rnams rdzogs par spro byas bas// ma mgacig las gnyis
kyi tshul// mchod pa la sogs tshul bzhin bya// lta ba zhes pa mnyam gzhag ste// rjes thob spyod pa ru ni bshad// bskyod pa'i rim pa sgom pa la// rgyan drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnang// gsang ba'i
dbang dang 'brel ba la// rgyunadang bdud rtsi'i spyod pa gnang// rdo rje'i rigs dang ranichanarigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs// spyod pa gnang bar nga yis gsungs// shes rab ye shes dang
'bral bas/ gong du gsus ba thunamos// khyad par phyag rgyu'i spyod pa gnang// lta bami ldan spyod pa dang// spyod pa mi ldan lta ba gnyis// 'di ni gsang sngags dam tshig ste/ mnar med sems
can dmyal bar skye// de phyir lta med spyod pa spang// srin po khros pa'i spyod pa 'o// spyod mad lta 'di spang ba ste// dka' thub kyisan lus gdungs shing// phung sogs rnam snang la sogs pa//
khanas pa rtog go skam po yin// deson lta spyod zung du 'jug/ glang chon bzhengs kyang mnyam par bzhengs// glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par bazhugs// rdo rje snying pos yod zhus pa// khadud
[s/ ]rtsi zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi spyod pa ji ltar lags// de yi yon tan ji ltar 'byung// rgyan la sogs pa'i don rnams kun// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

stsal pa// bdud rtsi rnam pa gsum du gsungs// dang por phyi yi bdud rtsi bstan// bdud rtsi ljadang sha lnga la// lcags kyu lnga nidagod pa ste// brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang por 'dzag/ si d+ma mi bskyod lud skam

blang (bcu gnyis bcu drug dang por 'dzag/ har ka dang rnam snang dang// lud skam snying po blang bar bya// yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo// brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga la// thams cad bzang bo'i dus su
gsungs// sang ga'i gzugs ni dkarapo bzang// lus ngag sdom zhing nyes pa med// 'di nisha ya sgrub pa'i rten// glang po glang po chen po ste// ka ha ke yi rgyu nyid la// gla rtsi la sogs 'byung
ni chu yi rgyal po ste// kha dog dkar min dmar ba min// dbyibs dang kha dog mi 'gyur sha// mi ni skye ba bdun pa'i kaM// lus ngag yid la mkhas pas
brtag/ bza' ba'i snod ni dum bu gcig/ de yi nang du bsgrub par bya// rab 'bring thama'i mtshan ma ni// 'bar dang dud pa spro bo rnams// mtshan ma phyi lo yin par bshad// gzhan skyes don ni rgas
chen sal// skadam phyin n dngos grub mar// skad phyung bas ni tshongs par 'gyur// nang gi bdud rtsi rang byung yin// dril can bu ga dgu lamanas// 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyun chad nas// til gyi 'bru
dbazhin gang ba ste// a ba rma tIr dbugs chud pas// stong gi drag pa'i rgyu ba yin// si tA ga pur dbus na gnas// 'og gi drug pa g.yin// 'di ni gsang pa'i bdud rtsi sta
skra dkar gnyer ma 'chi ba stong// spyod pa'i rnal 'byoranam pa gnyis// gang zag mchog dang las dang nge// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing// rigs su 'dzin pa sbyang ba'i phyir// phyi yi drug
pa'i bdud rtsi sbyin// las dang po la phyi nang gnyis// 'di yi nus pa'i ng du ma ste// skra dkar mad cing rnam rtog 'joms// dkyil 'khor bzhi la rab tu gnas// lnga pa goms par gyurapa yasi/
drug pa gzung bar gsungs pa ste// kun rdzob stong gi sna rtse nas// sor bzhi nas ni dbus su gzhug/ lte ba'i gnas nas dbugs gnas pa// stong gi drug pa zin pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'i ng
du ma ste// srad pamad cing yang ba 'o// 'dab chags rgyal po ji bzhin du// nam mkhar 'phur zhing ltung ba madra// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// 'og gi drug pa yin par bshad//
tshu/ gang zaga mchog la gsungs pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'i ng du ma ste// dril can bu ga 'gag par byed// rgyan gyis dang po zhe sdang 'joms// dur khrod chen po si tuling// ru tra 'dul ba'i
rim pa'o// bdud rtsis rnam rtog la sogs 'joms// 'phrin las bzhi nib+hun mongayin// phyag rgyas 'dod chags rnam par dag/ rdorjesnying po yang gsol pa// drug pa zhes pa ji lta bu// gang
zag mchog ni ji lta bu// 'dod chags ji ltar rnam par dag/ dpa' bos bdag la bto du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// g.yas g.yon stong 'og bzhi las ni// lnga pa nam mkha'/
'byung pa yin// lnga pa rang bzhin med pa ste// drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dga' ba mchog dga' lhan cig dga'// bral ba'i dga' ba sngon 'gro bas// lnga pa bde ba chen po 'byung// bde chan
rang bzhin med par dag/ 'og gi sgo yi drug pa yin// de phyir drug pa 'dod pas kyang// bzhi pa sngon du song ba yis// lnga pa yongs su rdzogs pa sgom// dper na zas kyi dngos po la// gsar 'gyur rtsi
yinus pa yis// zangs nyid gsar du 'gyur ba ste// zangs las ma gtogs gsaranyid dang// lnga pa las gzhan drug pa na// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// le dang zla ba zla ba phyed// nyin zhag
dus drug dus gnyis la// skad cig re tsam drug la 'byung// las dang po yi spyod yul min// dpar na chu yi snod nang du// bdud rtsi thigs pa gcig gzhag pa/// chu ru nyams su myong ba las// gcig
shos nyams su myong ba mar// tshul brtenanas bdud rtsi yang// nyams su myong bar byed pa ste// de bzhin spros bcas lnga pa la// brten nas smros mdadrug pa 'byung// rgyud gzhan du nga yis gsungs//

mtshan ma lnga 'am robargyud dam// sa brgyad non nas mngon shes ldan// las kyi phyag rgya yongs su sbangs// ye shes phyag rgyu la gnas shing// phyag rgya chen be lo 'jug pa// 'di ni gang thaga mchog en
0/ @#// te bde yis drug pa zin par bshad// 'dod chags zhes pa 'khor ba ste// rnam dag mya ngan 'das pa ragasungs// de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ra/

[S/ ]rten cing 'brel ba zab mo'i don// dang po lha yi nga rgyal bya// mkha' 'gro rtsa ru shes par bya// dpa' bo byang chub sems su shes// 'khor lo'i gnas dang 'khor lo dang// de nas bsgrub bya shes par
bya bde ba chen po'i 'kheralenas// tshangs mdo'i bar du sor mo'i tshod// bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyud yin te// sor gsum la na 'khor lo re// sku gsungathugs kyi rang bzhin yin// dbang gi gnas dang
khor lo'i gnas// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// tshangs mdo mo la gzhang kha rlung// sor gsum sor bzhi mkhas pas rtag/ gnas gsum gsang ba'i gnas yin to// de bzhin gnas gsum
rig ba'o// sor ba'i mgrin gnas yin te// sor brgyud gsang ba bde skyong gnas// rnal 'byor pha dang rnal 'byor ma'i// lus kyi rten gyi bye brag las// soraso bzhi bcu brgyad gnyis las// brgyud
rgyu nigasang ba'i 'khor lo'i gnas// bzhi bcu las ni 'khor lo gzhan// khyama'i zhal nas shes par bya// thams cad la tshigs dbyug gu ste// phyi dang nang dumakhas pas brtag/ 'khor lo la yang

rnam pa gnyis// dang por khoralo gnyis par rtsa/ rkyenadang gsang ba rang bzhin dang// dbang dang rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// rkyen la gnyis te gsang ba bzhi// rang bzhin bcu drug dbangani gnyi// tsan+d+hu/

[00]lI ni nyi shu bzhi// 'khor lo bzhi ru smras pa ste// tshog sanang blom mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs// man ngag gzhan du sprul zhing 'phyar la dga'// 'dod chags spyod phyir sbas pa'i rim pa nod// gab pa'i/
don la rgyab kyis phyogasashing skur pa 'debs// gsang sngags bar du gcod cing rnal 'byor gzhan la ga'o// 'di ni mnar mod sems can dmyal ba chen po re skyo// sangs rgyas stong dang rtsa gcig
rdzogs pa yi tshad// 'di la sbas kyi thams cad la// nga yis sba bar ma gsungs so// de phyir rgyud gzhan du ni sbas// rgyud 'dir ngayis rgyas par bshad// sum cu rtsa gnyis g.yas g.yon cha///
drug cu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas// sum cu rtsa gnyis lasan zung// bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin// sum cu rtsa gnyis phyogs dang mtshams// brgyad kyi gras su smras pa lo// spyi gtsug 'khor lospyi
bor sbas// gsang ba bde skyong lta bar sngas// bcu drug las ni zung 'gyur ba// brgyad kyi glangasasu sbas pa yin/ bcu drug las ni g.yas g.yon ru// sum cu rtsa gnyis gras su sbas// bcu drug las ni
bzhi bzhir 'gyul/ drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su sbas// mgren b.lengs spyod 'khor lo ru// ro drug la ni longs spyod pas// ro ma los spyod 'khor lo sbas// rta mgrin 'khor lo mgrin par sbas// brgyud
las g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi cha// bcu drug gras su sbas pa yin// brgyud las g.yas g.yon stanga'og nga zhi// sum cu rtsa gnyis grongasasu sbas// brgyud las g.yas g.yon stong 'og bzhi/
mtshams bzhi dang ni brgyud kyi cha// drug cu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas// tshangs mdo'i ma ni ma la smras// snying ka chos kyi 'khor lo ru// chos kun rig pas rig par sbas// drug cu rtsa/

bzhi lasazhi zung// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// drug cu rtsa bzhi las bzhi// bcu drug grangs su smras pa yin// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni brgyad// brgyud kyis grangs su smras pa'o// gzhang kharlung

pa[”]nirlung las sbas// gsang ba'i gtumacho gtum mor smras/ 'khoral ril 'khor lo bzhi// phyi ru sog gi rnam par 'khyud// chudang chu bran chu bo rnams// sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed kyang// rgya mtsho chen

por rogacig 'gyur// lto bar rol pa bde chen sku// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang// de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// snying kha chos kyi skyayin te// rnam thur lasogs de bzhin no// mgi nangang las spyod

[% ]nga dang 'dra// bde chen sprul pa'i ng de bzhin no// mtshan rnams stong la stong pa 'og/ dang por bde chen kha sbyor yi// rnam thar snying la dpe byad 'og// bde chen kha sbyor gnyis pa yin// gzhan ni rnal

las shes par bya/ stobs bcu rnam dag kha sbyor bcu// rlung ni sgrolama'i ngo bo ste// rtsa drug dbugs kyi rang bzhin gang// ma ni gos dkar rang bzhin te// zungartsa gsum ni drod kyis gang// rang bzhin

gyis ni gnas pa la// brgyud dang lngayamtshan khyod la// brgyad la dbyangs kyi dang po brgyad// lnga la kA li dang po lnga// rig pa'i pho brang mtha' can lnga// rta mgrin dbyangs yig g.yon dang g.yas// la
gnyis mthar bzhag 'dab dguyin// gsang ba'i bde skyong 'khor lo ni// ma ning bzhi dang a gnyis dbus// byang chub sum curtsa bdun yin// de nas rtsa yi mtshan nyid kyang// phyi yi stong phrag bdun cu

gnyis// sha la gnas nas tshil bu skyed// nang gi brgya dang nyi shuni// tshil la gnas nas rkang skya ra 'o// gsang ba sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// rus par gnas shing ga pur skyod// de kho na yi rtsa gsum ni//
gsang ba'i gnas shing bde ba spyad// khang pa stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// khang pa re la khang pa gsum// khang pa der gnas srin bu'i rigs// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te// gras ni 'bum du shes
par bu// nang dang gsang ba'i rtsal yang// srin bu'i rigs no grongs su gsungs// de kho na yi rtsa gsum las// 'dod chags skyod pa'i srin bu dgu/ nyin dang mtshan mo mtshams dang gsum// dag
ru mkhas pas shes par bya// rtsa der gnas pa'i ga pur yang// bdud rtsi sbyor ba las byung ba// bdud rtsi la sogs gong du gsungs// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor
khasam// destang a las ka pA la// paM las pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam// nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de ru sha la sogs pa dgod// gtso bo'i snying du sor bzhi 'am// mtho gang tsam du bsam
pa ni// yi ga go bzlog bsam par bya// sngon po dmar po dkar po ste// hU~M las gyur pa'i rdo rdzobasam// de stangs yig maM bsam la/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor stong du bsam// 'di ni bdud rtsi'i kha sbyor/
ro shalngalas zhigang+ganalngar gyur// lcags kyu bdud rtsi ltaru'agyur// las kyi rlung gis ma bus te// zla ba gtso bo la sogs zhu// tha mal pa yibadud rtsi yin// yi ga gsum
dang mazhu// lha yi bdud rtsi zhes ni bya// 'od zer gyis bkugayashes kyi// bdud rtsi yin par nga yis gsungs// lan gsum bskor bar sku gsung thugs// 'di ni byin brlabs rnal 'byor ro//
denas bdud rtsi myang dang mchod// mchod pa'i rnal 'byor zhes n gsungs// de nas rol pa'i rnal 'byor te// g.yas g.yon dgos pa shes par bya// de nas zhu ba'i rnal 'byor yang// mnyam pa'i rlung
rgyudang gtum mo'i mos/ yoshes bzhi yi ngo bor gyur// cha gcig mi bsong rnam snang ste// sha khra'imakha' 'gro mnyam pa nyid// cha gcig bya ba nan tan te// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod// cha gcig
rlung dang mkhris pa ste// mkhris pas bad kan la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rtsa ni phashes mkha' 'gro yin// sa sor kun rtog yoshes mchod// cha gcig rang bzhin med pa ste/ ma
long lta bu'i ye shes kyis//rdo rjemakha' 'gro mchod par mdzad// rlung ni rdo rjemakha' 'gro ste// rtsani yashes mkha' 'gro yin// ga purasha za'i mkha' 'gro sta// srin bu las
kyi mkha' 'gro yin// gzhan yang rtsa la sogs pa la// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bye brag kun M// go rim bzhin du shes par bya// sku ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// gsung ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro 'o//
[.j ]klugs yashes mkha'a'agro yin// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// gzhan yang 'khor lo dbus gnas ni/ mkha' 'gro'i bya khrag shes par bya// dga' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// mchog dga'//
tha'i mkha' 'grogo/ rang bzhin dga' ba ye shes yin// bde chen rdo rjemakha' 'gro 'o// dpa' bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' 'gro ma ni ma 'o// tsan+dA li ni nyi shu bzhi// sbas pa'i bakhor bzhi ru/
bsnga/ bde chen longs spyod 'khor lor bsdu// los spyod chos kyi 'khor lor bsdu// gong du bsdu ba'i rim pa yang// thig le lani thams cad 'dus// dperan nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid la// ti
ma'i 'od zer phyogs bcu du mar snang// du ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus// dparana 'khor la sgyur ba'i rgyal ba'i gdugs// shing gi 'khrul 'khorasbyor ba ji bzhin no// snying ka chos kyi 'khor

lor ba sngas nas kyang// nyim zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tsan ka yi tshad// de yi dbus su thig le yungs kar gyi no chod// sngags kyi 'phreng ba ba skya'i nyag matsam gyis ni// g.yas skor g.yon skor kA li u/

la stsal ltar 'khyil// de dag thig le'i rnal 'byor te// 'di la sems ni brtan gyur nas// de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom// zla ba A li kA li la// A 'a[']nyi ma la thim nas// khyim zhabs skyed la thim pas/

zhabs skyid la sogs rim pa'i thim// yan lag lnga ni yi shes lnga// de ni phra mo'o rnal 'byorata// da nus nad phra mo la// sems ni rim par sgom pa'o// nga nas rang rig ye shes te// chos kun stong par ro
gcig pa'o// gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo dang// sprul pa yini 'khor lo gnyis// 'bar ba dang ni 'dzag pa'i tshul// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// phyi yi rnam rtog rtsol ba sta// nang
gi rnam rtog srog gi rlung// srog rtsol gnyis 'gags dbu ma sku// kun rdzob stang gi sna rtse nas// sorab zhinas ni rtsa gsum gcig/ dbugs dgag bzhi gnas yin pas// dang por de ru gzung bar bya// de nas

tsa sprul pa'i gnas su bzung// yang na bgrang bar shes par bya// de nas gsang ba gsum pa ni// shes rab ye shes dang 'brel ba'i// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa 'o// gzhung kha g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang//
( dgo' ba'imtshan nyid mi dmigs pa// bcu gnyis rang bzhin yin par gsungs// byang chub sems rgya mi rtog snyam// mchog dga' mi dmigs nyi shu lnga// gsang ba'i nor bu yongs su gang// lhan cig skyes
dga' mi dmagos pa// chos kyi sku ni yin par gsungs// bde ba'i rgyun chad bral ba'i dga'// de yi mi dmigs gzugs sku gnyis// gzhan yang sngon du'agro ba rnams// yanalag thangs rang sbyor ba dngos/

dgongs pa dang bcas rim pa 'o// skar ma'i tshogs ltar du mar spos mod kyang// nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung du 'jug/ rim zla ba lta bur zung 'jug kyang// sgra gcan lta bur gzhes su mad pa 'o// rordza snying pos yang

gsol pa// skar ma'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// zung du'ajug pa ji lta bu// gnyis su med pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun ni// rgyu yi khyad par spros pa'o// sku gsum
dang ni ye shes lnga// 'bras bu'i khyad par spros pa yin// rgyu rnams bdun du bsdu ba dang// 'bras bu gsum du bsdu ba 'o// rgyu rnams 'bras bu la thim ste// 'bras bu gnyis su bsgom par bya// chos/

kun sems kyi ngo bo ste// sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin yin// thams cad stong par rogacig pa// 'di ni blang dor yod pa'i dbyings// 'dod chags rnam par dag bya'i phyir// 'dod chags sku yi phyag rgya lnga//

phyag rgya chen po ya shes gnyis/ dam tshig chos dang las phyag rgya// 'di la brten pa shin tu zab// 'di ni bde ba chen po ste// khaskyod dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin dag/ bde chen 'khor lo rnam pa gsum//
gsang ba'i sna rtsa sa la gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gangab yin// 'go pa la sogs de bzhin te// gsang ba bde skyong ba la gnas// rang bzhin bde chen 'khor losta// bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba// til

dang til mar ji bzhin no// dper na shing sna bcad pa las// 'oma'adzag pa ji bzhin no// bde ba chen po de nyid las// skra yi rtse mo bcu stong dang// khri dang 'bum gyi rnam pa ste// dang po sprin gyi rnam pa sta//

gnyis pa du ba lta bu 'o// gsum pa glog gi rnam pa ste// bzhi pa mar ma lta bu 'o// 'di dag kun gyi rim pa yang// sprul pa la sogs rim pa bzhin// sprin gyi rnam ba skye ba ni// a ni skyo ba'imtshan ma yin//
mar mal ba'i 'chi ba yi// haMgi mtshan mar gsungs pa yin// lnga pa nam mkha' lta bu ni// gnyis su med pa bor ma do'o// mtshan ma stong par shes par bya// gzhan yang 'dar ba lasogs pa//
zla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang bgasum po yang// shes rab ye shes 'brel ba ste// duga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid kyang// gzhang lam g.ya'azhing ba spu ldang//
lus 'dar dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// gsang ba rdordzartsa lamanas// byang chub sems rgyu bde ba mnyam// mchog dga' yi ni ngo bo ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'gags pa snyam/ lhan cig skyes pa'ing ba yin/ bde//

ba'irgyun chadamud pa snyam// bral ba dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// 'di rnams kun gyimtshan nyid kyang// byang chub chen pe lasogs pa// gang du gsungs par shes par bya// dga' ba snang ba zhes bya ste// mchog
dga'osnang ba mched pa yin// rab tu dga' ba snang ba thob// lhan cig skyes pa'od gsal le/ yongashes bzhi yi rang bzhin te// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i gnyen po yin// rags pa bzhi yis gsang ba
'joms// phra ba'i bdud bzhi rang bzhin gyi// 'khor bzhi ru 'dzoms pa yin/ 'khor lo la brten dga' ba bzhi// de nyid ye shes bzhi ru snang// de phyir bdud bzhi 'joms pa yin// 'dod chags
tshal brten dug gsum[W ]/nyonamos pa yang bdud yin te// 'dod chags rnam pa bcu gnyis yin// gsang ba'i bdaskyong nyon mos 'dzoms// kha dog dbyibs ni phung po'i bdud// rta mgrin 'khor me
phung po'ajoms// sbas pa bzhi ni lha yi bdud// rig pa'i 'khor lo lha bdud 'jomasaM// skya bdang bcas 'chibaste// gsangabaskya mda'achi bdag 'joms// phra ba'i bdud 'joms de dang 'dra/ skad

cig bzhi dang sde pa bzhi// bzang po bzhi dang bden pa bzhi// 'byung ba bzhi dang yum bzhi dang// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la sogs pa// yengashos bzhi po 'di ting las/ khyad par gzhan na mo 'byung ste//
rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag dang// gzhan yang mos pa'i bye brag dang// chos tshul du ma'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin// dbang gsum bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ dge slong chen por
gsungs pa ste// 'di yis thams cad phyi bar gsungs// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dge slong dbang gsum dziltar lags// de yi bya paji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dag
slong la sogs rnam pa gsus// so sor thar dang byang chub sems/ rig 'dzin nyid kyi dag song ngo// gcig dang bzhi dang bcu dang ldan// nyis brgya lnga bcu'i go rim gyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen
dge tshul dang// dge slong so sor thar pa yin// gtong dang gtong ba chen podang// shin tu gtong dang rnam par gtong// bsnyan gnas dag bsam dag tshul dang// dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yin// dkyil
'khor du zhugs dge ba ste// de la gnas pa bsAna gnas yin// bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin// chen po 'de gsum bye brag kyang// bum pa'i dbang ni dag ba ste// des bsnyen pas dag bsnyen yin da phyir/

bdun ldan chen po yin// gsang ba'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de yi tshul ldan dge tshul yin// bdun dang ldan phyi chen po yin// dag ba shes rab ye shes te// de nyide slong bas dag slong yin// bdun dang ldan pas
bya rgyu// chen po yin// chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang// phyir mi ldog pa gsum yin te// rnam par smin dang 'khor ba dang// theg pa dman par ldog pa ni// spong ba gsum ni go rims bzhin//

thob pa gsum gyis nges 'byung zhing// rig 'dzin theg pa 'bras bur gnas// 'bras bu 'dir gnas rnal 'byor pa// khyim pa'i mardordzo'adzin pa yi// chalugs su ni gnas byas la// dbang bskur rab gnas la sog/
[S]/ zlog pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis// gsang ba'i spyod par ma gsungs te// dab na rdolas zangasasu 'gyur// zas las gsar gyin m pa ste// zas kyi dus na rdo mdade// gson du gyur pas rdo mi stang/

rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// gnyis po gnas pa nyid du ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang g gsungs so// de nas gsang ba bzhi po yang// nga zhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba ste// rtag tu
sgo g.yo ba'i sems 'di nyid// gzugs la sogs pa bkug nas nii// bsgom bya lhan cig bcas pa dag/ dbang du byas te bsgom par bya// gzung ba dang ni'adzin pa yi// dmigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te//
tshaka sams nyid bsam du mad pas na// cir yang bsam par mi bya 'o// sems nyid stong par bcug nas su// stong pa sems su rab bcu gnas // stong dang mi stong la sogs pa'i// rtog pa bcom pas
mkha' ltar 'gyur// rten yod ma yin brten pa med// dpa mad gnas kyang yod ma yin// de nyid gnas pa rdzogs pa ste// lhan skyes gzhis chad rig pa 'o// de nas gcod pa bka' stsal pa//khre tshul gir

0 dang phyag rgya rnams// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsgoms// dur khrod rgyal po drags pa can// snying rjesad cing sha khrag ba// de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyi nang smras dang mthar
thug gi/ dkyil 'khaMr du zhugs dbang mnos nas// sgom dang bzlos pa la sogasam gsang stags bar du gcod cing gshu// rnal 'byor kun la skur pa 'debs/ de rjesmanatshog slob ma 'apu// rtsa khra
yan lag dam tshig nyams/ bla ma la snod rnam smin gyis// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// rten cing 'brel pa zab maya// rtsa yi 'khor de'i don mo rtogs// lcags gri sor ni bcu drug pa 'jig
pa runu nga yis bshar// gab pa'i gsang ba ma gtogs par// smras pa mi dmigs rnam gsum gyis// thur du sems can dmyal bar skye// shing rta'i 'khor lo 'khor ba ltar// las kyi rnam par sminangs/

'khor// shes pas rang gis rang rig dang// rang rig bde ba gang 'dod dang// rang rig skya mar ganga'adod pa// rang rig shel sgong lta bu dang// dbyings dang yang shes la sogs pa// lta ba'i ren 'od 'char

pa'o// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum// bde chen 'khoralo rgyu yi rgyud// gsang ba sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud/ gsang ba bde skyong 'bras bu'i rgyud// bum pa rgyus rgyud du gsungs// gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud du
gsubs// shes rab ye shes 'bras bu'i rgyud/ skye brgyuyirgyud dugasus// 'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsus// bar ma do ni 'brasaM bu'i rgyud// rgyud ces pa ni rgyun yin te// rgyal po gsang ba ste/

rab ye shes gsang// gsang ba'i la khor lo bzhi pa 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rjesnying po dang// mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs ri rab kyi rdul snyad kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
byas nas mi snang par gyur to// dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so////paN+Ditu ga ya d+ha ra dang/ lo ts+tsha ba dag slongashAkya yogs kyis bsgyur/

khyabapa'irgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/
thugs rdo rjesaMtsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos la skyo bar gyur to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po/
dpal phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kya kyi bcom ldan he ru ka/ kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyi// de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu// gtsobos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis ]

[/]bka' stsal pa// bslu ba'i mtha' dngamanaM namar snang// de nyid kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos// sems nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor ba'i chos kyi rang bzhinano// phyag rdordzas yang nyus pa// bsam gyis
mi khyab soms nyid kyi// dbyabami mthun grangs dag dang// dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dag dang// 'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams dang// gnas pa'i tshad dang ma padag/ gtso bas bdag la bshad du
gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkabastsal pa// lagachags nyon mongs ye shes kun// rigs drug chu shing 'khril lcag gi/ rang bzhin dag gi lam 'das la// de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dus
gsum sangs rgyas nge ba yin// bde gshegs kun gyi blugs kyi gsang// de ni nga yis bshad kyis// rtag chad skye 'ogag la sogs pa'i// mtha' spangs sems nyid rang rig ci// gdodanas spros bral

bde ba nyid// de don bsam gyis mi khyab des// de nyid dbye ba rab 'bring mtha'// rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// dang por rang ga bsamami khyab// rgyu dang lam rtags bsam mi khyab// mtha' dang 'onamongs

bsam mi khyab// chos dang lta spyod bsam mi khyab// yi go bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mdor bstan de nyid rnam par dbye// gzugs sgra dri roragabya chos// de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab// a ni yo ga dam pa sta/

khong nas 'byung ba skye ba mang// skyo ba kun gyi rgyur gyur pa// yi go dam pa bsam mi khyab// phrag byung khrus dang gtsang sbra dang// rgyan cha gcer bu thul go sogs// chang dang bdud rtsi chu dang yang/ ma dang sring mo
ba/ @#// bu mo sogs// rol ba'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab// nga yis 'dul ba'i sems can la// mos pa'i mthar l thug pamed// de phyirathegapa thug med pas// de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab//
rtag chad spro sku laltos pa'i sgra// de nyid mtha' gnas bsam mi khyab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// nyon mongs bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'da' dang 'phar dang drod la sogs// rtags nyid bsam/

gyis mi khyab pa// lha sgomi rlung dang rtsa sogs pa// lam nyid bsam gyisami khyab pa// rang gi nam mkha'i sprin char tshul// pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa// rgyu nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rgyu 'bras/
thadad kun dang bral// rtsol brdul gyis ma gos pa// sprin mdamar ba ltar bcom pa yi// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag/ rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o/ anishad dang sprul sogs kyis// bcu
gnyis la sogs dbye ba yis/ yi ga'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// gzugs ni srog dang mi sdug sogs// bcu dag phra rab rdul gyi bar// sgra la sogs pa de bzhin te// sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drugate// rog
bya bcu gcig chos d bzhin// gang zhig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// chos kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// theg pa gsum dang bco brgyad dang// rjesnyad 'du shes yid kyi bar// lta ba'i dbye bas rgyus pa 'o// tshog
kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam// mthong lam sgom lam mthar phyin lam// lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems rtags bdud rtags 'byung ba'i rtags// rtags kyi dbye ba rgyas pa 'o// mu stegs rang rgyal

nyan thos nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i bar// spyod pa'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o/rtag dang chod dang sgro skur nas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das mtha' dang// thabs dang shes rab mtha' yi bar// mtha' yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o//

dod chags la sogs 'khridang// chig stong rtsa ba che ba dang// zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin te// nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang// 'dod chags chu dang sbyin pa sogs rgya yi skye
brgyus pa'o// sams dang nam mkha' ye shes dang// sangs rgyas bod gsal zung 'jug sogs// rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa 'odo/ blos brtags mtshan mar stangang dang// sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs dang/

rimamin mos pa khyad par tshol// rdul tsam khas len blos 'jog cing// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgrub byed pa// gang ltar bcos kyang de mtha' ste// gang zhig mthar lhung lta ba de// rang rig gzhan rig sems
ma yin/ kun rdzong don dam gnyis ma yin// rang rigartog ge skam po dang// mthar ltung dbu mar khas len pa// de ni sems nyid rang rig dang// brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mi mthun pa nyid
phyogs yin te// de bral bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// rang rig yashes chen pa yi// sbyin sogs dkarapo'i chos rnams dang// rang rig spyi yi rnam pa yi// rang rig ye shes chen po la// thabs dang thabs
las byung ba 'am// rgyudang 'bras bu la sogs pa// rdul tsam tha snyad yod ma yin/ rang byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir// 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis kyang// de la sgrib pa ma yin te// nam mkha'
pa/ @#// la ni smin bzhin no// rang rig gzhan rig bye brag gis// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su snang// rang rig sprinam danam mkha' la// gzhan rig rnam rtoganam mkharamtshungs//

sprin tshogs rlung gis gtor byas te// sprin medamakha' 'dra snang ba nyid// gzhan rig rnamartog bral ba la// sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhes bya ste// rang rig kho na tsam du zad// dparan skyes bu nam mkha'i
lta ba la// sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig la bsgribs pa las// nam mkha' de la ma bsgribs ji bzhin no// grangs nidang po gcig yin to// gzhan rig rang rig gyur pa las// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam
pa grolamin// 'dir ni rang rig gcig kho na// de nyid rig cing nges pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byung// gzung 'dzin thabs dang shes rab sta// bsam gyis mi khyab gzhis pa'o// lus ngag samu
N+NaM kyi rang bzhin las// rnamapor stong dang mtshan ma mad// smon pa tshad dang sku gsung thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o/ byams dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms// sa chu marlung rang
bzhin las// bzhi yi grangs su nges pa ste// dga' ba la sogs de bzhin no// rigs lnga yi ni sangs rgyas lnga// phung po lnga dang chags sdang lta// bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa 'o// pha rol phyin
drug rang bzhin las// yul drug dbang po drug la sogs// bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid de/ brgya sogs grangasanibasam mi khyab// gang zhig rang rig gzhan rig gnyis// thog ma med
nas gnas pa ste// lus dang grib ma'i tshul du gnas/ rang rig mad par gazhan rig dag/ so so skya bo'i dus na 'dod// 'di yang rmongs chen ma rungasang// gzhan rig ma sbyangs thang rig 'dod// 'khor
ba spangs nas mya ngan 'das// khacig 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// rig pas blang dar gnyis su rtogs// de la sogs pa lta ba'i gdon// rig pa 'dzin la brgya rtsa bcu// theg pa mdo sde stong phrag gsum// nyan
thos rang rgyal brgya phrag gnyis// khyab 'jug drag po la sogs pa// lta ba'i gdon la bsam mi khyab// rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub// bde ba chen po'i ros gang//
khams gsum 'khor ba kun shesan// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba la// 'khor ba nyid ni myungana'adras// lta ba'i gdon dang bral ba ste// rang rig med cing gzhan rig mad// don dam kun rdzob gnyis
ka spangs// sems mad nam mkha'achos nyid mod// 'khrul ba med cing ma 'khrul med// theg pa mad cing rim pa mad// dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med// ye shesamad rung bdab mad/ mtha'

bral dbu mar me gnas pa// bsam mi khyab tu gnas paso// 'dirtogs khong du chud pa dang// mi 'jigs sgro skur mi rtsom pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rjeT+Thi 'dzin
pas byin rlob cing// mkha' 'gro kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas// rig 'dzin sa la 'jug paste// des kyang mnyam gzhag 'bad de bslab// rig 'dzinas la gnas par bya// rig 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang
pa[@#// jo 'dzinapa'is la 'jug/ rdo rje'adzin ba'i sar gnas te// bco lnga sa yi bdag nyid las// sku gnyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// gzhan gyi las dang smon lam stobs// de yi stobs/

kyis snang ba las// yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med// ma pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// dang po bla ma'i gdams ngag dang// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i bar// rang rig spyi yi rnam pa ste// chos nyid yul du byas
pa so/ rdo rdzo'adzin pa'i sar gyur te// rang rig rang gi mtshan tade ni// yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i// rtog med mkha' ltar snang ba yi// khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// bdag gi de nyid

tshul gyisano// mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun spangs te// sgrama'i tshul du gang gnas pa// snang ba mthar phyin pa yi tshad// thun dang 'pho ba chu tshod dang// dbyug gu skad cig rim pa la// sams kyi bying

rgod la sogs skyon// gal 'daben par gnas pha ni// snang mad mthar phyin tshad yin te// rang rig phyi yi tshad bstan to// snang ba mdzacing sgram mad// bya thartsal mad cing bgrod pamed// rang byung lhun
gyis grub pa ru// rtag tu mi 'gyur gang gnas pa// rang rig pa yi mtshan nyid la// mthar phyin pa yi tshad yin no// 'dod chags ro yos myos pa dang// sems bskyud sdom 'dzin dbang bskur dang//
tshogs kyi 'khor lo gdung ba'i dus// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// khyad par can du gsungs pa 'o// gzhan yang rtog pa'i sems dngayang// rtog mid soms dang 'dres pa yi//
gzugs la rten pa'i mig nyid kyis// rtog pa rgyun chad soms de nyid// sems kyi rgyun bral rgyu de nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// sgra la sogs pa'i de bzhin no// 'dod/
chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// tonamos nasazhi rtsub ste// byams dang sbyin sogs de bzhin ni// bzo sogs btang snyoms de bzhin te// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// byama'i//
zhal nas shes par bya// sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs dang// byams dang sAng rdzal sogs pa'i/ mdor nadakar po'i chos rnams dang// bzo dang sgyu rtsal la sogs dang// brgyud rdzogs
sgom pa'i rim pa kun// skyo ba gcig gam du mas ni// yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang// 'khor ba'i chos la gang skyo ba// bsam mi khyab la'ajug pa'i dus// bskyod dang rdzogs sog
mi gnas shing// rdzogs pa chen po gang 'dodapa// de yang 'jug pa'i dus yin te// bdud rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas// bar ma ched par 'jug pa'i dus// gzung ba'i thabs
ni bco brgyad de// mkha' mnyam gzhi bcas gzhi mad dang// g.yul drug dug gsum napa dang// lhan cig skyas nyid sgra la rten// sa chum rlu sgrartenu0f00/ chos rnamaMs gzod nasam skyes pa'i
rang rig sgom pa mkha' mnyam ste// bla mas sems gzung dang por gces// chos rnams thams cad sems yin ha// sems n gzod nas ma skyes pa// gzhi bcas rang rig rnal 'byor resamasan
gzod nas rang rig pa// gzhi mdabasam gyisomi khyab pa'o// gzugasasgra dri ro ga bya chos// de brtenasems gzung bla ma las// skyes bus 'bad de blang bar bya// de bzhin
'dod chags zhe sdang dang// gtimugarjes sumakhasapas gzu/lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung bzhi la// brten te skye ba med par sgom// bye brag sems gzung bsamami khyab// nyan thos la sogs theg
chen la// man ngag yod pa ma yin te// lta ba sbyod pa sems gzung dag/ rgyu dang 'bras bu lam dang yang// dus dang longs spyod rnal 'byor dang// bdag don gzhan don dgongs pa dang/ ngal dub
mtha' spangs tshog chung dang// tshogs sogs pa yi khyad par dang// khyadapar rnam pa bco lnga yis// rig 'dzin thig pa khyad par 'phags// kye ho bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// rang rig bsamami khyab pa
@# la sbyin dang byams sogs dgos pa'i// sku gnyis gzhan donagang las byung// bsam mi khyab la legs gnas pas// de nyid ci lags phyi ru ca/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sbyin dang
a khyams pa la sogs pas// gzhan rig rnam rtog 'gags pa dang// sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa'i// sems can rnams nisangs rgyas su// 'byung ba'i skyon du nges pas na// bsam mikhyad
la mi gnas kyab/ sbyin sogs 'bad de bslab pa'i pya// de la bsamami khyab pa 'byung// sku gnyis stobs dang mi 'jigs dang// gzung dang ting 'dzin la sogasakun// sbyin la sogs pa sbyin byas/
0 bsamami khyab pa 'byung bar nges// de nyid rtogs na bsamam khug/ de nyid ma rtogs 'khor ba'i chos// dbul pes nor bu'i byi dor bzhin// bsam mi khyab la sems gzhag kyang// bsur rdzogag/
rami bsasams gnas nas// de ni sngon sbyangs 'phro can te// sams kyi yig mgogacad pa gces// rang sems las su rung ba na// de ni phyi rtags nang du ste// de las nang rtags phyi ru 'byung// lus
la yid rab mad// skadaka gnyis ma sogs med pa// bslad dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no// 'khor ba sgyu mar snang ba dang// sprin mang mkha' ltar gang snang ba// bsam mi khyab pa'i rtags yin no//

de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyide bsam gyis ma khyab pa la rjesaMsu yi rang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi
rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so//dpaN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang/ lo tsA bshAkya ya shos kyis bsgyur ba'o//
rgyagar skadadu/ sha kha sam tan+tarA dzanAg/ bod skadadu/ dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bod ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'diskang bdag gis thos pa
dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsungadang/ thugs rdo rdzobatsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag gi nang nas mkhan/
sgra/ mkha' spyod dang/ sa spyod dang/ sa 'og na spyod ma gsum la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs pa/ dad ldan snying rjeraldan
dang rtsa gcig sams/ lus ngag gus bcas gzhan la phanasams ldan// 'jigs med brtul zhugs ldan zhing zab mo yi// lam la spro bar gyis nas legs par nyon// mkha' 'gro khyod/

kyimtshan tade ni// nga yis khyodal bshad par bya// mkha' spyod stong sgo'i rlungayan te// sa spyodabar du thig le'i sgo// sa 'og spyod pa shu kra'i sgo// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te/ dngapo mkha'

spyod mtshan nyid kyang// rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// khams po'i rlung dang rnam rtog rlung// kun gyi mtshan tade yo shas rlung// mdor bstan de nyid rim pas dbya// gnyis med rlung nimanang ste/ zung

'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung// ldang 'jug sku gsung thugs kyi rlung/ snying dang gzhang kha mgrin pa dang// lte ba'ilus ni khyab pa ru// rigs lnga'i rlung ni khyab par gnas// rgyu ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i

pa rlung// das snyigs 'byed pa brgyad du 'gyur// 'di nyid rlung ni thun brgyud de// thun re lana'apho ba gnyis// rlung gi 'pho ba bcu drug yin// 'pho ba gcig la chu tshod gnyis// tshutshid re la dbyug gu/
gnyis// rlung gi dbyug gu drug cu bzhi// de bzhin chu tshodasum cu gnyis// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya sogs// sems dang sems med 'dres pa'i rlung// rags pa dang ni phra ba la// mkhas bas
sams kyi bzhon par bzung// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin sems kyi// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas// de nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung// dbye ba thabs dang shes rab gnyis// 'di rnams
mkha' spyod rang bzhin te// de dag man ngag mkhas pas brtag/ yon tan skyon dang rtags rnams kyi// rlung gi mtshan nyid shes par bya// de dag kun gyi rtenanyidakyang// gzholam dngan g.yon mam//
'di ni gzhu yi rnam par gnas // bems po rlung gi lam yin to// dbangapo mngon sumalam yin pas// sna yo ri rab gling bzhi la// nyi zla byang nub lhor rgyug gi/ thabs dang shes rab skor sogs la//
'bad pas sems ni gzung bar bya// 'di dag bems pos yang dag gnas// mi shes pa yi rab 'ab kyis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// 'di'i rnam rtog rlung yin te// 'di nyid kyi ni lam gyur/

rom dang ni brkyang ma 'o// sngal 'khril lta bu'i rnam pa sta// rnal 'byor gyi ni dmigs pa'i yul// gnas dera rnamartog rlung bgag go/ rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// 'di nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung//
kun 'daramayi rtsa la rtan// tsa lI ni shing lta bu// rang rig ye shes spyod yul te// gnas de 'bad de rang rig gzung// mkha' spyod rlung garangabazhin phyir// 'di dag rdo rje'i lam yin te// de nas sa

spyod bshad bya ste// rang rig gis gang 'dod pas// tsan+d+hAlA yi bye brag brtag/ dang bor rang bzhin tsan+nAmI// gnyis pa gtum motsat+tAlA// gsum pa kha sbyaratsan+tA lA/ de bzhin gcer bu'i tsa'i lI/
de nyid la yang dabye ba ste// gcer bu gtum mo shin tu gtum// yang dag gtum mo gzhan sbyar dang// bye brag kun la sbyar bar bya// gcer bu shin tu gcer bu dang// gshin tugatso'abu/
po gcer bu sogs// 'di dag kun la sbyar bar bya// dbye nam pa bcu gnyis te// yan lag bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad// sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin te// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sogs// gzhan skyas kyi

tshu ni khromotsam// phra ba de las bzlog po'o// brgyudang nyibaskyayartso// sum cu rtsa gnyis sgra yi cu// lnga pa cha ste gtso bo gsum// gsum 'dus yungs kar gyi ni tshod// dbus dang g.yas g.yon phra sbom

bya gnyis 'gyur bye brag shes par bya// dngas ma dang ni sogs ma'i rtsal// rang bzhin du ni gnas pa la// yi ge lta bu'i rtsa mdud kyang// dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa// sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin no// gnas
la sogs pa gzhan nas shes// 'di nyid nor bu rin po ma// 'di la brten nas thams cad 'byung// rigs 'chol gnas 'chol tshad 'chol dang// dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la sogs// 'chol pa las ni

dngos grub min// de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni// sa spyodam yi dngos grub ste// thams cad kun gyi rten yin no// sa 'og spyodama'i rang bzhin tu// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// byang chub sems ni rnam pa
gsum// dang po tshos nyidasams yin te// 'di ni yos brjod yul las 'das// gnyis pa rang gi byang chub sems// dper na rkyen gyisobal sgong bzhin// gsum pa bems po'i byang chub sems/
yi snyadung ni ga pur te// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su gsungs// las kyi rlung dang las kyi mas// g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub sams/ yashes rlung dang e shes mos// g.yo ba don dam sems yin te//
das snyigs las ni rim pa yin// dbyibs dang kha dog las kyis ni// sems kyi khyad par shes par bya// las kyi rlung gis mi g.yo zhing// las kyi ma yis mi 'dzag par// kha pa lta bu'i mtshan nyid las/

mi shigs raM gi dbyibs 'dra ste// nor bu kun da'i mdog lta bu// dkar la 'ats+tsha' dang gzi mdangs snum// bde ba chen po'i skar byung ba// 'di ni don dam byang chub sems// dmar la gdung ba'i rang bzhin
khyad par bzhi ni thun mos// 'di ni shes rab byang chub sems// de las bzlog pa'i dman pa gnyis// 'og sgor gnasaM shonge srid pa ste// dman pa'i rkyen gyis g.yo bar byed// de phyir don dam kun rdzob

kyi sems kyi mtshan nyid shes par bya// rgyu 'cholapa las dngos grub mad// rkyen 'chol ba la de bzhin te// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// don dam sems kyi spyod yul yin// kun rdzob tshor ba bden pa'i

yul sa 'og spyod pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje gasumasgomami phyedapa// denyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// yi ga dngani yan lag dang// bsdus pa'i don dang spyi yi dono// sbas pa'i don dang mthar blug don//
smatshogs sems las 'byung bar 'gyur// nor bu dang ni sil snyan bzhin// rtog med rkyen las sna tshogs 'byung// A li kA li mang dang// drug tu sbyor ba brtag par bya// sgramatha' yi go bsamami/
khyob yan lag rnam pa gsum yin no// rgyu 'bras brdadang brdacan dang// brjod bya dang ni rjod byed do// de las bzlog pa bsdus par bshad// theg pa gsum dang de las

po gzhan/ thunamong spyi ru nges pa ste// bye brag rang las shes par bya// smras pa dbang dang sngags su dbye// sngags la bzhi ste dbang la gnyis// chos nispyi dang bye brag go/ de dag nagyi mtshan nyid
kyang/ bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// snod dang snod min bya brag kyang// bla mas legs par brtag bya ste// de nyid yang dag rtogs gyur na// ston pa med song bstan pamad// bsam gtan la sogs
rtsa'ajigs pa med// sas rgyas gzugs ni sna tshogs 'byung// bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs dang// chos kyi 'khor lasna tshogs bskor// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya min rnal 'byoradelhagal/
de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsus te// rnal 'byoranang pa de lhag la// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// shes rab snying po tsar gyuras// thabs dang shes rab bsrubs nge la// gnyis med thugs kyis
bsrubs pa las// bdudartsi'i'i ninyi shu bzhi// nor bu rin chen rgyud ces brjod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung// ji ltar ma bkrogs rom las// 'dod

ma gang yang 'byung ba min// de bzhin lo grangs mang po las// dngosogrubamyuradu'abyung ba min// de phyir rin chen zhishu bzhi// bdud rtsi'i ro'adraseng ge gzugs// gnas ninyi shu bzhi nyid kyang// sku gsung
thugs kyi byin brlabs te// mkha' 'gro nishu bzhi la gtad// phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab bo// dam du sba zhing dam du sbrel// rgya las 'das na dam tshig nyams// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag de/

sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de yi ngo bor rgyud kun brtag/ sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdaganyid// dbyibs kyang gnyis su shes par bya// re re'i bye brag dbye ba yang// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// nang

sbas pa mthar thug bzhi/ rgyud kun phyag rgya bzhi yin te// de nyid dbye ba mkhas pas brtag/ de nyid rtogs na rgyud dang ldan// de las bzlog pa 'das pa'o// rang bzhin gyi ni tsaNA li// gnas ni nyishu rtsa bzhi sta//
rtsa gsum gyis ni byon gyis brlabs// gnas ni'i shu rtsa bzhi ru// mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// rgyudatoshu rtsa bzhi gdud// du ru ram gtum gsang rdo rje// dzar gtum mig gsang ba gtsod// or

od ldan bsam mi khyab// A muny+tsa rtse am mkha'amanyam// go ru brtan blo nam mkha' che// ra ru mi'u thung sku gsung thugs// de rulang ka rin chen 'phreng// ma ru shing grib dam tshig che// ka ru a rastobs
po che// o ru'ajigs byed la shes gsang// tri rurlung shugs ye shes 'phrang// ko ruchang 'thung shes 'bar// ka rusha ma zla ba'i 'phreng// la ru shanabazang rin chen 'bar// karu rta rna nyema'i
'khor// the tshul kha ma shes rgyal// bre ru 'khor shugs mkha' 'gro gsang// gri khatsA gsang me 'bar// so ru shon te gsang bdud rtsi// su ru 'khor lo dur khrod brgyan// na rushin dpa' rdo rje rgyal/
si ru stobs chen ye shes rgyal// ma ru 'khor sgyur chags pa'i rgyal// ku ru brtson 'grus mkha' 'gro sdom// de dag gtad de lags par spes// nang du tsatsAl dag ni// nyi shu
bzhi ni gdad pa ste// dang po gsangab gnyis pa yang// rang bzhin yin te de nas dbang// rgyan ni tha mas gsungs pa ste// mkha' 'gro khyed kyi rong bzhin te// de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin//

blo dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pa// dbang dang dam tshig ldan byas te// rta dang glang po la sogs dang// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ bstan bkur dag gis bsnyen byas te// bdud rtsi yi ral las// bla ma'i
tshu zhal nas dngos grub blang// yid lazung la dran par gyis// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam
pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ paN+Di ta ga ya d+har dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis zhusashing bsgyur ba'o/
tshal [° ]/rgya gar skad du/ b+hA'i mahAkhas ma tanar dza/ bod skadadu/ dbal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos/
pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa thamasacad kyi skudang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// gzhan yang dpa' bo dang/ mkha' 'gro ma grangs
[s//]da pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de rnams kyi nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdoNasIng ngos/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas nya/
phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol pa/ kyi ho btsem ldan 'jigs pa che// bcom pa gang lags ldan pa gang// 'jigs pa gang lags chen po gang// bdag la khyod/
kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bcom pa bdud bzhi bcom pa ste// re ral ang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug gras su shes par bya// ldan pa de yiganyen
pa[W： （]dang po bum dbang bdud bzhi yang// kha dog dbyibs la lo rtog gis// bskyod pa'i gzung 'dzin dum dag/ phung po'i bdud du rab tu grags// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa// zhi
mos pa yi bdud yin no// yang dag lam ston bla mchod// zhe sdang ru trar skye ba yi de/ rgyu dang lam ston grogs ngan dag/ lha yi bu yi bdud pen te// las dang nyon mongs pa yi rgyus// srog cha
pa ni 'chi bdag bdud// bskyod pa'i rim la legs gnas nas// lhaya bu yi bdud kyang bcom// log rtog du ma'i rtog pa 'gag/ des ni phung po'i bdud bcom mo// rten dang brten pa rom[︽]ma//
nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// dus min 'chedang tshabad pas// bde dag 'chi bdag bdud yin te// chole stongasogs grub pa yi// tshayis 'chiba'i bdud bcom mo// gzhan yang bdud 'joms[}]
[o]/ thu/ bye bragani// phyi yi tsheyi bcud kyis len// grub na 'chi bdag bdud 'joms so// de bzhin lus kyi phung po ste// los spyod kyis nyon mongs 'joms// saMms kyis lha yi/
bdud bcom ste// rten dang brten ni sgyu mar ldan// de nas gsang dbang bdud bzhi yang// phyag mtshan khro tshul gar la sogs// phyi ru du ma phung po'i bdud// rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas// nyon
mongs pa yi bdud yin no// dman pa'i lam gang ston pa yi// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// phyi yi tsho yi bcud kyis len// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye bragani// sgo gsum
'khrul bar gang ston pa// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// sgo gsum las ni du ma'i chu// de nyid ma shes phung po'i bdud// de nyid 'bad de bsgrubs byas kyang// 'bras bu mi 'byung sems nyon mos// nyon
mongs pa yi bdud yin te// de yis tshe yi bar chad byed// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// rlung sogs gnas pa'i tshul shes pas// lha yi bu yi bdud bcom mo// de nyid sgyumar shes pa dang// de
nyid shes pas phung po dang// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// dngos po'i mthar lhang skya bas 'chi// rgyu mad las sa 'chi ba ste// rgyu rkyen ma bskyod rang bzhin gnas//stsams 'chibasdug bdu
bcom mo// tshol dbang sgyur ma lta bu// gnyen po'istobs dang ldan pa 'o// bas rab ye shes bdud bzhi yang// rtsa dang ngu'u kra la sogs pa'i// dman pa'i lam ston lha yi bdud// de nyid du/
0ma phung po'i bdud// de sgom rang bzhin nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin pas// kha dog dbyibasan sangs 'jig/ de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag
kyang 'dod chags chen po'i lam ston pa'i// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// dga' ba bzhi ni dum ste/ rgyud la spungs pas phung po'i bdud// rang sems nyon mongs pa yi bdud// 'khor bar ltung bas skye
ba sta skya ba las byung 'chi bdag bdud// rnam par rtog pa skyes pas so// 'dod chags kyisan 'badag bdud// ma sbyangs sum cu drug nyid dang// des pa sum cu rtsa drug gis// lan brten bla mas
lha bdud bcom// dga' bzhi sgyu ma 'ong bzhin mad// bde chen rol gyur phung po bcom// 'bras bu rang rig ye shes sbyin// 'angasams nyon mongs sdug bsngal bral// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo//
daI'achi ba dang bral bas/ nyidi 'chi bdag bdud bcomamo// 'og gi lam gyi bdud bzhi yi// dman pa'i stobs kyis bri pa ste// rgyal po dmangasasu phapa bzhin// de nyid lam gyi bdud kyis zin// rgyal

po rgyal sa shor ba bzhin// bzhi pa dang 'brel bdud bzhi ni// gsum pa'i snod dang ldan ng la// bzhi pa lam ston bla ma ni// lha yi bu yi bdud yin te// bdud gsum bla ma'i zhal las shes// snod min gsung
bsgrogs pa dang// mar dang kha ralasogs pa// 'khrungs te ma zhu dug 'gyur bzhin// khyad par bdud kyis zin pa ste/ rigs ngon rgyal sa 'dzin pa 'dra// dbangadang gdam ngag 'brel bcas pa// bdud
@#// 'joms lam gyi stobs dang ldan// ye shes lnga 'am yon tan drug/ ldan pa dag tu rab tu grags// bla ma gcig la snod bcud gnyis// thob na de nyid dam pa ste// bla ma gcig
! la dbang thob nas// zlam gcig la mnyan par bya// bla ma rnam pa gnyis su gsus// phyi yi bla ma de nyid do// nang gi bla ma bdag bo'i lha// 'dud dang dgra yi sdo rnams kun// thams cad 'jigs shing/
zhag byed pas// 'jigs pa zhes nagasungs pa ste// dgu dang bdud kyi g.yul las rgyal// dmigs pa lha sogs bdun dang ldan// de phyir chen po zhes ni gsungs// de'i tsho 'khor 'dus pa de

dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang/ thams cad rgyung la dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rang ba'agyurato// dang la nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
rgyu gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang/ lo tsA ba dge slongashAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba// huM// rgyugar skad du/ bIkA/
yanAtsit+titan+tArAdza/ bod skadadu/ dang la sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rjesams dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis 'dod chags che// mtshon gyur la ni yang dag gnas//
mgon bo blugasaN+Dachaldazhapa// khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// rdordzo'adzin pas bka' stsal pa// sku ni bum pa'i ngobs// gsung ni gsang ba'i ngo bo yin// thugs kyang shes rab ye shes to// sas

rgyas spyan dang mA ma kI// dam tshig sgrol ma gos dkar mos// rdordza'adzin la 'di skad gsol// rgyud kyi don la rab goms shing// smra ba'i tshig gis ma rmos shing// gzhan gyi rtsod pas mirdzi yang// dbang dang man
ngag ma thob pa// dbang bskurarab gnas sbyin srag sogs// sngags spyod ngal ba don mdade// shanas sems can dmyal bar skye// de phyir gtso bos dbang gsum gyi// man ngag yang dag bshad du gsol//
rdo'adzin nga sa bka' stsal pa// dang por bum dbang rim pa yang// gnas nangeshin tu bsngags pa btsal// bkra shis yid dga' ngashan tu snyam// bkra shis bya rnams skad snyan sgrogs// dpag bsam shing
rgyas yod par 'dod// gzhan yang dur khrod shing gcig gam// chungogs dag la sogs pa ru// sa bdag sa yi lha mo la// gtor ma sbyin sog mchod yon gyis// sa bsang phyi'i ni mtho rnams gzugs//
de nas dang po bsnyan pa dbul// bsnyan pa gsum ni rab 'bring thu// mtshan ma grangs dang dus su gsungs// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// mtshan ma gzugs dang 'od dang sgra// grangs ni stong dang khri
dang 'bum// dus ni bco lnga bcu gsum dang// bdun du bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang// lha rnams bstanapas mnyes byas nas// lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun// lhag par gnas pa tshul bzhin bya/
bkra shis lo grangs ldan pa yi// bumo ku sha'i phyogs mthun pa'i// ku sha btsal la mtshan ma brtags// soshing rtse mor ma togadri// srung skud la sogs mtshan ma brtag/ dbang gi dkyil 'khor
khasnyad par bya// dkyil 'khor slob ma rab 'bring tha// ting 'dzin me tog rdul tshon 'am// gang dang ldan pa de nyid do// de nas mchod rdzas rim pa dgram// khaMbi ra i sngags kyis kyang//

! de la rtsordzas byab par bya// de nas ku sha la sogs la// phyogs pa'i tshog dang bcas bya// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba'i rdzas// bla ma mnyes par bya ba dang// dkyil 'khor lha rnams mchod pa'i phyir// rta dang
glang po ma he dang// rin chen la sogs gter rnams dang// spos dang mar ma la sogs pa// brgya'am stong ma khri ma 'bum// bla re rgyan dang ba dan sogs// byin brlabs tshogs bsags phyi ru dgod//
de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// khrus dang yan lagadri yis rgyug/ kye ho khyod ni ji lta bu// 'jig rten 'khrul pa las sad na// haru kar grags chen po yi// dkyil 'khor chen po'i khyod rol lam// dad
pa dang bcas spro bar gyis// rnam rtog dang bral rdo rje soms//dga' chan khyod bdag ston pa po// rdo rje 'dzin pa dgos su gsol// byang chub chen por lung ston pa// mgon po tshanapo bdag 'tshal lo//
dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems ni bdag lastsol// par las byung bdag la stsol// gsang ba las byung bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag
ni gzhug tugasol// legs so 'a gas so rogs kyi bu// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rnam rtog thamacad 'jig byed pa// gnyis med khyod kyis blang bar bya// mi bskyodabcom ldan dang mtshung

bar ma nga 'i zil gyis mi non khyod kyis byang// dam tshig spyod pa spyad na ni// mchog gi de nyid blang bar bya// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug nam yang khyod kyis spang mi bya// chos spyod de bzhin bsam
gtan la// 'bad pasasams ni brtan par bya// chang ni rtag btung khro mi bya// de bzhin sha ye shes par bya// gzhan gyi phyag rgya brtenang ra bya// 'di na dem tshig brgyad yin no// dkon mchog gsum la
skyabs su 'gro// thun mong sdom dang sems bskyod sbyin bskor ba lan gsum phyag gsum bya// yol bas bar du gcad nas nio// mig la sogs pa lnga bkab la// lha gras du yod me tog sbyin/ ]kun
khyad chus bsal dag bya// ma tog dang bcas rdordzayang// de yi steng la bzhag la bsgom// slob dpon lanar rnyas byed sogs// ltung ba'i nyes pa brjod par bya// phyi e rdordza'adzin pa dbab// sngon
du sdug pa lan gsum dral// mig gis gzugasa rnams mthong ba dang// rna bas sgra dang sna yis dri/ lce yis rod lus kyis leg/ dngos grub 'phrin las so soru// mkhas pas shes shing
brtag nga ra bya// lo tog dor tulha yang sbyin// 'khor rnams gtso bo'i yan lag yin// gtsobo'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// ji ltar gso ba'i sman pa yis// dbang po lnga yi zug rngu 'byin/ da bzhin
sems dpa' chen po yis// mi shes pa yi rab rib kun// rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bsal// de la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bstan// dbang gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du// bad+ma'adab ma brgyud
pa ru/ bzhag la rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur/ chu khams mi bskyod ma lengagis// rdoN+Darigs kyi 'phrin las 'grub// dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan te/ mnyam nyid ye shes rang

kyi bzhin gyis// rin chen rigs kyi 'phrin las 'grug/ 'od dpag med pa rtsordza'i dbang/ so sorartog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// pad+ma'i rigs kyi 'phrin las byed// dril bu don yod grub pa ste// bya ba nan tanaya

shes kyis// 'phrin las sna tshogs byed nga ra 'gyur// rigs las dras nas ming gi dbang// rdo rjadang sbyar rdorjesams// rnam snang chen po'ing bo ste// chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin las// da bzhinanyid
kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin// mi 'jigs seng ge 'i khri stosasu// rig byed slob dpon dbang sbyin bya// bdud bzhi 'joms pas rgyal mtshan bzhi// chos rnams mi nub rgyal mtshan 'dzugs// chos kyi sku yis kun

la khyab// gdugs kyis steng nas dgab par bya// dordzadril bu brtul zhugs gnyis// phyag rgya'i dam tshig gsum yin te// dbugs dbyung ba dang lung bstan dang// rjes su gnang dang phyir mi ldog/ brtan par
byed dang rnam pa lnga// gzhan yang rdzas kyi bye brag rnams// rin chen bdun la sogs pa kun// thun mong yanapar ngayis gsu/ bum pa'i dbang la rnam gsum ste// dkyil 'khor du 'jug dang po yani//
gnyis pa rig pa'i dbang yin te// brtan par byed pa gsum pa'o// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// lus ni ri rab lhun po la// byang chub sems kyi gnas bcas nas// bde ba'i stan la gnas sa su//

gsong ba'i dbang gis rten gyur pa// rig ma dang po btsal bar bya// dang po shes pas brtag pa dang// bdag dbang yod pa 'a blang ba dang// nyes pa dag par sbyang ba dang// dkyil 'khor bskyod par bya ba dang/

bar chod bgegs rnams zhi ba dang// srung dang de la tshogs kyis mchod// driyi thig le dum bya// g.yo nan gnas pa de nyid dang// srub dang bsub thabs sbyor ba dang// bsrubs las bdeba'i chu rgyun gyis// lus

kun khyab na gsang ba ru// dkar la rtsa dmar lta bur 'dzag dkyil 'khor du 'jug gong dang 'dra// roma'i 'khor lor d+hu bsams laM// lce de pad+man byin brlabs te// lce yi rtse mor gyu bsams la// sirlag pur
'dres pa yis// sgyu lagazhag ste de la bstim// sor gnyis los spyod mnyam sbyor la// dbus su mi dmigs bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i dpang la rnam gsum ste// rdo rje gatso mos sbyin pa dang// khro mo sbom
bos sbyin pa dang// rdordzag tshangs sbyin pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang la yang// dang por shesarab brtag pani// lus dang ngag dang yade dang gsum// mkhas pas brtag cinge shes par bya// de nas khyad
paralnga brtags te// rigs dang lang tsho los spyod dang// rgyan dang gzugs kyi khyad par l// phyi yi brtag pa yin par gsungs// soms brtan rdordzayi ni rigs// khyad par yin par ngayis gsungs/

rnam rtog chung ba'i rdo rje yi// lang tsho'i khyad par yin par gsungs// mi rtog pas brgyan zhes pa ste// joNi'i rgyan gyi khyad par yin// de nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur/ mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan to// jo rdzas
gzugs kyi khyad par yin// chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid// da rel longs spyod pas// rdo rje'i longs spyod khyad par ro// kun 'dalam ste thugs kyi roges// 'gas kyi khyad/

parayin pa'o// de nyid mda' ltar mkhrang bani// thugs kyi lang tsho'i khyad par ro// rtsa de dmar la dngas pa dang// byang chub sems 'adakar la das// gnyis su med la dkar ba'itshul// dpa' na nor bu ka ke
ru dar la brgyus pa ji bzhin du// thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad par ro// la la nA dang ras nA// a ba d+hAtIraganyis med la// sbyod thugs longs sbyod khyad par so/ dang por phyi lo gnyis pa nang// gsum
pa gsang ba'i brtag pa lo// lus brtag pani sku yin te// ngag brtag pa ni gsung du 'gyur// yid brtego thugasasu'agyur ba 'o// skya matsam gyi dgos pa'i don// kun la khyab par shes par bya//
lus kyi drag la ngag gi dun// sams kyi bdun po rgyama'i tshul// dang porasmig rgyu chur 'khrul dang// gnyis pa sbag rgyutaM de yin te// gsum pa sag rgyu mi sna bzhi// de bzhin zhal nas shes par//
chul bdun nomalal gcig/ drinibadun teka'al gnyis// sgo nga bzhi ste 'o ma gsum// 'di rnams btsal ba'i rten gyurang// lo ni gsum bzhi yin par gosus// ka ra gnyis da bu ram gcig changani

gnyis su shes par bya// rgyanani bye brag sna tshogs so// dgun dang de bzhin ston gyisha// zhag gnyaganani bcud dang ldan// dbyar dang dpyid kyi sha rnams kyang// drod dang ldan zhing bcud dang ldan// rang bzhin
pa gi bsha yin te// 'dun pa byas na dam tshig nyams// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas/ gzhan yang 'bras bu la sogs snyan// maradang bcas pas sbyar bar bya// sha yang mar gyis de bzhin no// kha

bas kun gyi bcud spyod du// mngar ba kun gyis ro na byed// bcud dngashani gzhon nusdu// rortsa sha ni bco lnga yin// bcud skyod sha dang mar gnyis kyang// lnga dang lnga yi cha yis bsus/ chang ni mnyam
