por gsungs pa 'o// ro rtsa ba yi shu la yang// 'o ma sgo nga chamanyam nga ra// lnga gsum lnga gnyis gtso bor bya// kha ra'i chang ngam 'om 'am/ dag dang mnyam por sbyin par bya// 'di niyan lag spres ban
so de nas mtshams gcad bastan pa dang// dam tshig sna tshogs bya ba yang// spros pa med pa 'i yan lag A// dbang bskur sngon du sgom pa'i don// dbang thob phyir ni nga yis gsungs// rig ma
gtad dang man ngag sbyin// brda rnams bya zhing 'dod pa'i rtags// rtag pa shin tu spros pa mad// phyag dang zhabs la sogs pas 'khyud// dang po'i sbyor thagos zhes gsungs so/ dbu rgyan
mgul rgyun lasogaso nga// sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya sta// langs pa tsog pu gan rkyal dang/ kha spub 'phrad dang lnga yin te// 'di rnams kun gyi ra gongs pa zab// dgongs mad spyad pa spyod byed
dpa// 'di ni ma nor yod skya ba'i rgyu// tha mal pa las brgya 'gyur gyis// bum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba'o// bum pa dang ni gsang ba ste/ gsang ba las gzhan gsum pa ste deyi rnam smin brjod
u@#// mi lang nga dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim pani// bla ma'i zhal lasashes par bya// yanalag bdun bsgoms sbyor ba dngos// khyadapar rnam pa gsum las byung// sngags dang
po smanani dang po ste// gnyis pa sbyor thabs yin par gsungs// gsum pa ting 'dzin yin pa ste// sngags dang sman gyis kund drang// skodashing tshad dang gnas pa'i ched// drang ba'i tshod rnams shes
rgya par bya/ 'byung ba bzhi dang rigs mthun pa'i// kod shing rkad pa'i tshod dang mnyam// sor gsum sor bzhi dar ram man// gnas pa'i tshad ni rnam pa drug/ rnam tharagasang ba'i pho brang gnas// sgyu
mchod rig par gnas pa 'o// stong pa rta mgrin 'khor lor gnas// khamasa rnams gsang ba bde skyong gnas// 'dab la sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas// yang dag spong ba snying khar gnas// he ru kar nam

tsho gshigs shing// rdo rjemada' yis ma brgyab pa'o// drang ba'itshad nisor bzhi dbyug/ dang po khrus byas gnyis pa la// smanodang snum dang dri dang gsum// sum chasum gnyis stod smad du// lus la bsku

zhing mo la bdug/ rtsa gsum rtsa ni shin turngab// ba sprub dang rtsa ba dang// ra mnyeb dang nyo'u shing dang// ra mo shags dang yan lag bcas// jo rdzal sogs lnga sbyaradrang// gzhan yang sman dang snum dang dri//
daral sogs pa'i nang du blugs// sgo gnyis nas ni tho ldes bdug/ zab pa'i sngags btab bsgoms byas nas// dang por mtshan ma shes par bya// chags pa'i gzi ldan sna tshogs 'byung/ tha ma'ang
gsum mam bdun na 'byung// dgongs pa'i bye brag shes gyur nas// sngags dang sman gyi khyad par ro// dgos paseshas 'dod chags phyir// sman la sogs pa btsal mi bya// 'di yi sdig pa bsam mi/

khyab gdug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur na// dbus kyi rtsa yi kha 'byed pa// sbyor thabs khyad par yin par gsus// bde chen go bzlog sbyor ba dang// 'khor lo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang// sku yi go bzlogasbyor

bdang// yongashes go bzlog sbyor ba dang// 'byung ba go bzlog sbyor ba dang// yum gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang// thig le go bzlog sbyor ba dang// bsam gtan go bzlog sbyor ba dang// yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba dang//

stonganga'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang// dbugs kyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang// dga' ba'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang// gtum mo'i go bzlog sbyor pa dang// rtsa yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang// byang sems go bzlog sbyor ba dang// g.yA/g.yon go bzlog sgo rab dang dbardza yi go bzlog spyir btang rjen gyi go bzlogs

g.yon go bzlog sbyor ba dang// brda yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang// rten gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang// kun mkhyen gyis kyang ma gzigs pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang// byang chub sems dpa'i kun gyi yum

sras rnams thun mong ma yin bskyod// ting nge'adzin gyi khyad par ro// 'di yi khyad par ma dpags par// zab pa'i donani yod ma yin// dbang bskur pa yi sngon du yang// gdamasangag sbyin par gsungs pa yin/
gdams ngag de yis dbang thob 'gyur// shes rab ma la brten nas su// bde ba'i gshes bskyed pas na// shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungasaM// si h+phag pur shes rab ste// de yi bde ba la ngashos yin// si
shes rab ces bya ste// ga pur ye shes su zhi bshad// rtsa gsum 'dus pa shesa'ab ste// de yithig le ye shes yani/ la la nA niya shes so// rasanA ni shes rab ste// rtsa ni shes
tsa rab ces bya ste// byang chub sems ni ye shes so// mkha' 'gro ma ni shes rab ste// dpa' bo ya shos su na bshad// dga' ba gsum ni yo shes te// rang bzhin dga' ba shes rab yin// 'og ni shes rab
cas bya ste// stongal ye shes su yang bshad// g.yon pa shes 'baces bya ste// g.yas pa shes su yang bshad// chos dbyings shes rab ces bya ste// ye shes bzhi ni shos yin// phyag mtshan ming dang
yig rnams// gzhan yang bye bragangashes par bya// shes rab yoshes la yang gsum// tshig la bslab pa'i ng gnangab yin// gzugs brnyan la ni bshadapa ste// mngon par rtogs pas bsgom pa gsungs//
a ri ma ya'i rnam pa yang// e nis sta bo ni chu// mnam ste yanirlu// e ni snying rjebin byams// ma ni dga' ba ya btang snyoms// a ni sbyin mAm kA// ma ni gos dkar ya sgrol ma// o ni spyin pa thaM/

zla tshul khrims// ma nibazod pa yi bsam gtan// e ni phyogargya chen po ste// khaM ni dam tshig phyag rgya yin// mni chos kyaphyugargya so// mni shes rab phyag rgya go/ e nishar ta bi lho phyogs// ma ni nub ste ya byang
phyogs// a ni sku yi thig le// lo ni gsung la ma nathugs// ya ni yi shesathig le 'o// a ni sngon po bo ljang ku// ma ni dmar po yasarapo// e ni mkha' 'gro sol ma// ma ni dum skyes ya gzugs can//
a ni yoshes mkha'a'agro ste// khaM nirdo'imakha' 'gro yin// ma ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro ste// ya ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'o// a ni 'gog pa paM ni lam/ ma ni sdug bsngal ya kun 'byung// en bde chen

tha sa spyod// mni chos la sprul pa// e ni mtshan ma raM stongs// mna rnam thar ya dpe byad// a ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// r-in rnam par smin pa'o// mna rnam par nyed pa ste// ya ni rnam pa mtshan nyid/

bral/ a ni chung du paM 'bringapo// monalhag pa char lhag/ a ni g.yas nas margyu ste// ban g.yon nas rlung rgyu 'o// ma ni'og nus rlung rgyu// yin ston gnas achurlung rgyu// e nib nas brtan bai pha' chen//
ma ni bskur ba sa thams cad// rnabasnyen pa bi bstan// ma nisgrub pa yasgrub chon// a ni shar lho bo lho nub// ma shar mtshams yo nub mtshams// sa ni rgyud la bi nesngags// ma ni yongashes yag sab/
ba a ni snang ba saM snangamachod// mnasnang thob ya 'od gsal// a ni bdag gi bzang po yin// bi ni dus kyi bzang po yin// ma yongashas bzang por gsungs// ya ni rlung gi bzang po yane// ani bdag gi
gnas yin te// r-ini rnal 'byora gnas su bstan// ma nigazhan gyi gnas yin te// a ni rgyud kyi gnas yin no// a ni garab thaM mchog dgag/ man lhan cig la dga' bral// inam longasaMmanyam
di ngumanikun rtogs ya nan tan// e ni chos sku paM los spyod// mnisprul sku ya bde chen// a ni 'o de paMnidabang// ma ni rgyas pa ya gsod pa// yi ga btusapa'i sngags chen gsum// onasku yi 'khor
[5]3/ @#// et+taM Anichos gsung 'khor lo 'o// r-i ni thugs kyi 'khor lo yani// u0f00ni rnam snang A'od dbag med// hU~Mni mi bskyod rang bzhin no// oM na phyag g.yon hU~Mni g.yas/ Ani dbus//

kyi kyisnying ka yin// o ni g.yon gyi spyan yin te// hU~Mnigs sa pa Adabus ma// o ni srog la hU~M rtsol ba// Ani gnas par shes par bya/ daonoskye la hU~M ni thugs// Anag gsung du shes par bya// onalus
la Aningag/ hU~Mni yid du shes par bya// o ni thebs la hU~M shes rab// Azhiganyis su med pa'o// on g.yon gyi la la nA// hU~Mni g.yas kyi sa nA// Ani a badz+hAtI in// o ni g.ya sa kyi rasanA/
hU~Mni g.yon gyi la lanaM// Anod bzhin dbus na gnas// o ni ga purahUMsi/ A ni dkaradamar rtsa dag yin// o ni mchog dga' hUM khyad dga'// Athan rang bzhin dga' ba'i don// dga' ba lhan cig/

skyos dag 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pa dga' bar 'gyur// rgyu la 'bras bu sbyor ba dang// 'bras bu la ni rgyu sbyor dang// rgyu la rgyu ya sbyor ba dang// 'bras bu la yang 'bras bur sbyor// rgyu 'bras gnyis su
wa med par sbyor// thabs la shes rab sbyor ba dang// shes rab la yang thabs kyis sbyor// thabs la thabs kyis sbyorab dang// shes rab shes rab sbyor ba dag/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis mad sbyor/
sbyor ba 'di yi dgos pa yang// kun makhyen gyis kyang rtogs par dka'/ daano rnam snang mi bskyod pa/// naron chen 'byung ldan te// zla tshes 'od dpag med pa yin// thig le don yod grub pa 'o// oM na

0 bdagshegs lnga rang bzhin// zhabs bskyodadon yod grub pa ste// 'ani de bzhin 'od dpag med// hani rnam ngo ra snang mdzad de// zla chos rin chen 'byung ldan yin// thig le mi bskyod rang bzhin no// zhabs

bskyod sgrol ma'i rang bzhin te// 'jigs dkarango bo yin/ hani rdo rje dabyings phyug ma// zla tshes mAm kI rang bzhin// thig le spyan du shes par bya// 'byung ba lnga dang sku lnga dang// 'khor lo lnga dang dga' ba
lnga go rim bzhin du shes par bya// zhabs baspyod phyu pa nan tan yin// 'ani tam nyid ye shesaso// hani chos kyi dbyangs yon te// zla tshes so sor rtog pa'o// thig le ma long yang shes so// 'di dag
kun gyi dgos pa'i don// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gsang// kun tu gsang zhes dpyad nga 'dakag/ yi ga'i tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdordzasang nge dang/ mkha'
'gro ma'i tshogs kyis mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/// paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang/ lo/
ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//@#// rgya gar skadadu/ shrirahAmA la tan+tarAdza/ bod skad du/ dpal rin chen phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal ngo
dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mos gsol pa dordza'adzin// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// rin chen 'phreng ba'i don ma rtogs// khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ton cig lha mo spun bzang ring/ dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// ma gsungs nga yis khyod la bshad/ rin po che ni rnam pa gsum// de yi 'phreng po'ang
rnam pa gsum// dang po snod kyi 'on poche// gnyis pa bcud kyirin pocha// snod bcud gnyis dang rang bzhin bral// de ni rin chen gsum pa yin/ lha mos gsol ba bcom ldan 'das// rnam pa gsum du gsung

pa las// de rnams 'di chon ji lha ralags// de yi 'phreng ba ji ltar lags/ de rnams su mi spyod yul lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nga// dang po snod kyi'on po che// rnam pa lnga ru shes par bya//

kaka' rnying ka po che// mi bskyod ra yis byin brlabs te// dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu la// panongang pa'i sgong tsam// 'di ni rin chen ' bar pa ste// ba dkar dkar lug dkar mo'i// 'o ma bsku zhing sngangs

dang// mi bskyod pa la mchod par bya// de nas spyi boragadags pa'o// mchod pa'i bye brag kun la bya// shar gyi gdon rnams thub pa dang// gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni gzhan skyes sbom po tsam//

'di ni chen dge ba ste// dngul chu rnam pa gnyis thugs la// rkyen gyi rdzas rnams tshang ba dang// kha yi nangadu gzhug pa ste// ro ma'i 'khor lo lces mnan la// de nas dal gyis bskyod pa dang// gsang ba'i rdo

rje'isna rtse ru// bde ba chen po skyes tsam na// roma'i 'khoralor dog pa mnan// dper na sbrul gyi sha zos pa// mgo bo mnan pas phyi ru 'byung// de bzhin mnan pas byang chub sems// snartse las kyang gyon

ba la ldog/ til dang til mar bzhin du gnas// khyadamarab de ba gyenal ste// bde ba ster phyi'i ri bo cha// de yi phye ba du marab shad// tham skyes pa'i khro mo tsam// e ran la sogs sman lnga dang// spyi bo'i gtsug tu/
btags gyur na// lus kyi gter ma zad par byed// de nas yang dag gnyis pa yang// bozlumani sngon po ste// rin chen 'byung ldan byin brlabs te// dbyibs nisogs ka lta bu ste// rab kyi tshad ni glang po'i
mig/ 'dini ri chen mu gu ste// ngang pa'i sgo nga ljong ros dang// spangasham dang gsum sbyar nas// degadugasarnab g.yos su gdags// lho yi gdon rnams thub par gsus// gang la yod pa de la
skyob// 'bring ningang pa'i sgo nga tsam// 'di ni 'chan ma ran da// ga pur rak+ta dngul chu gsum/ de yi nang blugs lce lkog tu// gyen thur gnyis n sne dang 'jug/ de yis byang chub sems bzung ste//
mgal ma'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas// tham bya khu sgong tshad tsam// a ru ra dang skyu ru ra// kha ru ra dang ldong ros rnams// bsras te lus la rab zhugs te/ 'di ni d+han d+hakas pa ra// lus kyis ne'u
'byer bar byed// de nas yang dag gsum pa yang// pad+ma rAg dmar pos// dbyibason zlumapo lta bu la// 'od dpag med kyis byin brlabs te// rab ni kar sha pa Na stong// gur kum ga mur lnga sbyaral//
de la bsku zhing byugartsa 'o// lta ba'i dbus su bzhag la bcing// 'di nirat+taka rum// nub kyi gdona rnams thub par gsungs// 'bring ni kar sha paN ste// 'dazhirahAka ras// maradangs losbrum
dang lnga bzo ru byas pa'i dngul chu rnams// de yi nang blugs ste bar mnan// 'di yis byang chub sems gzung ste/ chu la chu bzhag ji bzhin no// tham kar sha pa Na ste/ 'bras bu gsum

dang ru rtadang// mar gyisnying po dang sbyaratu// spyi bo'i gtsug tusla ba dang// 'di niratAbade bas/ sgra dkarayodapar byed pa'o// de nas yang dag bzhi pa yang// de ni margad ljang ku ste// dbyibs nigru bzhi lta bu ste// don
yong grub pas byin brlabs// rab nib con dbyug pa tsam// 'di'it+tag gan/rtsa ba lnga dngayan lag bcas// bsus la rna ba g.yon dugadags// 'di yis byang gi gdon rnams thub// 'bring ni bu mo'i sgong
tsham ma hA de ba um de// gnyis kyig purarak+ta yis// phyugs la lta ba'inang du gzhug/ ga puras glu gnyis ka 'dzin// tham gzhan sasgo ngatsam// ldong rosasar po gsar dung gsum// mnan chagacig

ni byin nas nii// 'din a runa' shu// srin bu mi skya bde dang ldan M// 'di nirahAsan da ha// de nas yang dag lnga pa yang// kha dog dbyibs ni du mar snang// rnam par stanga mdzad byin brlabs te// de rnams so so dua byed/
lcamos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// ma'ongs so so skye bo yis// rin chen gnas rnams gang nas btsal// 'an chen mi 'tshal ji ltar lags// rin po chani ji ltar brtag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
rgyu mtsho chen po'i phyi rolan// rin po chayo glinge yod da// de yi gnas nias btsal bar bya// gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni// gser dngul lasogs jomasan// gsoradangul kun nayod par gsung//

rina chen shes pa rnam pa lnga// dang por rgyud rnams thams cad la// rmongs pa med pas shes pa dang// bla ma'iman ngag shes pas thob// gnyis pa rnal 'byor bcas pas shes// gsum pa rgyud kyi man ngag la//

zhugs pa'i tshong dpon chen pos shes// bzhi pa yon tan kun ldan pa'i// rgyal po chen podas shes so// lta ba rnal 'byor mkhas pa dang// rgyal po dang ni 'brel ba yi// gsaramagaramakhas pas rtogs par 'gyur//
lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// dang po'i man ngag jiltar yin// gnyis pa rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// gsum pa rgyud na ji ltar lags// bzhi pa'i yon tanaji ltar lags/ lnga pa 'brel ba ji ltar lags//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po man ngag shes pa yang// rin chen ngo bo gcig nyid la// yon tan du mkhas pa ste// dbastan rdzas kyi pha lam bzhin// tshul mi 'byipa 'bigs la sogs// dus shes

dmanangag yin// rnal 'byor shes pa rtse gcig ste// de yis thams cad shes pa yin// rgyud kyi donani shes pa yi// tshong dpon de yis shesapa yin// sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa yi// yon tan kun ldan rgyal sde
shis rgyal po rnal 'byor dnga'abrel ba'i// sa 'og gsar gyi rlang pas shes// gsaramog de yis shes pa 'o// brtag pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// mngon sum dang mtshan ma ste// rdo rjepha lam la sogs dang//
e'anad+ha la sogs pa yi// mngon sum gtan la phab pa yin// mahAmIl la sogs pa// gdon rnams thub cing lha rnams skyob// dam tshig nyams pa gso ba dang// cho rnams ring ba la sogs so// dang por gdon
gyimtshan man// mkhas pas brtag cing shes bar bya// de nas rten gyi mchinam la// de nyid chog tshul bzhin bya// de nas chu mig gtsang ma'u// gtor ma btang la tshugatsang sbyang// gser dngul/
snod du chu blugs la// lha bam klu'am gnod sbyin sogs// mtshan ma gnyis kyi maN+Dal la// rnal 'byor pa yis gzhug par bya// gom pa gsum gyis gcad par bya// g.yon gyi maN+Dal thog tu// chu yanang
du solong gzhag/ phyi ru gtor ma chagacig gzhag/ nang du yol ba dkarapos gcad// de ru tshogs dang bkra shis gzhag/ rnal 'byor yan lag khrus byas la// lha yi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa dang// khro
bos drag tu mtshams gcad la// sbom bo khro mo lha lubasgom// de yis rin chen dang po gzung/ de nas sor bzhi 'phyang du gzhu// thubapami thub la sogs pa// mkhas pas brtagasai shes par bya// dbyibs
dang kha dog rin po che// yon tanamed pa ga la srid// dper na bu gcig s+yas gyur na// phamed pa yang ga la srid// de bas mkhas pas brtag par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gser dngul la sog
jiltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsaranI rnam pa gnyis yin te// rang bzhin dang ni bza' byas yin// rang ban gyisani 'chi ba bslu// bzo byas pa ni rnam pa gnyis// gsar 'gyur
gser gyi rgyan yin te// bdar ba'i lamani sridalam 'gags// lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed// mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya// dngu'u la sogs pa'i ng de bzhin te/ mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas//

phab thams cad ni po tsho yin te// man ngag can gyis shes par 'gyur// de nas bcud kyirin po che// lus kyi ra zeb lhumapo la// rin chen gser gyi dbye ba yang// thabs dang shes rab rin po cha// shes rab rtsal rong
bzhin te// thabs ni byang chub sems yino// dmar dang dang b shes rab ste// dkar dang dngab thabs su gsungs// a ba d+hA tIrin chen las// thig le du ma 'brang ba yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das//

a ba d+hA tIji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'astsal pa/ a ba d+hA tI'i rangabazhin las// snyingadusgo lnga yang dag gnas// bar dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin te// bskyod dang rdzogs dang rang bzhin las// yon tan

skyon gyi tshan nyid do// bde chen thig le haMyin no// odang A/hU~Mha dang bzhi// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ru// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che// 'bar ba bzhi ruyang dag bshad// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che//

mgrin pa runa'ijug pa bzhi// snying karaya ni'adzagapa bzhi// sbrel pa yang de bzhin tu// chos kyi sku ni ronechanal// stong pa bcu drug 'phreng bar bshad// de nas shin tu gsang ba'i don// pad+ma rdordzaganyis pa la/ a

ba d+hA tI ni po cha/ a dzar tsha dngabai dang bzhi// gsang ba'i thog lobazhi rungashad// anim long lta bu ste// phaTani bya ba nan tapa'i///ani so sor rtog pa ste// ro ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// rin chen chos dabyinges ye shes

ta rnam par thob dang stong pa dang// mtshand dbazhin dpe byadan sa/ ani 'khor lo 'byung ba bzhi// phaT kyi gnas su ye shes lnga// ma yi gnas su snyoms 'jug dag/ khaM gi gnas sulnga bcu brgyad// dbon su shes/
par bya// klu a tas bon bzhi// yon tanason gyi mtshan nyid kyis// kun la khyab cing shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis gdon rnams ji ltamathub// byang sems dag/ga pa ji

ltar lags// sku dkaraganyeram dza ltabazhi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalal// rnam par rtog pa gdon yin te// mtshan dang dpa byad sbyong ba dang// phung po ldan bdud rtsi lnga// skyamachod de lnga 'gyur// khams rnams

rtanagyi ngo bo ste// de rnams rten rtsa'i bsko// rnamartog spong phyir som// byang chub sems dgagamapa yang g.yas brkyang bsanithangasakyis te// g.yon gyis shesab rtsa mdud dgag/ sa gsanam mkha' dgag par bya//

zlum pos gsang ba'i sna rtsar dgag/ lu'an dang rasanA/ aban+d+hatu'i zhingachudab// de ni ma mkha' zlum po ste// dang nasprul gyi lce gnyis la// dug dang smananiyodapa bzhi// gzhan yang 'dug stangs bye brag gnyis// dgag pa'i chu

brag shes par bya// 'gag pa sogadang rtsol ba'irtan// deltar dbusasu gnas pa dang/ rimanasarim par gyaladrang// skad cig nas bzung re yi bar// skudakar gnyer ma'i rang bzhina'agag/ gang la brtan pa da yi tshad// lha mos

gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// dbus su gnasabaji ltar lags// rim nas rim duji ltadrang// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkagastsal pa// thabs zhes bya ba rtag pa'i mtha'// shes rab ces pa chad pa'i mtha'// snyoms par zhugs

padabu ma'i don// g.yas kyi srogazhirtag pa'imatha'// g.yonagyi rtsol ba chad pa'i mtha'/ de gnyis gnas pa dbu ma'i do// rom rtag pa'i byang chub sems// brkyang ma khragazhi chad pa'o// kun d+haramasu gang gnas pa// denadabum

[zj]par bya// mchog gi dga' ba rtag pa'i mthul// khrul ba'i dga' ba chad pa'i mthal/ lhan cig dga' bdabumana bshad/ o dngahU~Mnimatha' gnyis te/ tsaA yi rnamapa dbu mar gnas// A li kA limatha' gnyis te// ma ni yo ga da

mayi/ skyes pa bud mdamatha' gnyis te/ mning gnyis su med par gsungs// 'di ni sgom pa zung du 'jug/ de ni gnas pa dbu ma'i don/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa na// 'brel pa zung du 'jug pa ragasungs// bya ba'i rgyud dang

rnal 'a byor rgyud// snang ba zung du 'jug khalagasus// dang la ldan gsang ba 'dus pa// stongasgo dbugs la zung du 'jug/ shes rab rnal 'byor bla ma ru// si h+phagasur zung du 'jug/ ma nas rim dudang ba yang// gsang ba'i

'khor lo el// bad ba rdzogs pa'i tshad bstan pa// pad+mardoN+Da'agasapa snyam// de yobasu rdzogs pa'i tshod// de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo nas/bde chen 'khor lo'i bar du dung// dang por de ltar shes par bya// de ltar sam
brtan 'gyu/ bde ba chen po'i 'khoral nas// gsang ba'isna rtse'i bar dudang// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ bcud kyi 'on chen gangan gnas// de ni shesapasuyis shes// de yi brtag pa dza ltar lags//

bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalar// spyi bo tshangs pa'i bug nas// gsang ba 'khor lo yan chad du// ab d+hA'i tsan dan gnas// la larasasprul ltar gnas// gzhan rnams kha thag khug par gnas// 'di rnams 'ang

bzhinakun la gnas // rtsa dang 'khor lo 'di rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por gsungs// phyi yi rtse dazhingagi rtsa// gsang ba de bzhin mther thugani/ man ngag yod pasashes par gsungs// brtag pa rnam pa/
[r]@#// gnyis su brtan// dang po lus kyi brtag pa ste// gnyis pa ngag tu shesapar bya// lus la spyidang bye brag gnyis// sgra ni rlungagi rang bzhin te// yan lag byung nanuyi khams// yan lag rgyas pa

tshe sa yi khams// snyad zheng chanam yikhams// snatshogs dus nam mkha'i khams// spyiru dkar ba chuyakhams// dmar ba ma shes par bya// sar ba de bzhin sa yi khams// sngon rlung du shes par bya// yang na rlung gi

khams yin te// droda rnams tshem yi khams// brtanapa sa ya khams su gsungs// rmukhamasa chen chuyi khams// de rnams kun ldan nam mkha'i khams// 'jug pa bde chen s yon te/ ldog pa sprul pa chu rugasud+ma/

rnal 'byor rgyudanabye brag gis// sems kyi gnas pa shes par byed// shu ku rlung la si tam// sbrul dang chos su sbyarab yin// gzhan yang makhas pas shes par bya// de nas bye brag gsungs pa yin// dbyibs dang kha

sa dog mtshonami gsum// kun lamakhas par shes par bya// dang poradabyibasakyiTartag pa yang// dpral ba'i dbyibs la rnam pa bzhi// gru bzhi zlum po zla gam dag/ gru gsum du yang shag par du/ dkar po lasogs de dang

chu'adra/ rna ba nas bzung rkang pa'i bal/ kun la brtagacingashes par bya// skad ni phra dang sbomang dang// ring du'adon dang thung ba dang// 'da' ba lasogs bye brag rnams// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// rtags de brtag pa'i

mtshan mani// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// 'dod chags sku dngazhe sdang thugs// mun pa gsung dushes par bya// dang po 'dod chags dbyab yang// yar ngomar ngo mtshams dang gsum// dbyibs dang kha dog skad/

tsha gsum la// mkhas pa 'dod pa skye ba brtag/ tin bar bzhidangamtshan par bazhi// de bzhin skad cig thang cig rnams// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// mig 'dzum ba spruldang lasogs// dbyibs kyi 'dod pa skye ba dang//
'dod pa'i gzugs ldan cung zhig dmar// sna bug dka'al sogs pa dang// skad 'dar kha niskam la sogs// 'dod pa skyes pa'i rtags su bshad// gzhan yang 'dod paskyes pa'i rtags// kha dog dbyibs la brtag
par bya su phyir 'dod pas yi rtags// chul sogs pa de bzhin no// gsung dang thugs la'angashesapar bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags zhes pa jo ltar lags// de yi chen po ji ltar lags//

zhesdang la sogasaja ltar lags// sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyisabaka' stsal pa// 'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste// gab pa'i gsang ba martogs par// smras pa'i gsang ba la zhananas//

srid pas bon mi zad par// dpa' na rgyud kyimada' bzhin du// 'bras bumanar med dmyal bar skye// chen po mi rtog rang bzhin tu// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyod// 'dod chags zhes pa sbyang byaso// deyichen po gnyen

por gsungs// 'dod chags zhes pa ma tog ste// de yi chen po dri dang 'dra// gzhan yang bye bag shes par bya// zhe sdang lasogs gong dang 'dra// thams cad rten pa sku ru bstan// brjod pa dang brel gsung du bstan// rnam rtog bral ba

thugs su shes// rnamartog chung zhingagatong phod cha// bla ma la gus snying rdzache// gzhan yang bye brag kun shes pa// 'di la bstan gyi kun la gsang// bam yon tan kun ldan zhing// dbang dang man ngag 'brel shes dang/ gsang

btsahaM// @#// ba'i donalam rmongs shing// thugasarjechanapo dang ldan pas// chos laser sna mad pa dang// gsal la gsong porasna ba dang// rigs bcas kun gyis bkur ba dang// las kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba dang//

ze dmatshig dang ldan ng+ga ste// 'di la bkur gyi thams cad la// bstan cingebakurab r bya ba min// de nas rin chen gsum pa ni// gzhi med cig skyes pa ste// rtog bralasmyos pa med pa yin// de rtogs rin chen 'phreng ba'o// lha
mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gab pa zhes pa dziltar lags// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar min// smras pa zhes paji ltar lags// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gab pa zhes pa

shes ho[：]sum cu rtsa bdunasku gsung thugs// chos dang los spyodasprul sku gsung// dga' ba bzhir mdor bsdusab// dmigs pa'i rgyunani gsang ba'o// bdun dpaldan phyer chen po yi/ sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i// gnyen po

stobs kyis ma zhugs ng// smras ba padaro gnyis// snyoms par zhugs na 'dod pa skye// 'dini kun mo ma rus pa// dpal ljon shin rtsa nga la sa// mal gam tog thams cad skyes// nyonamos rtsa ba 'dod chags la// dug gsum

la sogs thamasacad de// smras pa'i gsangaba'i 'khor ba ste/ (gab pa mya ngan 'das par gsungs// 'khor ba man mdadmyal ba dang// dur khrod brgyud podrags pa can// snyingadzomedacingasha khrag za/ shing rta'i 'khora' bzhin

du gnas / mya na'angs pasku gsums// skyob partsa'adas gyur kyang// 'khorale 'khor tshul duni// tshogs kyi shugs kyi mthu As su// goms can don la yang dag 'jug/ chos sku spros bral nam mkha'akhazhin/skya

0 gnyis sprinadang char lta bu/ sku gnyis sems can donaadzad ng// sems can las dang smon lam stobs// de'i stobs kyis snangab las// yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med/ sku gsung de'ang bzhi bcu'i don// dur khrod 'asogs brda'u shes

sum cu rtsa gnyis chos zhu'i brda// rgyananigazugs sku gnyis kyi brda// gzhan yang brda yi bye brag ni// spom po gsang ba'i de'ibarda// khro ma gsang ba'ipad+ma'i brda// sgyu dang drang ba yon tan ston// mdzub me la rtenamathe'u chung ni// ngayi

gan dutshur shog yin// mtha bong la brtenamadzub mo bar/ khyodakyi gan du 'ongagis yin// mthe bong mdzub gnyis byur gsum ni// b+ha gargyas sam dril yin// b+ha gargyas pa zlum por ston// bde ba'i gnas su 'du ba yang// sridadam

nam gung tho'angs gsum// mdzub tshigs dang po nas bzung nas// tha ma'i bar du brda yin no// sku gsung thugs kyi bye'i brlabs kyis// lan gsum bar du nyan tan gnang// gzhan yang brdaya kyi brag rnams/ rgyud rnams kun tu gsung

nga/ gnas/thabs kyi 'dug sdus so// zhe gnas shes rab 'dug par gsungs// zhing nithabs kyi bza' ba'i tshogs// de bzhin shes rab che ba'i zhing// 'du ba thabs ni'ong ngos/ shes rab khongabartse'aduyin// tsan+dathabs kyisnyan

dang rgyan// shes rab de bzhin nyiditsan+do// durakhrod thabs kyi rnamartog bral// de bzhin shes rab nye dur khrod// gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams// kha dog de bzhin dbyibs dang yang// yan lag tshul las shesapa bya// de nas lha
mo sogs pas mchodapa sna tshogs pas mchod nasami snang bar gyur to// dpalarin chen phreng ba'irgyud kyirgyal po chen po gsang ba yang gsang ba ste rang bzhin gyis gsang ba rdzogs so//
gyi mkhago'o ni chen rdodzad ng/ yo ga dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyuracing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// slad kyis kyang dpe phyi mo 'gatugs nas bcos pa'o//
@#// rgyagar skad du/ zhe hAsamaya tan+tarAdzanAm/ bod skad du/ dpol dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes khyab/ 'jam dar la gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos

ba dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa thamasacad kyi sku dang/ gsung drang/ thugs rdo rje btsunamo'i lhog lasnyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rjesnying po dang/ rnal 'byoram grangs

lcamadaba'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa 'ardordzasnying bo la zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ dam tshig gi rim pa bka' stsal pa/ daNatshigadanganimi ldan na// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// rgyu ma dang yi 'bras bu bzhin/tsho

yig yi dus byas dmyal bar 'gro// de phyir dam tshig shin tubasrung// sas rgyas bla ma las thob phyir// thun mong ma yin blam ya// lnga bcu'ibadag nyidabasrungabarang// thun mong brgyad dang bcu bzhi ste// de rnams des pas shes par

byang de rnams spyi i dmatshig ste// bye brag dam tshig bsrung bar bya// phung po lha rigs lnga ste// 'byung ba ldan yum lnga 'o// skye mchedusems dpabasamasam yin// gzugs phung rnamapar snang mdzad '// brjed dang brnyas pa

lasogs spong// da lamachodadang bstodasogs bya// denadam par ni rang rig ste// tshogs bsags phyir ni nga yas gsungs// tshor ba la sogs de dang 'dra// sa nas nigs rgyas spun yin te// spyod lam gsum dum yengs

shig/ gong dugasungs pa'i tshul bzhin bsrung// chul sogs ba de bzhin no// mig la sogs pa de bzhin// gajugs 'a sogasapa de bzhinabasrung// dkyil 'khoraduzhugs rnal 'a byolapa// rdordza'adzinapa bzhin du mchod// b.rus/

shingegashab la sogs spang// sems can yo rang mo kun la// dpa' bo dpa' mo dam tshig bsrung// bza' ba la sogs dus su yang// bdud rtsi sbyorabs dam tshig bsrung// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams la// rang gi spyod dang gzhan spyod la

rjes su yi rangadamatshig yin/ mdoran snang zhing srid pa'i rdzo// dmatshig bsrung zhingemachodapaphyir// lus kyitasdom sku yin to// ngag gi tosdom gsung dugasungs// yid kyis sdom thugs su gsus// a gyi 'od zer dkar

po yis// 'do khams dag pa 'gyur pa ni// sku yid matshig bsrungara'o// de la mchod dang stong sogs bya// bsdu ba'ang o du shos par bya// Anib dog dmarapo yos// gzugs khams dag pa'igasung dmachig/ sdig kha dog

nag po yis// gzugs med ngag ra dmatshig go/ oM na spyi bor yanag gnas/ An de bzhin mgrinapar gnas// tshunising kar spyodang bsdu// sku yimakha'a'agro bcu gakisu// 'dod khams dag pa'i dam tshigago/ gsung
gi mkha'a'agro bcugatisasu/ gzugs khams dag pa'i dmatshig yin// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su/ gzugasached dag pa'o des tshig ste// o dbaA b+hadang hU~Ml bsdu// o ni rgyuyi sku bcu gnyis// ANani
lam gyi sku bcu gnyis/ hU~Mni'abras bu'i sku bcu gnyis// bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa lo dang la ldan chos sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'i//

ukla// longs spyod rdzogs pa sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa 'o// sprulapa yang ni sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// bde chen snying pohU~Mtung la// sku dang gsung dang thugs

dang yang/ ye shes dang ni rnam pa bzhi// o dang AdangahU~Mdang yung// yan lagabazhi bzhi'i thub pas gsungs// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu la// bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad shesapar bya// oM dang goganyis rang bzhin gyi sngags

kying bar shes par bya// sngags kyi grangs ni khri stong// drug brgya bzlas par shes par bya// 'go pa bskyod pa rang bzhinagal/ rkang pa rang bzhin dkyil 'khoraro// de ltar gnas ni d mchog go/ gzhan yang dam

tshig bye brag yang// 'jig rten thasnyad spang ba'i phyir// mi bskyod rnam snang la sogs dang// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa// gsang ba'i rdo rje pad+madang// ji ltar rol pa'i sbyod pa kun/ tha snyad kyang ni lam la 'jug

gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshigazhi// rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag bcu// theg pacholasmod pa dang// gsang ba'i don la skur 'debs dang// rnal 'byor kun la gnod pa dang// sems can kun la 'tsho byed pa// 'di bsad pa[é]ram

tshig yin// smras pa bsrung ba'i rim pa yang// mkhyen blang ba'i dam tshig ste// 'dod pa chen po dang ldan pa// 'dod chags spyod pa'i ng de dang 'dra/ rang gi dmatshig bsrung ba'i phyir// brdzun duslab bzhi pa yin// rotsacishadang

bcudakyisha// kha ba'i chang dang mngar ba'i chang// mar la gcig ste 'omaganyis// gzhan ni gsum ste yan lag bcu// 'di ltar dam chig yin par gsungs// bdud rtsi nyid la dus gsum du// bcom ldan sku gsung thugs kyi ste//

ba[”]ba dang po yungs kar tham yang// byi'alikhamagyi tshul du bza'// mtshan mo shes rab sku gsung thugs// nyin mo thabs kyi sku gsung thugs// nyi ma nub dngazhim sha/nyi ma gung gi blabs kyi dus// nam srodanamanilangs pa dang

nam gyi gung nishesarab dus// dus drug mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// mtshig 'di las ma nyams na// phyogs bcu'ajig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo mkha'agrom rnams kyi// mchod dang srung ba la sogs byed// gzhan

yang gasang ba'ibye brag la// gsang ba sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ lus lam dang khrag mi gdon/ srog gam zug rngu'i phyiramagatogs// srog chags 'dod pa sbyong mthong na// rang gi rnal 'byor shor mi bya// dam tshig bsrung phyir rab n

par 'dug/ las su rung na g.yor bar 'khyam/ 'di skad ces bya yan lag brgyad// bdag gis bcu bzhi yin par gsungs// thos pa'i dus gcig lnga bcu'idon// bcom ldan 'das ni rtsa ba bzhi// dngazhin gshegs pa yan lag bcu

gsung thugasanilus ngag yid// rnami byed phyir dam tshig/ btsun mo dmatshig gis brgyan mdzes// rgyu ba mnyam ra ra 'jog pas so// snyoms pa dus gsum mi 'gyur ba// bzhugs pa bde ba'i ngo bo la'o// rdorjesnying po lasogs

pa bye brag yin par ngayis gsungs// e ni sen lag brgyad yin no// bon bcu po'i rang bzhin te// mchilnga bcu'i rang bzhin no// yin gzhan rnams an par gsus// e ni srog chags gsod pa sta/ dbazhim byin len pa'o/

mni brdzun du slab 'o// yin 'dod chags spyod pa go/ a nisku yi dmatshig ste// khaM nigasung gi dmatshig go mnathugs kyi demachig ste// yanibaza' ba'i dam tshig go/ dusagasum dmatshig ma bsrung na// 'jig rten pa dang
sha 'bum gyur bas// rnam smin chab rang yis gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa'i mchinam ni// lus kyi nyes pa sna tshogs 'byung// ngag gi nyes pa sna tshogs sma// kha dog dbyibs rnams 'gyur

babs dang// lag gis rdzas rnams mi thub cing// 'bras dang shu ba la sogs 'byung// de tshornal 'byor nyams pa des// dmachig nyams pa shin tubs// bla ma rdo rje spun grul du// tshogs kyidakyil 'khor sprul byas 5/

gser dngul la sogs brgya'am stong// rtadang glang po la sogs dang// ba mudang man shel dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan brgya 'am stong// mar me la sogs de bzhin no// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor/ chogs bsags
pas ni nyams pa gso// gal te nyams pa ma gsos na// nyams pa de dang rnal 'byo'agazhan// gnas gcig dang nimugacig gam// yul dang lam gyi gnas gcig gam// skad cig tsam yang 'dug mi@#// 'dug nanyis pa/

[' ] bsam mi khyab// 'baganyas sbyin srog dbang bskur dang// gtor ma mchod dang bzlas pa dang// le bu mig sman la sogs dang// zhi rgyas la sogs las rnams dang/ 'jig rten mtshan ma brgyadadag dang// 'jig rten
'das pa'i mtshan ma bzhi// sas rgyas pa yi mtshon ma gcig/ gzhan yang dngos grub ma lus pa// dmachig 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur// 'bru rnams sna tshogs skye 'gyur ba// chen s las skyes pa bzhin//

dam pa sku gsung thugs yin te// dolas 'a sanatsig par 'agyur// de ltar bu ni med pa'i khyilaM// shi ma thag tu stong par ' ra/ de bzhin dam tshig 'di med na/ mna'atshadasems can dmyal bar skye// pi wa gling

bu sbyorakun sogs// rgyud dang bral na brdung mi rung// de bzhinadamachig mdagyur na// sngags bzlas sgom pa la sogs pa// 'bras bu med palabarlag par 'gyur// nas las nas kyi myu gu ste// dmatshig las ni ro tsha'acham/

tshe 'dir thob par gasungasapa ste/ dus ni gzhan mar rtsod ldan dus// bstan pa gzhan min nga yis te// skya ba gzhan yin pa dang ma// man ngag gzhan menasam ya// bzhin yin par gosungs pa'o// de ltar dam tshig dang

ldan pa bud med 'du zhing dga' bar 'gyur// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo sta// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mar bstan// nor dang bran dang g.yoga 'khor dang/ rgyal po'i khor yul la sogs 'du// ngag ni skasha
cing bde bar gyur// srog gcod lasogasatshig smras kyang// sems can skrag pa'i ma'agyuralo/ lus kyisasems can bsad byas kyang// rnam smin 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// skun thob par gsungs pa'o// ngag gi

phra ma'ichig smras kyang// zhes par mi 'gyur gsung theba'agyur// yid kyis mnar sems bsam byas kyang// rtas par mi 'gyurathugs thoba'agyur// dmachig ldanuparoyonatamano// e ma'o rgyud nango mtshar cha
dpal dam chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/// gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+har dang/ lo tsA ba dag slong shAkyaseshis kyis bsgyur ba'o/
rgyugaraskadang/ ma hAb la tanarAdzanAm/ bod skad du/ dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal sdom pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshol lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
thacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo'i tshogs dang/ lA ma la sogs pamakha'agro ma'i tshogs/

dang rnal 'byor mdang/ ma mo'i tshog sakyis bskoranas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jig rten na ni cher grags pa// dgrani chen po drug yin te// ji ltar nyim nub pa'i tshe// grong khyer gyin mi rnams kyis//

stodang glang po la sogs pa// rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrogapar byed// thams cad dbul por skye bar 'gyur// de bzhin yul drug gi ni gras// shes rab kyi mnub pa'i tshe// ma rig pa limun pa la// so so'i skye bothams

cad kyis// ye shes lnga la sogs pa yi// N+Nasa rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed// bde ba med pa'i gnas su skye// dbra de yongs su gzhom pa'i phyir// mchod pa med cing bzlas pa med// gtor ma sbyin srug dkyil 'khor

med klog dang sgom pa bsam gtanamang// g.yong ba'ichos dang skarama'isogs// thams cad spangs te bde ba yi// stan la bdag nyid legs 'dug ste// shes rab yoshes bsrub par bya// shing rta yi ni 'khor lo wal/

yul la yang dag rgyug pa'i sams// dadag las nibazlog nas su// las kyi rlung ni chen po g.yos// ye shes me ni chen po 'bar// rnam rtog srog sa bdud rtsi'i ros// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// skyo ba med pa'i
gnas su gzung/ de nas sems ni brtanagyu'anas// mtshan mar snang ba 'gag pal gyur// de nyid lasaning zlog nas su// rang sems stong par bsgom par bya// chos la bdag mad rtogs pan// dachos masani

rtogs par 'gyur// thams cad stong pa ro gang ste// bde ba chen po'i sku zhes brjod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste// 'di la bsal ba ci yang mad// basman par bya ba ciyang med// de nyid mthong bas rnam par grol/

rigs gcig dang ni'ogis gsum dang// rigs lnga'igs ni rgyu la sogs// de nyid bad la tha dad med// jiltar glang po rnyed gyur nas// glang po'i rjes ni mi tsal lhar// sems kyi de dadargyuran// rnam rtog gang yang

mibatsal lo// ji lta'adug zhibadod pa la// sman nyid dug tusbyarataspyin/ smanalas dug 'byung sbyongs yapa// sman pa mkhas pas sbyor ba shes// gzhan yang maradang kha radang// mar gyi sAng po la sogs pa/ 'thung

de zhunasnyam du'agyur// de bzhin nga yis gsungs pa yang// drangaba'i don dang nges pa'i don// sgra ni rdzobazhin ji bzhin min// dgos pa dngan dgongs pa min// bsregs bcad bdar ba'i gsar bzhin du// yongs su brtags

nas nga yi bka'// blang bar bya yis mos pa 'am// gzhan gyis mkhas pa 'jug mi bya// ji ltar spyi bo ban po ste// dgra mu'agyur nga 'i skye bo yiso// sman yin byas te dug byin na// snyan du dmigs te dug zos na// zlos pa'i
rjes la'achibara'agyur// thabs rnams thams cad sgyu mar shes// shes rab brjod du med par gasus// dziltar rig pa mkhas pa yis// dugani dug gis 'byin pabyed// dziltar yis rmig pa la// de bzhin ma yis

gdung bar bya// ji ltar 'dod chags chab la// 'dod chags nyid kyis spang bar bya// dzalta zhe sdang ba 'a// zhe sdang nyid kyis spang bar bya// de bzhin gtimug che ba la// bti mug nyid kyis spang bar// dperanarlungani
mar me 'jig pa'i rgyu// detidanags sreg ma yi grogs su 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod la rten pa bde ba'i yul// drug gis dgra rnams bcom nas gnyis med thob// jil bumig sma nal sog

klong 'di nyid las nithams cad 'byung// ji ltar pha rol thabs ldan pa sa/ gzings la brten nas pha rol 'gro// pha rol phyin nas 'dor bar byed// de bzhin rang rig 'tshol bas kyang bud med sgyu ma la brten

rgyute[：]'ang rig ye shes thob par bya// 'od rig ye shes thob pa dang// bud med sgyu ma dor bar bya// zab mo'i dgongs pa ma shes shing// zab mo'i dgongs pa ma rtogs par// zab mo'i spyodang spyod par byed// sa

nadmyal ba chen poraltang// ji ltar riyi rtse mo nas// skyes bu 'ga' zhig lhungogyur na// dan ltung ba chen por 'gyur// gzhan yang dar gyi srin bu yis// rang la rang gis 'ching bar byed/ mtshan ma ma yi srin bu

yang rang gis nga ni srig par byed// sgyu ma tsam gyi tshul gnas shing// mtho'abazhi las ni rnam par grol// smyos pa thams cad nyebar zhi// mchomatsha mtshon byed ma yin te// lta ba'i debus na gnasapa yi/ hUM
rapha la phyin pa'o// dpal stobs po tsho'i rgyud las/ mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//gang zhig brtag par byed pa ma yin te// gnas nas shin tu brtags pa// khru do ba

ga yimad+d+hAmal// dang po ba yi rnam lnga yis// sor gcig tsam du byug par bya// de nas dricha'adrichu yis// byugs te ma tog sngon po dgram// rgyan la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan// bum pa lngani phyogs dang nga rgyus//

0 de nas bzus pa khri 'am 'bum// bdud rtsi chur byin brlabs te// gang zhig brtag pa'i mi de la// dang po mchims gcad khrus byas te// slag pa nag bo phyir bzlog byon// sazhigyin bcis sha bcings dang// ber

gaklogs te shar sgor gzhag/ tshil chen m mar nyal dubastan// nub tu ma long dngul la sogs// dag pa de la sman lnga dang// drilngasabyugs te bkru bar bya// donas nam lo nang du yang// gdon gyi mtshan ma

brtag pa ste// gtso bo'i sngags kyi mtha' runi// gdon ming dang sngags brtags na// lha yi gdon la sogs pa kun// mtshan ma 'byung ba the tshom med// med rgyan ni tha dad de// lha la sogs mthong bye brag go/ dus

ni'abyung po 'o ma sogs// mtshan ma sna tshogs byung ba'i tshe// de chogadonanadabang du bsdu// tshe dang bsod nams les spyod dang// mdza' bshes zug rngu la sogs pa/// gdonalasag pa bsal ba'aphyo// dpal

ldan[&]kha 'grom la sogs// brtag pa'i rdzas kyi bya brag kyang// mchod dang rtogs kyi 'khor las sa// bskor lamtshan ma brtag par bya// dbang bskur dus su ye shes kyang// dbab bo de bzhin sdig la sogs/

mchinam ma long dag lani// brtags te gzhan yang ci 'dod pa'i// mtshan ma brtag pa bla ma yi// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// nad kyi zug rngudabyung ba'i phyir// gso ba'i rig pa las gsungs pa'i/ chung
dang bad kan mkhris pa dang// 'dus pa dang ni yan lag bcas// gnas bzhi 'khor lor gnas pa ste// lus kun khrus byas gnas bzhiru/ sngags pas lag pas mnye bya ste// ma long dkyil du brtag byas na///
rlung la sogs pa shes par nges// de rjes 'khor la de nyid la// gso ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya// dug gi brtag pa'i rim pa yang// nang khrol yan lag thams cad la// gang du dug zhugs
blo mtshan ma brtag/ de nas gso ba'i sbyor ba yang// smanadang sngags dang chu sgyur te// mkhas pas brtags nas gso bar bya// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ mtshan mthams cad brtag pa'i le'u ste gnyis
gang zhig srung ba'irtenade yang gang dang ldan pa'i rim pa yis// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam par bya// bcolo'i bozlas pa khri'am 'bus// bsnyen par byas teden yang//
gsar ram dngul las bzo byas te// nang du dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa 'am// yang 'dab brgyudalte bar bcas// rdo rjerab la sogs bya// yungs karal sogs 'bru lta dang// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang// de

nas bzhag ste rab gnas bya// yongs surdzogs nas bcing bar bya// gzhan yang grog lam shang shumanyam// dur khrod dag gi ro ras la// bsang dang bgags bskrad tshul bzhin bya// bzlasang gong dang 'dra ba ste//
dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs gyuman// sngags kyang yongs su rdzogs par bri// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor la yos// lus ngag yid la bsrung bar bya// yongs su ma rdzogs zur drug la// dpa' bo drug gi sngag
bris te// bsrung bya'i lus la mtshon par bsgom// rtsigs mchan drug la g.yung drung gi/ yig drug ni bris pa ste// bsrung bya'i lus 'amtshan par basgom// dbus su yi ge kA bris te// bar chad thams cad

0bsal bar bsam// chog yongs su rdzogs bya ste// bzo byas snod ni kha dog sgyur// legs pas da lta spyi bo 'am// mgrinupa de bzhin dpung pa yi// chos pa'i bu gar los spyodamanyam// sor bzhi dag tub cing
bar bya// gzhan yang nd pa'i m rnal 'byorab// dag la srung dang bo yang// godrenapasal bsasata gnas gsum du// thig le gsum byas sngags gsum dgod// gzhan yang gnas nisum cu bdun//
thig le byas te sngags rnams dgod// de nas go cha mtshon cha yang// tshul bzhin mthunapar shes par bya// de nas stan nam mal tshal// oM Abadzrarakar hU~MphaT/ bsgom mam gzhan la'ang srakhar bya
gzhan yang lag pa g.yas pa yi// mthil dugur kum dag sbyar ta// g.yonagyi sbom po khrom yis// spyibodapral ba rna bamig/ sna dang kha dang mgrin pa dang// dbungs sing ka lta ba dang// 'og gi snod
gnyis yan lag la// sngags dang bcas nas legs par brjod// gzhan yang skud pa sna lnga la// sngags dang bcasan srung bar 'gyur// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'us
gsum pa 'o///mgon po thugs rje chaldan ng// de nyid lan phyag 'tshal te/ rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// srung ba'i 'khor la rdo ltar ni// shes bye brag ji ltar lags//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ro/ ya shos kyin de nyid kyi// rtog pa rab tu bshad par bya// dal yong shes kyini gnas// rnam pa lnga ru shes bya ste// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang/ rab tugasang
sha da nga gsang ba che// nga yis bshad kyis legs pa/ranyon// de la phyi yi shes ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan dang 'brel ba'o// de ltar rtogs pa phyi'i yongashes// nang gi phungasogs
ltar rtogs// de nyid dngabral yengashesaso// de nas gsang ba'iya shas// rtsa dang rlung dang thig ler rtogs// rtog pa de dang bral ba ni// gsang ba'i ye shes yin par bshad// dga' ba mchog dang
bral ba'i dga'// lhan cig skyes dga' gang yin pa// bde bar rtog pa rnam rtogs// de stongarab gsang shes so// de nas yushes chen po bzhi// dang po mnyam mtha' spangs pa'i// ye shes de nyid yod

pa la rnam rtog sbyong pa da bzhin 'jog/ de nyid rang rig chen po ste// de nyid ye shes chen po la/ de ltar shesan rdor 'dzin gyi// sa na nges par thob pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ yashes brtag pa'i
de nas shes chen po yi// brtag pa de nyid bshad par bya// dang por romanyam gyur pa 'o// stong pa nyid kyi romanyam la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa//

phung po khams dang sumachod sogs// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dang// dga' dang mchog dga' bral ba dang// da la sogs pa thams cad kun// sgyu ma tsam du shes pa'i bya// de nyid gzhan rig ces bya ste/

rang rig sems kyi de nyid la// gnyis su med par sgomapa ni// de nyid shes chen po ste// mthar phyin brtag pa rdzogs pa 'o// dpal stobs po che'irgyud las/ ye shes chen po brtag pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/
de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang/ rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo dang/ mkha' 'grom dang/ rnal 'byor ma dang ma mo'i tshogs thams cad rjes su yi rang
nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod bas mchod nas/ g.yon phyogasanasaM lanagasum bskorab byas nasam snang bar gyur to// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogasaso// paN+Ditag
ya d+ha ra dang/ lo rgyu ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ gidza na gu gyutan+taradza/ bod skadadu/ dpal ye shes gsang

ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal pe/ dpal bde ba chen pa la phyag 'tshol la// byang chub chaphyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi// rang lus rtsa 'khor bzhi yi ba/tso bo yi// snying po dol yang dag phyag 'tshal lo// dbang bzhi'i

de nyid bdag la gsungs// nyon cig rdosnying po'i bdag/ bskyod pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams kyi// de nyid dang por bshad bya ste// drug cu rtsa bzhi dpe byadayin// sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub phyogs// ldaniya
shes lnga yin te// dpa' bo gcig pa chos kyi dbyings// phyag mchanaskumadog gzhan nas gsus// ga bya'i rdo rje dril bu'i tshad// nas dang sorags yin par 'dod// de nyid thabs dang shes rab yin//
de'o dmanyid la dbyer med de// bsgom bya med de sgom pa med// bsgoms pas thob pa ci yang med// rgyu dang rkyenagyis bskyod du med// sems kyig la sku lnga dang// ston pa mdacingabastan pa med// 'jig
thuglu/ dung rnam rtog kun dang bral// de nyid bzhi pa 'di nyid do// dang po rlung gi de nyid de// srog rtsol gnyis ni a dang haM// a ni chos rnams thog ma nas// ma skyes pa yi don yin no// haMnA

[>gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis stong// ldang 'jug gsum ni sku gsung thugs// sarakyi gzhidang sku lnga dang// rnam pa thar dang stongs dang// de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad sogs// de dag rlung gi de nyid de// de nas thig
la'i de nyid kyang// tizla thabs dang sa 'baste// sngags kyi 'phrongs mtshan dpa in/ thig le ye shes lnga rang bzhin// gnyis su med pa'i de nyid yine// phra mo la sogs ba zhan nas shes// de nas 'og

gi sgo dag na// de nyid yang dag bshad bya ste// rtsa gsum sku gsung thugs ngo bo// tshulnga ye shes lnga yin no// tsan+d+hawIn ti shu bzhi// de nyid ye shes nyi shu bzhi// chos sku'i 'phrin las nyi shu bzhi// kha sbyar
thabs dang shes rab ste// 'dzag dang 'bar ba gnyis med yin// 'khor lo bzhi ni sku bzhi ste// drugan de nyid drug yin te// sgrol ma chung gi de nyid de// ma gos dkor de ba nyid// bcu drug stong pa bcu

drug yin/ bzhi ni ye shes bzhi yin no// rnam par thadang stong pa dang// de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad drang/ roge sngags snyoms 'jug phra ba dag// ya shas lnga bcu la sogs pa/// rtsa 'dab de nyid ya'i
paranges// rtsa d gnas ba'i mi la yang// 'khor ba thag khugapa las// g.yas g.yon sbrul ltar 'khril bas// phyi yi g.yas g.yon gzhu lta bu// gsum pa'i dbang gi de nyid kyang// sa glu shesa'ab
07 chos dbyis te// gdur thabs kyiye shes bzhi// rtsa ni 'og min gnasayinete// dga' ba mchog dga' byung chub phyogs// rang bzhin dga' ba chos sku ste// bral ba'i dga' ba gzugs sku gnyis// bcu drug

stong pa bcu drug go/ rgyud kyi tshul du sgyu ma tsam// gang zhig rang rig 'dodapas kyang// dang por ngobar shes bya so// de nas de nyid shes par bya// gal te de nyid mi shes par// zab mo'i lam nyid sgom byed//

'bras bu yod cing rlag por nges// lha yi de nyid ma shesan// dur khrod gnas pa'i srinapo 'dra// de bzhin dur khrod srin mo 'dra// spyod pa'id zhir ma shes na// grong khyer gnas pa'i smon pa dra// khyi phag srin

porakA 'dra// phyag mtshan de nyid ma shes na// brgya byinelagana mtshon thogs dra// phyag rgya'i de nyid ma shes na// rgyal po phang gi btsun mo 'dra// rlung gi de nyid ma shesan// brgya byin spyi bo'i dud pa 'dra// rtsa

yi de nyid ma shos nA// tsan dan shing gi sprul sogs 'dra// lus kyiganyer ma dag dang 'dra// lus kyi dri ma chudang 'dra// thig le'i de nyid ma shes na// tsan dan shing gi 'dzerapa 'dra// 'khor la de nyid

ma shes na// brgya byin lag na 'khor la 'dro// de bzhin srid pa'i 'khor lo 'dra// pad+ma'i rinyid ma shes na// 'dam bu tshal gyi par 'dra// phyug po'i de nyid ma shesan// mchod rten gyi ni 'khor lo 'dra// kha

sbyor de nyid ma shes na// thal mo g.yas g.yon sbyar ba 'dra// gnas kyi de nyid ma shes na// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal pho brang 'dra// byang sams ri nyidam shosan// mi gtsang sgo yi lud pa 'dra// se h+pha'i de de
@##// ma shes na// mtsho sogs las byung khrag dang 'ad// dga' ba'i de nyid ma shes na// smad 'tshongam yi 'dod chags 'dra// srung bya'i da nyidamanyes na// grong khyeramadaba'i rgyal pa
bo 'dra gnyen bod tidi ma shes na/ rgyal bo mad pa'i grong khyer 'dra// rang rig do dam shes na// 'dus byas nam mkha' stongang 'dra// gzhanyayang de nyid bco brgyad ni// bama'izhal nas shes par

sgra byang thams cad sgyu ma'i tshul dang ni// rmalam glog dang sprin lta bu// de nyid shes na grol bar 'gyur// kye homagon po thugs rje// rang rig ye shes 'tshol ba la// rang dang gzhan gyi sde pa la// 'di

khyad pa'i m dadamatso/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyad par char po nga nyid de// gzhan ni khyad par dbang bzhi dang// de yi lam gyi de nyid brtags// chad pa bdag dang dbang phyug dang// khyadadapyad
pa po nyid las// rgyu sogs rgyud las khyad par 'phags// gang thug bdag dang bral ba'i phyir// nyan thos rang rgyal theg chen dang// rlung sogs chos kyi bdag gis bcings// dmanango rnams kyi snangabs
khyab thog chen rang bzhin lho yis khyab// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor cha na po sogs// danyid kyi nikhyadang ra che// legs par bstan gyis legs par zung// de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing yi rangs par
gyur to// dpal rdordzasams dpa' yang gs gsang ba'i de khon nyid kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ rnal 'byor ma tsan+damA le dang/ lo tsA ba dag slongashAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
rgya gar skad du/ shrI dzAnamA le mArAdza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdordzasams dpa' la phyag 'tshal le//

kyi lagus gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba blanamad pa yi// lta ba zhes pa gang zhig lags/ spyod nga gang dang gang lags pa/gtso bos bdag la thongashad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nga/

lta ba shes rab pha rol phyin/ gdod nas sbyos bral lhun gyis grub// rang gis ye shes dbyings na gsal// ma rige mun pas bsgribs pamed// shes rab snying po rtsir byung ba// lta ba kun gyi yang rtse gi/ don dam rang

rig yi shes la// blang ba med cing dor ba med// dmatsho dngagya nomo gnyis kamed// sgom pa po med bsgom bya med// dmigs med gnas su snying rje dang// dmigs mdo gnas su shes rab gnyis// blo dang lhan cig
gcig gyur pa// nam mkha'anam mkha'i rang bzhin// rang gshing shas gang 'dod pas// mchinama'i rnam rtog sgom pamin// dman pa rnams la skur mi gdab// de nyid la yang sgrom gdags// dang por bskal pa

bsgoms pa dang// rang ga skad cig thob pa nyid// brgya stong la sogs rgyur mi phod// dpe dang bgrang bar mi nus te// dperanamatshodang rlabs rjes bzhin// dngos po bsgom pa sgom pa min// dngos dang dngos med re
mnyaman// ma bsgoms nayang snyom panyid// sgom dang ma sgom gnyis ka med// 'od gasal da lasems zin na// gzung 'dzin dgra yi dpung rnams 'dzoms// phyogs bcu'ajig rten khams bcas pa'i// dnga' bo
mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i gnas// rab kyisamanyam gzhag rjes thob spang// 'bring gis rjes thob stong par blta/ thams rjes thob sgyu ma blta// song ba lta bu'i lta spyod ni// bzhi pa yin par ngayi

tho gsus// de nas spyod pa'i rgyal po bshad// spyod pa rnam pa gsum yin te// kun tu bzang bo 'busu'u// a ba d+hA tig sum yazhi'o// da pa'i dus dang gnas dang bas// gang zag dang ni bya ba dang// ngo bo dang ni skyod dang
rgyu yang thabs dang dgos pa dgos ba dang// mkhas pas kun la sbyar bar bya// sas rgyas rigs dang rdo rje'i logs// rin chen rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs/ las kyi rogs dang spyod pa lnga/

kun tu bzang po'i spyod ba yin// sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang// dkon mchog gsum ni'i dzin pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyin mchog gi spyod// jo tshadril bu phyag rgya 'dzin// blam 'dzin pa rjeNa'i sbyor// dam tshig yid 'ong

dus bzhi zu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi ni char spyod// theg pa gsum dang dam chos 'dzin// pad+ma gar gyi spyod pa yin// dam tshig thams cad ldan pa dang// ma grol la sogs dgrol ba yin// rta yi rgyal po'i spyod pa// khro ba la/

ba 'chagapa gsum// rnal 'byor chen pos gnas bya ste// g.yang ba g.yengab sbyong ba ni// 'du su ku yi sbyodapa'o// rgyan 'chang ba dang bdud rtsi myang// phyag rgya bsten dang rnam pa gsum// a ba d+hAtI'i spyod pa ste// rgyan la

drug ste phyag rgya la// bdud rtsi bcu ste mi gtsang bas/ mi gtsang 'khrud pa'i spyad pa'o// gnas ni khan ma thomad// phyi nang g.yang mad ga nas yin no// rtog pa 'dzoms ba slob ba'i dus/ gruban rdzu 'phrul ston pa'i
sgo dang skur pa med pa 'o// dgos pa mnyan pa'i stobs yin te// red dang bkur sti grags pa dang// zug rngu'i kha zas ma yin te// bla ma'i dus thabs legs bsten blang//

kha zas rnam rtog chungab yi// las dang po yos bya bor gsungs// dbye ba gsum dang bye bragani// gong du gsus pa kho na'o// ngo bo rtog med sems de nyed// gtsang sa 'gags dang sprul pa ston// bde nyid grub
pa'id ya'i no/ dgos pa la yang gnyis yo/dade// gtsangasmaslangs pa'i dgos pa las// gos pa dngos la rnam pa bzhi// rang sems brtan g.yo brtag ba dang// phyago rgyu khyad par 'tshol ba dang// nges 'dul
gang zag gzhug pa dang// mi mos skurang dag pa'o// gsang sngags rgyal po'i lta spyod kyis// 'khor gyi dpa' bo mkha' 'gro tshogs// dus dang brgyal dang 'gyel rgyur bas// dbugs dbyungab yi ting
'dzin gyis// thams cad dran pa sor rnyed nas// thams cad mgrin gcig 'di skad gsol// dngos po romanyam gyur pa yi// lta ba 'di yang ngo mtshar// g.yang bas g.yang ba sbyong ba yi/
spyodar 'di yang ngomatshar che// chos rnams spong bar ro mnyaman// lha dang mi lta ga la yod// gtsang sma bdud rtsi 'o gcig l// spyod dang mi spyod ga la yod// dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje
'dzin// mnyam gzhag rjes thob ga la yod// thams cad sems kyi ngo bo la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ga la yod// 'jigs byed tshon pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas//
lhan tsagi skyes pa'i sgrubs g.yogs kyis// rin chen sems ni dri cen byas// zla ba rab rige sel byed de// mig gis rang gi ja ma mthong// sems kyi de nyid/
ma rtog sa bar// tha dad gzung 'dzin sna tshogs 'dzin// de phyir lta ba'i rgyal po bstan// mi shes pa ya rab rib kyis/ bdud rtsi'i de nyidam shes te// gtsang dang mi gtsang la
rgyu sogs brtags// de phyir spyod pa'i rgyal po bstan// gnas pa'i rgyan dang g.yeng ba'arkyen// de phyir zung 'jugargyal po bstan// rkyen dang dbangabo rab 'bring gis// mnyam gzhag
rjes thob rgyal po bstan// ma shes pa yu rab 'be kyis// 'khrul pas gzung 'dzin gnyis su brtags// de phyir sems kyi rgyal po bstan// lta spyod 'di la nan tan gyis//
de nas thams cad dga' zhing mgunas yi rangs te// phyi nang gi mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal ye shes 'phreng ba rgyud kyi rgyal po lta spyod zung du 'jug pardzogs
rnal 'byoramatsan+damA la dang/ dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/
